Lore: 'The Dead can't really be there! Is it some devilry hatched in the Dark Land?'
Text: Twilight. Damage +1. To play this minion, remove a burden or spot a twilight minion.

Name: Gate Picket
Lore: Now the watch-towers, which had fallen into decay, were repaired, and filled with arms, and garrisoned with ceaseless vigilance.
Text: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice to make the Free Peoples player name 3 cultures. Wound each companion and ally not of a named culture.

Name: Gate Sentry
Lore: In it there was a single gate of iron, and upon its battlement sentinels paced unceasingly.
Text: Maneuver: Exert this minion twice and spot another [SAURON] minion to discard a condition.

Name: Gate Troll
Lore: This was Cirith Gorgor, the Haunted Pass, the entrance to the land of the Enemy.
Text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other [SAURON] minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

Name: Orc Insurgent
Lore: 'You've spoken more than enough, Uglúk,' sneered the evil voice. 'I wonder how they would like it in Lugbúrz.'
Text: Shadow: Exert this minion to draw X cards and add (X), where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

Name: Peril
Lore: 'A winged Nazgûl awaits us northward on the east-bank.'
Text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a [SAURON] Orc to play a Nazgul or [SAURON] minion. Its twilight cost is -4 and it comes into play exhausted.

Name: Troll of Udun
Lore: '...Trolls are only counterfeits, made by the Enemy in the Great Darkness, in mockery of Ents....'
Text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, this minion's twilight cost is -4. Skirmish: Discard a [SAURON] card from hand to make this minion strength +1.

Name: Troll's Chain
Lore: Trolls they were, but filled with the evil will of their master.
Text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Troll. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.

Name: Wisp of Pale Sheen
Lore: 'They do not see what lies ahead / When Sun has failed and Moon is dead.'
Text: Twilight. Regroup: Spot another [SAURON] or twilight minion and discard this minion to add a burden.

Name: Held
Notes: The site 9 referred to on this card is any site 9 card from any block.
Text: Bearer must be Frodo. Each time Frodo is about to be killed by a wound, add a burden instead. When the fellowship moves to site 9, Frodo is corrupted. Regroup: If you can spot no minions, discard this condition.

Name: It Burns Us
Notes: This card counts both Free Peoples cultures and Shadow cultures when cards are revealed.
Lore: 'No more than you deserve.'
Text: Regroup: Spot Sam and Smeagol (or Gollum) to choose an opponent who must reveal his or her hand. Wound a minion X times, where X is the number of different cultures revealed.

Name: Kept Safe
Text: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, place 2 [SHIRE] tokens here. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a [SHIRE] token from here to prevent that wound.

Name: Long Slow Wrath
Lore: 'The coming of the hobbits and the tidings that they brought have spilled it: it will soon be running like a flood....'
Text: Skirmish: Exert an unbound Hobbit to make him strength +1 and damage +1 for each [GANDALF] companion you can spot.

Name: Merry, Impatient Hobbit
Lore: 'Don't talk to it Merry. Don't encourage it.'
Text: Regroup: Discard Merry to heal a [GANDALF] companion.

Name: Pippin, Hastiest of All
Lore: 'By root and twig, but this is a strange business: up sprout a little folk that are not in the old lists....'
Text: Regroup: Discard Pippin to choose a Shadow player who must wound one of his or her minions.

Name: Rocks of Emyn Muil
Text: Fellowship: Play a companion with the Frodo signet to remove a burden.

Name: Westfold
Text: Fellowship: Exert Aragorn twice to play a companion with the Aragorn signet from your draw deck.

Name: Meduseld
Text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert 3 companions with the Gandalf signet to play an unbound companion from your dead pile.

Name: Hornburg Hall
Text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Spot 3 companions with the Theoden signet and discard your hand to draw 4 cards.

Name: Valley of Saruman
Text: When the fellowship moves to this site, discard all allies.

Name: Saruman's Laboratory
Text: Response: If your minion is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

Name: Faramir, Ithilien Ranger
Lore: 'Not while Faramir is Captain... his life is charmed, or fate spares him for some other end.'
Text: Ring-bound. Ranger. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a ranger to heal a Ring-bound companion.

Name: The Witch-king, Deathless Lord
Lore: 'Dead? No, you cannot kill them.'
Text: Fierce. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, wound an ally twice or exert a companion.

Name: Enraged (AI)
Text: Bearer must be an Ent. Limit 1 per bearer. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

Name: Skinbark, Fladrif (AI)
Text: Skinbark's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent or unbound Hobbit you can spot. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, exert Skinbark to prevent that wound.

Name: Don't Look at Them (AI)
Text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot Smeagol and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing once (or twice if that minion is a [WRAITH] minion).

Name: Ancient Roads (AI)
Text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot 3 rangers, the site number of each minion skirmishing a ranger is +2.

Name: Isengard Mechanics (AI)
Text: Regroup: Discard an [ISENGARD] Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion (or 2 companions if you spot 6 companions). Regroup: If this minion is stacked on an [ISENGARD] card, spot an [ISENGARD] Orc and discard this minion to add [3].

Name: Gate Troll (AI)
Text: Fierce. While you can spot a Troll, Gate Troll's twilight cost is -4. For each other [SAURON] minion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

Name: Treebeard, Guardian of the Forest (M)
Text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

Name: Aragorn, Defender of Free Peoples (M)
Text: Skirmish: Remove an [ELVEN] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [ROHAN] token to wound a minion twice.

Name: Merry, Impatient Hobbit (M)
Text: Regroup: Discard Merry to heal a [GANDALF] companion.

Name: The One Ring, The Ruling Ring
Text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

Name: The One Ring, Such a Weight to Carry
Text: Maneuver: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

Name: The One Ring, Such A Weight To Carry (T)
Text: Maneuver: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

Name: Battle Tested
Text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (+4 if you spot a card stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition).

Name: Calculated Risk
Text: Spot a Dwarf and add a threat to draw 3 cards.

Name: Dark Ways
Text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to heal a Dwarf twice and take a [DWARVEN] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Gimli, Faithful Companion
Text: Damage +1. While you have initiative, Gimli is strength +2.

Name: Gimli, Feared Axeman
Text: Damage +1. Response: if a [DWARVEN] condition is about to be discarded by an opponent, exert a Dwarf or discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to prevent that.

Name: Gimli's Armor
Text: Bearer must be Gimli. Response: If you have initiative and Gimli is about to take a wound, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

Name: Gimli's Battle Axe, Trusted Weapon
Text: Bearer must be a dwarf. While you can spot a threat, bearer is damage +1. While you can spot 2 threats, bearer is strength +1. While you can spot 3 threats, the fellowship archery total is +1.

Name: Loyalty Unshaken
Text: When you play this condition, you may stack 2 cards from hand here and draw a card for each [DWARVEN] card you stack. Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2. Also, make that Dwarf damage +2 for each [DWARVEN] card stacked on this condition. Discard this condition.

Name: Out of Darkness
Text: Make a Dwarf strength +2. You may also exert that Dwarf to draw 2 cards.

Name: Preparations
Text: Regroup: Exert a Dwarf companion to stack a card from your discard pile here. Skirmish: Wound a minion skirmishing a Dwarf once for each [DWARVEN] card stacked here. Discard this condition.

Name: Reckless Pride
Text: Bearer must be a [DWARVEN] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Reckless Pride.' Regroup: Discard this condition to draw 4 cards.

Name: Slaked Thirsts
Text: Choose one: Spot a Dwarf to draw a card
column19: or, if this card is stacked on a [DWARVEN] condition, spot a Dwarf companion and discard this event to exert a minion twice.

Name: Ancient Blade
Text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Ancient Blade.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and reconcile your hand.

Name: Arwen, Fair Elf Maiden
Text: While skirmishing a fierce minion, Arwen is strength +3.

Name: Asfaloth, Elven Steed
Text: Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to make each minion skirmishing her strength -2.

Name: Bow of the Galadhrim, Gift of Galadriel
Text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each time you play an [ELVEN] skirmish event during a skirmish involving Legolas, you may heal him.

Name: Careful Study
Text: Spot an Elf and discard 3 cards from hand to reconcile your hand.

Name: Defiance
Text: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Nazgul).

Name: Elrond, Elven Lord
Text: To play, spot Aragorn or an Elf. At the start of each turn, you may exert Elrond to heal a character bearing an artifact.

Name: Hope Comes
Text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Response: If an [ELVEN] skirmish event is played, discard this condition to draw 3 cards.

Name: Into the West
Text: Regroup: Exert an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, remove 3 threats. Place the revealed card beneath your draw deck.

Name: Leaving Forever
Text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a condition or draw 2 cards.

Name: Legolas, Fearless Marksman
Text: Archer. Archery: If you have initiative, discard 4 cards from hand to wound a minion.

Name: Legolas, Nimble Warrior
Text: Archer. Archery: If you cannot spot a threat, add a threat to make the fellowship archery total +1.

Name: Mirkwood Bowman
Text: Exert 2 [ELVEN] companions to discard the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Make the fellowship archery total +1 for each [ELVEN] card discarded.

Name: Shadow Between
Text: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of your regroup phase, you may discard this condition or a card from hand to heal an Elf.

Name: Still Needed
Text: Make an Elf strength +2. You may place this event on top of your draw deck.

Name: Uncertain Paths
Text: Make an Elf strength +2 and you may shuffle your draw deck.

Name: All Save One
Text: Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 and damage +1 if you have initiative).

Name: The Board Is Set
Text: Spell. If an event is played, exert Gandalf to make that opponent remove [2] or cancel that event.

Name: Citadel to Gate
Text: Exert Gandalf twice to remove all threats and to heal all companions of one culture (except [GANDALF]).

Name: Echoes of Valinor
Text: Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may exert him to draw 2 cards.

Name: Fool's Hope
Text: Spot Gandalf and discard 2 cards from hand to make an opponent discard all but 2 Shadow conditions.

Name: Gandalf, Defender of the West
Text: While you cannot spot 3 companions of the same culture, Gandalf is strength -2.

Name: Gandalf, Manager of Wizards
Text: Skirmish: Place 3 cards from hand on top of your draw deck to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -3. Any Shadow player may place 3 cards from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck to prevent this.

Name: Gandalf's Staff, Focus of Power
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 4 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +1.

Name: Glamdring, Elven Blade
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Skirmish: If you have more cards in hand than each opponent, discard 2 cards from hand to make an opponent exert a minion.

Name: Have Patience
Text: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound companion twice.

Name: Intimidate
Text: Spell. If a companion is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf to prevent that wound.

Name: King's Advisor
Text: Exert Gandalf twice to make an opponent exert a minion for each [ROHAN] companion you spot.

Name: Light the Beacons
Text: Exert Gandalf three times (or twice if you have initiative) to make all unbound companions of one culture (except [GANDALF]) strength +3 until the regroup phase.

Name: Moment of Respite
Text: At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard 2 cards from hand to heal Gandalf.

Name: Numenor's Pride
Text: To play, spot Gandalf and add 3 threats. Gandalf is defender +1 and cannot take wounds. Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Peace of Mind
Text: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound Hobbit 3 times.

Name: Sharpen Your Swords
Text: Spot Gandalf to make a [GONDOR] companion strength +1 for each [GONDOR] companion you spot (limit +4).

Name: Stay This Madness
Text: To play, spot Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to wound 2 minions.

Name: Steadfast Champion
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Gandalf.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and heal a companion 3 times.

Name: Terrible and Evil
Notes: If Gandalf is exhausted, he cannot exert to pay the cost of this card, even if X is equal to zero.
Text: Spell. Exert Gandalf X times to wound a minion X times. If that minion is a Nazgul, wound it again.

Name: Undaunted
Text: Exert Gandalf to make him strength +1 for each twilight token you spot (limit +8).

Name: Wizard Staff
Text: Bearer must be a Wizard. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a minion strength -3.

Name: Captured by the Ring
Text: Play Gollum from your draw deck or discard pile to add a threat.

Name: Clever Hobbits
Text: Discard any number of [GOLLUM] conditions. For each condition discarded, make Smeagol strength +3 and damage +1.

Name: Days Growing Dark
Text: Fellowship: Discard 3 cards from hand to play Smeagol from your discard pile.

Name: The Dead City
Text: Stealth. Bearer must be Smeagol. If Smeagol is about to be killed in a skirmish, he is discarded instead.

Name: Fat One Wants It
Text: Each time Gollum or Smeagol is played, add a threat. Regroup: Discard this condition to return Gollum to his owner's hand.

Name: Gollum, Plotting Deceiver
Text: If you have initiative during the Shadow phase, you may play this minion from your discard pile.

Name: Gollum, Vile Creature
Text: Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice or remove a threat to make him strength +2.

Name: Heavy Burden
Text: Regroup: Discard Gollum and remove a threat to add a burden.

Name: Hobbitses Are Dead
Text: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to make a Nazgul, [SAURON] minion, or [GOLLUM] minion strength +2. If you have initiative, you may play this event from your discard pile
column19: place it under your draw deck instead of discarding it.

Name: It's Mine
Text: Shadow: Remove [1] and exert Gollum to discard the top card of your draw deck. If that card is a [GOLLUM] or [WRAITH] card, take it into hand.

Name: Let Her Deal With Them
Text: To play, spot Gollum or Smeagol. Bearer must be a minion. Limit 1 per bearer. Bearer is damage +1. If you have initiative during the Shadow phase, you may play this condition from your discard pile.

Name: Nasty
Text: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each [GOLLUM] card you spot.

Name: Never
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. Regroup: Discard Smeagol to remove 2 threats.

Name: No Safe Places
Text: Exert Smeagol to reveal an opponent's hand. That opponent must discard a card from hand for each culture revealed.

Name: Plotting
Text: To play, spot Gollum and add up to 9 threats. Gollum is strength +2. Discard this condition and remove 9 threats at the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Scouting
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Maneuver: Discard Smeagol to discard a minion. An opponent may exert a minion twice to prevent this.

Name: Secret Paths
Text: To play, spot Smeagol and add 2 threats. The move limit for this turn is +1. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

Name: Serving the Precious
Text: Discard Smeagol to play a companion from your discard pile.

Name: Smeagol, Always Helps
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Assignment: Assign a minion to Smeagol and add 2 threats to exhaust that minion.

Name: Smeagol, Hurried Guide
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from your hand. Smeagol cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

Name: Sneaking!
Text: Stealth. Heal Smeagol (or cancel Smeagol's skirmish if he has more vitality than the minion or minions he is skirmishing).

Name: So Polite
Text: Play Gollum from your discard pile to add [1] for each threat you spot.

Name: Sweeter Meats
Text: If a minion is about to take a wound, spot Gollum to prevent that wound.

Name: Very Nice Friends
Text: Play Smeagol from your discard pile to play the fellowship's next site (replacing an opponent's site if necessary). If you do not move again this turn, discard your hand.

Name: We Hates Them
Text: Bearer must be Smeagol. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to Smeagol.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and play a companion from your discard pile.

Name: Where Shall We Go
Text: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a minion Smeagol is skirmishing twice.

Name: Anduril, Flame of the West
Text: Bearer must be Aragorn. Discard any other weapon he bears. He is damage +1 and cannot bear other weapons. Fellowship or Regroup: If the fellowship is at any site 2 or any site 5, play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

Name: Anduril, Flame of the West (T)
Text: Bearer must be Aragorn. Discard other weapons he bears. He is damage +1 and cannot bear other weapons. Fellowship or Regroup: If the fellowship is at any site 2 or any site 5, play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

Name: Anduril, King's Blade
Text: Bearer must be Aragorn. If you cannot spot a threat, Aragorn is defender +1.

Name: Aragorn, Captain of Gondor
Text: Knight. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add [2] to heal another [GONDOR] companion.

Name: Cirion
Text: While you have only 4 or 5 cards in hand, Cirion is strength +2.

Name: City of Men
Notes: You may discard only one [SAURON] minion for each copy of this card played.
Text: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2. If that Man is skirmishing a [SAURON] minion, discard that minion at the end of the skirmish.

Name: Dagger Strike
Text: Make a [GONDOR] or [SHIRE] companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2 and damage +1.

Name: Denethor, Steward of the City
Text: Fellowship: Play a [GONDOR] knight. That knight's twilight cost is -2. Each time a Shadow card adds a threat, add a burden. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden, add a threat.

Name: Denethor, Wizened Steward
Text: Denethor is strength +1 for each other [GONDOR] Man you can spot (limit +4).

Name: Derufin
Text: Regroup: While you have exactly 5 cards in hand, you may exert Derufin to discard an engine, machine, or possession.

Name: Dervorin
Text: At the start of the regroup phase, if you have only 4 cards in hand, you may spot another [GONDOR] Man to discard a minion.

Name: Duty of Two
Text: Add 3 threats to heal all [GONDOR] companions.

Name: Faramir, Stout Captain
Text: Ranger. To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man. Each time Faramir wins a skirmish involving a fierce minion, you may exert Faramir to discard that minion.

Name: Faramir, Wizard's Pupil
Text: Ranger. Fellowship: Play a [ROHAN] Man to heal Faramir. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make an unbound Hobbit strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to prevent all wounds to Faramir.

Name: First Level
Text: Fortification. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot a knight to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion.

Name: Footman's Armor
Notes: Each time the response for this card is activated, the conditions for being overwhelmed must be checked again.
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Response: if bearer is about to be overwhelmed, discard a [GONDOR] fortification or a card from hand to make bearer strength +2.

Name: Gondor Bow
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If bearer is a knight, he or she is strength +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer to wound a minion he or she is skirmishing if that minion bears a fortification.

Name: Gondor Still Stands
Text: To play, spot 3 [GONDOR] companions. While no opponent controls a site, wound a minion at the start of each regroup phase. Regroup: Discard this condition to place a [GONDOR] fortification from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

Name: Gondorian Captain
Text: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a fortification to remove a threat.

Name: Gondorian Merchant
Text: Maneuver: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to make the site number of a minion +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Gondorian Sword
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to make bearer damage +1.

Name: Great Gate
Text: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 and, if you can spot 2 [GONDOR] fortifications, exert a minion that companion is skirmishing.

Name: Greatest Stronghold
Text: Exert a [GONDOR] Man and spot 3 fortifications to make the fellowship archery total +2.

Name: Guarded
Text: To play, spot 3 [GONDOR] Men. Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion (or all roaming minions).

Name: Hasty Repairs
Text: To play, spot 3 [GONDOR] Men. Regroup: While you have only 4 cards in hand, you may discard 2 cards from hand to play a [GONDOR] fortification from your discard pile.

Name: Hearts Raised
Text: At the start of your regroup phase, you may spot a [GONDOR] Man and discard a card from hand to remove a threat.

Name: Hidden Knowledge
Text: Spot a [GONDOR] companion to reveal the top 5 cards of an opponent's draw deck. For each Shadow card revealed, add a threat. For each Free Peoples card revealed, place a [GONDOR] token on one of your conditions with a [GONDOR] token on it. Shuffle that draw deck.

Name: I Will Go
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If you have initiative, bearer is defender +1.

Name: Ingold
Text: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a fortification to heal Ingold twice.

Name: Iorlas
Text: Response: If a possession or engine is played by your opponent, remove a [GONDOR] token from your condition to make that opponent remove [1]. If he or she cannot, discard that possession or engine.

Name: Knight's Spear
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: If you cannot spot 2 threats, add a threat to make bearer strength +1.

Name: Long Prepared
Text: To play, add 2 threats. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to wound a roaming minion that Man is skirmishing. Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Madril, Faramir's Aide
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a roaming minion Madril is skirmishing.

Name: Man the Walls
Text: The site number of each minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man is +1.

Name: Noble Leaders
Text: When you play this condition, place a [GONDOR] token here for each of the following characters you can spot: Aragorn, Boromir, Denethor or Faramir. Skirmish: Remove a token from here or discard this condition to make a [GONDOR] companion strength +1 and damage +1.

Name: Pippin's Armor
Text: Bearer must be Pippin. While you can spot 3 [GONDOR] Men, Pippin may take no more than 1 wound in a skirmish.

Name: Pippin's Sword
Text: Bearer must be Pippin. Skirmish: Exert Pippin twice to make him strength +1 for each [GONDOR] companion you spot.

Name: Ranger of Minas Tirith
Text: Ranger. While skirmishing a roaming minion, this companion is strength +2 and damage +1.

Name: Ranger of Osgiliath
Text: Ranger. Regroup: Discard 2 cards from hand to exhaust a minion.

Name: Reckless Counter
Text: Spot 2 knights or exert 2 [GONDOR] Men to liberate a site or discard any number of cards from hand.

Name: Second Level
Text: Fortification. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot a ranger to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion.

Name: Seventh Level
Text: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert 3 [GONDOR] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

Name: Stand to Arms
Text: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a roaming minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man twice.

Name: Stout Resistance
Text: Add a threat to make a [GONDOR] Man strength +3.

Name: Strong and Old
Text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. The twilight cost of each of your [GONDOR] fortifications is -1. Response: If an opponent is about to control a site, discard 2 [GONDOR] fortifications to prevent this.

Name: Support of the City
Text: Fellowship: Play a [GONDOR] Man to place a [GONDOR] token here. Fellowship: Play a [GONDOR] companion. That companion's twilight cost is -1 for each token here. Discard this condition.

Name: Targon
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from hand to wound a Man Targon is skirmishing.

Name: Third Level
Text: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot 2 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

Name: Unexpected Visitor
Text: Bearer must be an [GONDOR] companion. Each minion gains this ability: 'Assignment: Assign this minion to bearer of Unexpected Visitor.' Regroup: Discard this condition to discard a minion and remove [4].

Name: Vorondil
Text: While no opponent controls a site, Vorondil is strength +2. Regroup: Exert 3 [GONDOR] Men or 2 knights to liberate a site.

Name: While We Yet Live
Text: Make a roaming minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man strength -3.

Name: Bold Men and Grim
Text: To play, spot 2 [RAIDER] Men and add a threat. Each time a companion is about to be killed, you may remove a threat to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Discard this condition at the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Dark Tidings
Text: Regroup: Spot 2 [RAIDER] Men and remove [3] to add a threat (limit 1).

Name: Desert Fighter
Text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [1] to add a threat.

Name: Desert Nomad
Text: Southron. While you can spot 2 threats, this minion is damage +1.

Name: Desert Runner
Text: Southron. Ambush [1]. When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

Name: Desert Scout
Text: Southron. Ambush [1]. When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

Name: Desert Sneak
Text: Southron. Ambush [1]. When the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a character and you have initiative, you may wound that character.

Name: Desert Soldier
Text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [3] to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

Name: Desert Spearman
Text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [3] to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.

Name: Desert Villain
Text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove [1] to add a threat.

Name: Easterling Aggressor
Text: Easterling. Skirmish: If you have initiative or you spot 3 Easterlings, discard 2 cards from hand to heal another Easterling.

Name: Easterling Assailant
Text: Easterling. Skirmish: Remove a burden and exert this minion to heal another Easterling (or 2 Easterlings if you have initiative).

Name: Easterling Attacker
Text: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

Name: Easterling Blademaster
Text: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

Name: Easterling Footman
Text: Easterling. Maneuver: If you cannot spot 2 burdens, spot another Easterling and discard a card from hand to add a burden.

Name: Easterling Ransacker
Text: Easterling. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make him damage +1.

Name: Easterling Regiment
Text: Easterling. Fierce. Each time Easterling Regiment wins a skirmish, you may add [1] for each burden.

Name: Easterling Sergeant
Text: Easterling. Maneuver: If you cannot spot a burden, spot another Easterling and exert this minion to add a burden.

Name: Easterling Veteran
Text: Easterling. Skirmish: Remove 2 burdens to heal another Easterling.

Name: Fierce in Despair
Text: Spot 2 [RAIDER] Men to discard a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

Name: Great Beasts
Text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Regroup: Remove [9] and spot 3 [RAIDER] Men to make the move limit -1.

Name: Harsh Tongues
Text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Regroup: Remove [3] and spot a [RAIDER] Man to place a [RAIDER] token here. While there are 3 [RAIDER] tokens here, the Shadow has initiative regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

Name: Hosts Still Unfought
Text: To play, spot 2 [RAIDER] Men. Discard any number of cards from hand. The Free Peoples player then discards any number of cards from hand. For each card you discarded more than the Free Peoples player, add [1].

Name: Mumak Commander
Text: Southron. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. While you can spot 6 threats, each time this minion wins a skirmish, the companion he was skirmishing is killed.

Name: Mumakil of the Harad
Text: Spot a [RAIDER] minion to add [2] for each threat.

Name: New Strength Came Now
Text: Make a [RAIDER] Man strength +3 (or +6 if you have initiative).

Name: Raider Bow
Text: Bearer must be a [RAIDER] Man. Bearer is an archer and ambush [5].

Name: Raider Halberd
Text: Bearer must be a [RAIDER] Man. Skirmish: Exert bearer to add [2].

Name: Red Wrath
Text: Exert a [RAIDER] Man to wound a companion he is skirmishing twice.

Name: Rout
Text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert 2 companions if you have initiative.

Name: Small Hope

Text: Regroup: Exert an unbound Hobbit and add a burden to reveal your hand. Place each Free Peoples card revealed this way beneath your draw deck.

Name: Morgai Foothills
Text: When the fellowship moves from site 4[KING], remove [1] for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Regroup: Discard a card from hand for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Discard this condition.

Name: So Fair, So Desperate
Text: If the Shadow has initiative, add a threat to make an unbound Hobbit strength +1 for each [SHIRE] card you spot.

Name: Song of the Shire
Text: Fellowship: Exert a [SHIRE] companion and either a [ROHAN] companion or a [GANDALF] companion to add a [SHIRE] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [SHIRE] token here to prevent an unbound companion from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

Name: Sting, Bane of the Eight Legs
Text: Bearer must be Frodo or Sam. Response: If a fierce skirmish involving bearer is about to end, add a threat to discard a minion involved in that skirmish.

Name: Straining Towards Us
Text: Exert Frodo to remove [1] for each Frodo signet you spot.

Name: Unheeded
Text: If a minion exerts, exert an unbound Hobbit to wound that minion.

Name: We Shall Meet Again Soon
Text: If the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, exert an unbound Hobbit to place a Shadow card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

Name: The Dimholt
Text: Sanctuary. Underground. Fellowship: Add 3 threats to play an enduring companion from your draw deck.

Name: City of the Dead
Text: Underground. Shadow: Remove 2 burdens to play an enduring minion from your draw deck or discard pile.

Name: Crashed Gate
Text: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player must add 3 threats or choose an opponent who may take control of a site.

Name: Osgiliath Channel
Text: River. Regroup: Spot your minion and 6 companions to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn.

Name: Merry, Noble Warrior
Text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] companion. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to make Merry strength +2 for each [ROHAN] companion you spot.

Name: Pippin, Guard of Minas Tirith
Text: To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to wound a minion Pippin is skirmishing twice if that minion bears a fortification.

Name: The One Ring, The Binding Ring
Text: Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play a ring from your draw deck. Maneuver: Exert bearer to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

Name: Freca, Hungry Savage
Text: When you play Freca, you may spot another [DUNLAND] Man to take control of a site. When Freca is killed, the Free Peoples player may liberate a site.

Name: Durin III, Dwarven Lord
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot 2 Dwarves, Durin III is twilight cost -2. Durin III is strength +1 for each artifact and each possession he bears.

Name: Gimli, Bearer of Grudges
Text: Damage +1. While Gimli is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. While Gimli is damage +X, he is resistance +X.

Name: Linnar, Dwarven Lord
Text: Each time a Dwarf wins a fierce skirmish, you may heal that Dwarf. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to make a Dwarf damage +1.

Name: Ring of Accretion
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Maneuver: For each Dwarf you spot, reveal a card from the top of your draw deck. Take all Free Peoples cards revealed into hand and discard the rest. Discard this artifact.

Name: Ring of Fury
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +2. Regroup: Spot a Dwarf that is damage +X to heal X Dwarves. Discard this artifact.

Name: Ring of Guile
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Maneuver: Take a [DWARVEN] event into hand from your discard pile. Discard this artifact.

Name: Ring of Retribution
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, discard this artifact to exert each Orc.

Name: Sindri, Dwarven Lord
Text: You may play [DWARVEN] skirmish events stacked on [DWARVEN] conditions as if from hand.

Name: Uri, Dwarven Lord
Text: Skirmish: If Uri is damage +X, exert him to make him strength +X.

Name: Aiglos
Text: Bearer must be an Elf. If bearer is Gil-galad, he is strength +1 for each [ELVEN] artifact you can spot (limit +6). Regroup: Discard Aiglos to wound a minion for each Elf you spot.

Name: Elven Rope
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be an Elf or Hobbit. Maneuver: Discard this possession to make a Shadow player return a minion with strength 6 or less to its owner's hand.

Name: Galadriel, Bearer of Wisdom
Text: While Galadriel bears an artifact or The One Ring, she is resistance +1 for each [ELVEN] companion you can spot.

Name: Gil-galad, Elven High King
Text: To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Regroup: Exert Gil-Galad to wound each wounded minion.

Name: Glorfindel, Revealed in Wrath
Text: When Glorfindel is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2. Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may exert Glorfindel to make a Nazgul he is skirmishing strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

Name: Knife of the Galadhrim
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If bearer is Aragorn, he may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Skirmish: Discard this weapon to wound a minion bearer is skirmishing.

Name: Merry's Dagger
Text: Bearer must be Merry. Skirmish: Exert Merry twice or discard this possession to wound a minion he is skirmishing. Any Shadow player may remove [1] to prevent this.

Name: Narya, Ring of Fire
Text: Bearer must be Cirdan or Gandalf. Fellowship: Remove X culture tokens, where X is equal to bearer's vitality. Discard this artifact.

Name: Nenya, Ring of Adamant
Text: Bearer must be Galadriel. Maneuver: Heal 2 companions and place up to 2 cards from hand on top of your draw deck. Discard this artifact.

Name: Pippin's Dagger
Text: Bearer must be Pippin. Skirmish: Exert Pippin twice or discard this possession to wound a minion an Elf is skirmishing. Any Shadow player may remove [1] to prevent this.

Name: Strands of Elven Hair
Text: To play, spot a Dwarf. When you play this possession, add 2 [ELVEN] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this possession or remove an [ELVEN] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [DWARVEN] or [ELVEN] card, you may take it into hand.

Name: Vilya, Ring of Air
Text: Bearer must be Elrond or Gil-galad. Skirmish: Discard the top card of your draw deck. Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the discarded card. Discard this artifact.

Name: Ent Draught
Text: To play, spot an Ent. Bearer must be a companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make him or her damage +1.

Name: Huorn
Text: Damage +1. This companion is strength +1 for each Ent you spot. Response: If this companion is about to take a wound, exert an Ent to prevent that.

Name: Radagast, The Brown
Text: The move limit is +1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, each opponent may discard 2 cards to draw 2 cards.

Name: Sent Back
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to discard each minion skirmishing a Wizard. Place that Wizard in your dead pile. Fellowship or Regroup: Play a Wizard (even if another copy of that Wizard is in your dead pile).

Name: Gollum, Dark as Darkness
Text: Shadow: Exert Gollum twice to exert the Ring-bearer. Shadow: Remove a burden to add [1]. Skirmish: Remove a burden to add [2]. Regroup: Remove a burden to add [3]. Regroup: Exert Gollum twice to wound the Ring-bearer.

Name: Slippery as Fishes
Text: While Gollum is at a mountain, river, or underground site, he is strength +2. Regroup: Spot Gollum to reveal your hand. Place all Shadow cards revealed beneath your draw deck. Discard this condition.

Name: Smeagol, Bearer of Great Secrets
Notes: You do not add a burden when you start this card as your Ring-bearer. (Your Ring-bearer is placed on the table, not played.)
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time the fellowship moves, place an unbound companion in the dead pile. Regroup: If Smeagol is the Ring-bearer, add 2 burdens to discard each minion.

Name: Boromir, Bearer of Council
Text: While Boromir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 3 burdens or wound him twice. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, discard each minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Elendil, The Tall
Text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. Fellowship: Play an artifact on Elendil to make the move limit +1 for this turn. Regroup: Discard a [GONDOR] artifact to liberate a site.

Name: Isildur, Bearer of Heirlooms
Text: While Isildur is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or exert 3 companions. While Isildur bears The One Ring or an artifact, each [GONDOR] knight is strength +1.

Name: Narsil, Blade of the Faithful
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. If bearer is Elendil or Isildur, he is strength +1 for each [GONDOR] artifact you can spot (limit +6). Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, exert 2 [GONDOR] Men to prevent that.

Name: Sapling of the White Tree
Text: To play, spot an unbound [GONDOR] Man. Response: If a [GONDOR] Man is about to take a wound, discard this artifact to prevent that.

Name: Scroll of Isildur
Text: Tale.To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man. The Ring-bearer is resistance +1 for each [GONDOR] artifact you can spot (limit +3). Fellowship: Discard this artifact to play a ring from your discard pile.

Name: Seeing Stone of Minas Anor
Text: To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality (or spot a [GONDOR] Man and add 2 threats). Regroup: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or discard this artifact to discard your hand and draw 3 cards.

Name: Seeing Stone of Orthanc
Text: To play, spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality (or spot a [GONDOR] Man and add 2 threats). Regroup: Add a threat or discard this artifact to remove [2] or to draw a card.

Name: Library of Orthanc
Text: Shadow: Play an [ISENGARD] minion to stack the top card of your draw deck on this card. Skirmish: Remove[1] and discard a Free Peoples card stacked here to make an [ISENGARD] minion strength +1. Regroup: Remove [1] to take an [ISENGARD] card stacked here into hand.

Name: Sack of the Shire
Text: If an [ISENGARD] minion wins a skirmish, until the regroup phase, make that minion strength +1 for each site you control and fierce.

Name: Host of Moria, Legion of the Underdeeps
Text: When you play Host of Moria, you may play a [MORIA] card from your discard pile.

Name: Ring of Asperity
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. When you play this artifact, you may wound an unwounded companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

Name: Ring of Ire
Text: Bearer must be The Witch-king. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a [WRAITH] minion damage +1. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

Name: Ring of Rancor
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Maneuver: Remove a burden to heal each Nazgul. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

Name: Horn of the Mark
Text: Bearer must be Merry or Pippin. Bearer gains the Theoden signet. Response: If bearer wins a skirmish, exert him to discard each minion involved in that skirmish.

Name: The Red Arrow
Text: Assignment: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to play a [ROHAN] Man. You may exert that [ROHAN] Man to play a possession on him or her. Discard this artifact.

Name: Ithil Stone
Text: To play, exert a [WRAITH] or [SAURON] minion. At the start of each of your Shadow phases, you may draw a card. Shadow: Discard this artifact to play a [SAURON] minion. Its twilight cost is -3.

Name: Sauron, The Lord of the Rings
Text: Damage +2. Enduring. Fierce. For each burden you spot, threat you spot, and site you control, Sauron's twilight cost is -1.

Name: Bilbo, Bearer of Things Burgled
Text: Ring-bound. Each time the fellowship moves, if the twilight pool has 2 or fewer twilight tokens, add 2 burdens or add [3]. Regroup: Add a burden to play a [SHIRE] tale.

Name: Everyone Knows
Text: Tale. Each unbound Hobbit is strength +1 for each vitality over 3 he or she has. Skirmish: Prevent an unbound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. Discard this condition.

Name: Goldberry, River-daughter
Text: Each time the fellowship moves to a river, heal Goldberry and Tom Bombadil. Skirmish: If the fellowship is at a river, exert Goldberry to make a companion strength +1.

Name: Tom Bombadil, The Master
Text: To play, remove 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: Spot 2 [SHIRE] companions and exert Tom Bombadil X times, where X is the fellowship's site number, to cancel a skirmish involving a [SHIRE] companion.

Name: Great Day, Great Hour
Text: If an opponent plays a minion, exert a Dwarf who is damage +X to exert that minion X times.

Name: Memories of Darkness
Text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each time you lose initiative (except during the fellowship phase), you may play a [DWARVEN] condition from hand or from your discard pile.

Name: More Yet to Come
Text: If a Dwarf kills a minion in a skirmish and that minion did not take all wounds caused by that Dwarf's damage bonus, assign those remaining wounds to minions not assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Aegnor, Elven Escort
Text: Skirmish: Exert Aegnor to make a minion skirmishing an unbound [ELVEN] companion strength -1 for each archer you spot.

Name: Arwen, Echo of Luthien
Text: Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to discard the bottom card of your draw deck. If the bottom card was an [ELVEN] card, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -3.

Name: Arwen, Queen of Elves and Men
Text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -2 for each wounded minion you can spot.

Name: Arwen, Queen of Elves and Men (T)
Text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -2 for each wounded minion you can spot.

Name: Celeborn, Lord of the Galadhrim
Notes: This card's collector's info was misprinted as 10 R 6.
Text: At the start of each skirmish involving Celeborn, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, you may discard it to wound each minion in that skirmish.

Name: Cirdan, The Shipwright
Text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Skirmish: Exert Cirdan to make a minion he is skirmishing strength -1 for each [ELVEN] event in your discard pile.

Name: Elrond, Venerable Lord
Text: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of each skirmish involving Elrond, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, you may heal another Elf.

Name: Elrond, Venerable Lord (T)
Text: To play, spot an Elf. At the start of each skirmish involving Elrond, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, you may heal another Elf.

Name: Fleet-footed
Text: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2. Spot a site in a support area to place this event on top of your draw deck.

Name: Galadriel, Lady Redeemed
Text: When Galadriel is in your starting fellowship, her twilight cost is -3. Fellowship or Regroup: Discard an [ELVEN] event from hand to discard a Shadow condition or Shadow possession.

Name: Glimpse of Fate
Text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Each time you lose initiative, make a minion strength -4 until the regroup phase.

Name: Phial of Galadriel, Star-glass
Text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Skirmish: Until the regroup phase, remove the game text (except card type and race) from a minion skirmishing bearer and make it unable to gain game text. Discard this artifact.

Name: Borne Far Away
Text: Spot your Wizard to exchange a companion in hand with a companion in your dead pile or discard pile.

Name: Brooding on Tomorrow
Text: Each time you lose initiative (except during the fellowship phase), you may spot a [GANDALF] companion to choose an opponent who must discard one of his or her conditions.

Name: Gathering Wind
Text: Exert your Wizard and choose a number. Make each minion with that twilight cost strength -2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Out of the High Airs
Text: If the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, exert your Wizard to discard each minion.

Name: Treebeard, Keeper of the Watchwood
Text: To play, spot 3 [GANDALF] companions. Regroup: Exert Treebeard twice to play a [GANDALF] condition from your discard pile and make an opponent discard one of his or her conditions.

Name: A Dark Shape Sprang
Text: If an opponent plays a possession on a companion, play Gollum at twilight cost -2 from your discard pile or hand to suspend the current phase. Begin a skirmish phase involving Gollum and that companion. When it ends, resume the suspended phase.

Name: Final Strike
Text: Any site 9 is a Mountain. Shadow: If the fellowship is at any site 9, play Gollum from your discard pile. Response: If the Free Peoples player uses a maneuver or archery special ability, exert Gollum to cancel its effect.

Name: Gollum, Mad Thing
Notes: Gollum's game text does not apply if a Shadow player assigns him to a skirmish.
Text: To assign Gollum to a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must make Gollum strength +3 until the regroup phase or add a burden.

Name: Reclaim the Precious
Text: Assignment: Assign Gollum to a companion bearing an artifact. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to prevent this and assign Gollum. Regroup: Exert Gollum twice to discard a possession. Discard this condition.

Name: Shelob, Her Ladyship
Text: Enduring. Fierce. When you play Shelob, if you can spot Gollum, you may spot a companion. That companion cannot be assigned to a skirmish until the end of the turn.

Name: Unabated in Malice
Text: While you have initiative, each [GOLLUM] minion is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [GOLLUM] minion strength +1 for each culture you can spot.

Name: Aragorn, Elessar Telcontar
Text: When you play Aragorn, you may heal another companion. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may exert a companion of one culture to heal a companion of another culture.

Name: Aragorn, Elessar Telcontar (T)
Text: When you play Aragorn, you may heal another companion. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may exert a companion of one culture to heal a companion of another culture.

Name: Cursed of Erech
Text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. When you play Cursed of Erech, exert him twice. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert another [GONDOR] Wraith to make Cursed of Erech defender +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Dead Man of Dunharrow
Text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. When you play this companion, exert him twice.

Name: Denethor, Lord of Minas Tirith
Text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. Fellowship: If at a sanctuary, exert Denethor to take a [GONDOR] card into hand from your draw deck, then reshuffle. Choose an opponent who may draw 2 cards.

Name: Drawing His Eye
Text: For each [GONDOR] companion you spot, reveal 1 card at random from a Shadow player's hand. Choose a revealed Shadow card to be discarded, then its owner draws a card.

Name: End of the Game
Text: Make an exhausted [GONDOR] companion strength +2. If that companion wins this skirmish, heal that companion or make him or her damage +1.

Name: Every Little is a Gain
Text: Spot a [GONDOR] Man to discard a stacked Shadow card or to wound a minion bearing a fortification.

Name: Fifth Level
Text: Fortification. Bearer is strength -1 for each Fortification you can spot. Maneuver: Exert 2 [GONDOR] Men or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition to a minion.

Name: Hardy Garrison
Text: To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men. Each time you lose initiative, you may wound a minion.

Name: Last Throw
Text: If no opponent controls a site, spot 2 [GONDOR] Men to make the move limit +1 for this turn.

Name: Suffered Much Loss
Text: Each site on the adventure path is a battleground. While you have initiative, each Uruk-Hai is strength +1.

Name: Cast Unto the Winds
Text: Regroup: Spot a Southron, remove a threat, and remove [3] to wound an unbound companion.

Name: Corsair Boatswain
Text: Corsair. To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Shadow: Exert this minion to play a [RAIDER] support area possession from your draw deck.

Name: Corsair Brute
Text: Corsair. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove a [RAIDER] token to wound a companion he is skirmishing.

Name: Corsair Ruffian
Text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may spot another corsair and discard the top card of the Free Peoples player's draw deck to add 2 [RAIDER] tokens to a card that already has a [RAIDER] token on it.

Name: Easterling Berserker
Text: Easterling. To play, spot an Easterling. While this minion is unwounded, he is damage +2. Skirmish: Wound 2 other [RAIDER] Men to heal this minion.

Name: Easterling Pillager
Text: Easterling. Fierce. When you play this minion, you may spot another Easterling to add a burden for each companion you spot over 5.

Name: Far Harad Mercenaries
Text: Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may spot 6 companions and another [RAIDER] Man to discard an unbound companion this minion is skirmishing.

Name: Field of the Fallen
Text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. While there is a character in the dead pile, each companion of the same culture as that character is strength -1. Skirmish: Exert your Southron to make him strength +1.

Name: High Vantage
Text: Until the end of the assignment phase, each time a Southron is about to take a wound, prevent that.

Name: Mumak Chieftain
Text: Southron. When you play this minion, you may play a mount on him from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

Name: Quelled
Text: Exert a [RAIDER] Man to discard a Free Peoples condition. If you spot a [ROHAN] Man, discard an additional Free Peoples condition.

Name: Rallying Call
Text: To play, spot a [RAIDER] Man. Threats cannot be removed by Free Peoples cards. Shadow: Remove [1] and play a Southron to add a threat.

Name: Seasoned Leader
Text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is enduring. Skirmish: Remove a threat to play a [RAIDER] condition from your discard pile.

Name: Southron Fanatic
Text: Southron. Each time a Man is assigned to skirmish this minion, wound that Man.

Name: Southron Savage
Text: Southron. While the total number of other minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

Name: Stampeded
Text: If a Free Peoples possession is played, spot a [RAIDER] card to discard that possession. If that possession was a [GONDOR] or [ROHAN] possession, wound an unbound Man.

Name: Under Foot
Text: Shadow: If you have initiative, spot a [RAIDER] Man and discard this condition to reconcile your hand. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [RAIDER] Man strength +2.

Name: Black Marshal
Text: Shadow: Exert a Nazgul and play a [WRAITH] minion to add [1] (or [2] if you have initiative).

Name: Cirith Ungol Scavenger
Text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert it to discard a possession borne by a character this minion is skirmishing.

Name: Cirith Ungol Soldier
Text: Shadow: Spot a possession to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Cirith Ungol Warrior
Text: Shadow: Spot a possession to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Cirith Ungol Watchman
Text: Each companion skirmishing this minion loses all damage and strength bonuses from possessions.

Name: Dark Swooping Shadows
Text: Heal an enduring [WRAITH] minion to add a burden or 2 threats.

Name: Gorbag, Covetous Captain
Text: For each wound on the Ring-bearer, each [WRAITH] Orc is strength +1.

Name: Gorbag's Sword
Text: Bearer must be a [WRAITH] Orc. When you play this possession, you may discard a possession. Its owner may place it on top of his or her draw deck instead. If bearer is Gorbag, he is fierce.

Name: Houses of Lamentation
Text: Make a [WRAITH] minion strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a companion of the same culture as a card in the dead pile).

Name: Morgul Banner-bearer
Text: While the total number of other minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, this minion is strength +3 and an archer.

Name: Morgul Vanguard
Text: Assignment: Assign this minion to an unbound companion bearing a hand weapon.

Name: Stooping to the Kill
Text: While you have initiative, each of your [WRAITH] minions is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [WRAITH] minion strength +2.

Name: Swarming Like Beetles
Text: Maneuver: Spot a [WRAITH] Orc and remove a threat to wound an unwounded companion.

Name: Ten Times Outnumbered
Text: Make a [WRAITH] Orc strength +2 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

Name: Ulaire Cantea, Thrall of the One
Text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Cantea during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Cantea to discard a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing.

Name: Ulaire Enquea, Thrall of the One
Text: Enduring. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Enquea during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: If Ulaire Enquea is skirmishing, heal him to add a burden.

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Thrall of the One
Text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Lemenya during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Lemenya to wound up to 3 other [WRAITH] minions.

Name: Ulaire Nelya, Thrall of the One
Text: Enduring. Fierce. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Nelya during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Nelya to add [1] for each burden.

Name: Ulaire Toldea, Thrall of the One
Text: Enduring. Shadow cards cannot exert Ulaire Toldea during a skirmish phase. Skirmish: Heal Ulaire Toldea to make him damage +1.

Name: Eowyn, Lady of Ithilien
Text: Skirmish: Exert Eowyn to choose an opponent. That opponent must wound a minion for each wound on each minion skirmishing Eowyn.

Name: Fell Deeds Awake
Text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Each time you lose initiative, you may liberate a site.

Name: Unyielding
Text: If your [ROHAN] Man wins a skirmish, discard a [ROHAN] possession to wound a minion or to liberate a site.

Name: Advance Captain
Text: Each roaming [SAURON] minion is damage +1.

Name: Advance Marauder
Text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a roaming [SAURON] minion strength +3.

Name: Advance Regular
Text: Each roaming [SAURON] minion is fierce.

Name: Advance Scout
Text: Shadow: Exert or discard this minion to make each [SAURON] minion you spot roaming until the regroup phase.

Name: Barren Land
Text: To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. Each time the fellowship moves to any site 8 or 9, exert each Ring-bound companion. Shadow: Discard this condition to play a [SAURON] minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

Name: Beaten Back
Text: Make a [SAURON] minion strength +2 for each site you control. If you have initiative, that minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Cirith Ungol Guard
Text: Damage +1.

Name: Cirith Ungol Patroller
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot 3 possessions, this minion is fierce.

Name: Cirith Ungol Sentinel
Text: Damage +1. If you can spot another [SAURON] Uruk-hai, this minion is twilight cost -1 for each possession you can spot.

Name: Cirith Ungol Sentry
Text: Damage +1.

Name: Flames Within
Text: While you have initiative, each of your [SAURON] minions is strength +2. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [SAURON] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is roaming).

Name: Gorgoroth Keeper
Text: Besieger. While you control a site, this minion's twilight cost is -2. Regroup: Stack this minion on a site you control.

Name: Gorgoroth Swarm
Text: Besieger. When you play this minion, you may spot 6 companions and another besieger to play a besieger from your discard pile and control a site.

Name: Gothmog, Lieutenant of Morgul
Text: Besieger. When you play Gothmog, the Free Peoples player must wound a companion for each site you control. While you control a site, Gothmog is fierce.

Name: Gothmog, Lieutenant of Morgul (T)
Text: Besieger. When you play Gothmog, the Free Peoples player must wound a companion for each site you control. While you control a site, Gothmog is fierce.

Name: Gothmog's Warg
Text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Orc. For each site you control, bearer is strength +1 (or +2 if bearer is Gothmog).

Name: Mordor Brute
Text: Each [SAURON] Orc bearing a possession cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

Name: Mordor Fiend
Text: Shadow: If you cannot spot another minion and there are 3 or fewer twilight tokens, add [3] (or [5] if this minion is roaming).

Name: Mordor Pillager
Text: Besieger. Fierce. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot another [SAURON] minion to control a site. If you cannot spot 3 Free Peoples cultures, the Free Peoples player may exert a companion to prevent this.

Name: Mordor Wretch
Text: Shadow: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and exert another [SAURON] minion twice to add [3] and draw a card.

Name: Orc Ravager
Text: To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. Shadow: Remove 2 threats to discard a condition.

Name: Orc Slaughterer
Text: Enduring. For each wound on this minion, it is strength +2.

Name: Rank and File
Text: Each time a roaming [SAURON] minion takes a wound, you may add a [SAURON] token here. Regroup: Exert an Uruk-hai or discard a [SAURON] minion to add a [SAURON] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [SAURON] tokens from here to make a [SAURON] minion strength +2.

Name: The Ring is Mine!
Text: If a burden is added, spot a [SAURON] minion to add an additional burden.

Name: Ruinous Hail
Text: If the Free Peoples player plays a possession, discard a [SAURON] minion from hand to prevent him or her from playing any more cards until the end of this phase.

Name: Shagrat, Captain of Cirith Ungol
Text: Damage +1. Each time Shagrat loses a skirmish, you may exert a character.

Name: Speak No More to Me
Text: Exert a [SAURON] minion to return a Free Peoples condition to its owner's hand (or 2 if both are [SHIRE] conditions).

Name: Troll of Cirith Gorgor
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you can spot.

Name: Uruk Axe
Text: Bearer must be a [SAURON] Minion. If bearer is an Uruk-hai, it is strength +2.

Name: Window of the Eye
Text: To play, spot a [SAURON] minion. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may remove a threat to wound an unbound companion.

Name: Birthday Present
Notes: If the Free Peoples player has only 1 event (or up to 4 copies of the same event, but no other [Shire] events) in his or her discard pile, that event is taken into hand.
Text: Fellowship: Add a burden to choose 2 [SHIRE] events with different card titles from your discard pile. Choose an opponent and make him or her choose 1 of those cards for you to take into hand.

Name: Brave and Loyal
Text: If a Hobbit companion is not assigned to a skirmish, exert that Hobbit to have him or her replace a companion (except the Ring-bearer) in a skirmish.

Name: Chance Observation
Text: If there are 4 or more [SHIRE] cards in your discard pile, make a Hobbit strength +1 for each Hobbit you can spot.

Name: Great Heart
Text: Play this condition only during a skirmish. Bearer must be a Hobbit. When this condition is played, wound a minion skirmishing bearer.

Name: A Light in His Mind
Text: Each time you lose initiative, you may spot 2 [SHIRE] companions to remove a burden.

Name: Make Haste
Text: Stealth. Spot a [SHIRE] companion and return him or her to your hand to make a Shadow player choose to remove [2] or discard a minion.

Name: A Marvel
Text: Exert a Hobbit to make another Hobbit strength +3.

Name: Narrow Escape
Text: Spot 2 Hobbit companions to make a Shadow player discard a minion (or spot 4 Hobbit companions to make that player discard 2 minions).

Name: Nine-fingered Frodo and the Ring of Doom
Text: Tale. Exert a [SHIRE] character to remove a burden or 2 threats.

Name: Orc Armor
Text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Each Orc and each Uruk-hai skirmishing bearer is strength -1.

Name: Shadowplay
Text: To play, spot 2 [SHIRE] companions. Each time a minion is played, you may exert a Hobbit companion to exert that minion (limit once per turn).

Name: Slunk Out of Sight
Text: Stealth. If there are 6 or more [SHIRE] cards in your discard pile, cancel a skirmish involving your Hobbit and a minion who is not fierce. Each minion in that skirmish is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: The Tale of the Great Ring
Text: Tale. Skirmish: Prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless a Shadow event is (or was) played during this skirmish. Discard this condition.

Name: Base of Mindolluin
Text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: If you cannot spot 2 threats, add a threat to play a fortification from your draw deck.

Name: Pelennor Prairie
Text: Plains. Shadow: Exert a minion and remove a burden to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions.

Name: Steward's Tomb
Text: Wounds cannot be prevented or healed. Burdens cannot be removed.

Name: Watchers of Cirith Ungol
Text: Skirmish: Spot your [WRAITH] Orc and remove 2 threats to make that [WRAITH] Orc strength +3.

Name: Frodo, Resolute Hobbit
Text: Ring-bearer (resistance 12).

Name: Sam, Great Elf Warrior
Text: Ring-bound. Sam is strength +1 for each [SHIRE] companion you can spot. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

Name: Sam, Great Elf Warrior (T)
Text: Ring-bound. Sam is strength +1 for each [SHIRE] companion you can spot. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

Name: The One Ring, The Ring of Rings
Text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

Name: The One Ring, The Ring of Rings (T)
Text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

Name: The One Ring, The Ruling Ring
Text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead.

Name: Axe of Khazad-dum
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. While bearer is at a mountain site, he is damage +1.

Name: Battle to the Last
Text: Spot a Dwarf. For each wound on that Dwarf, make him strength +2 and damage +1.

Name: Dwarven Embassy
Text: To play, spot a Dwarf. Each companion is damage +1. Discard this condition at the end of your turn.

Name: Fallen Lord
Text: Exert the Ring-bearer and a Dwarf to make that Dwarf strength +X, where X equals that Dwarf's resistance.

Name: Farin, Emissary of Erebor
Text: While Farin is at a battleground or underground site, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Gimli, Lively Combatant
Text: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

Name: Gimli's Battle Axe, Vicious Weapon
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Skirmish: If bearer is Gimli and he is at a battleground site, exert him to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Grimir, Dwarven Emissary
Text: Response: If a [DWARVEN] companion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 [DWARVEN] cards from play (except characters) to prevent that.

Name: Hall of Our Fathers
Text: When you play this condition, stack the top 8 cards of your draw deck here. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot a Dwarf to exchange the cards stacked here with your hand.

Name: Mountain Homestead
Text: To play, spot 2 Dwarf companions. While the fellowship is at a mountain site, each Dwarf is strength +2.

Name: On Guard
Text: If a Dwarf who has resistance 3 or more is about to take a wound, prevent that.

Name: Well-equipped
Text: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to play a [DWARVEN] possession from your draw deck on a [DWARVEN] companion who has resistance 5 or more.

Name: Arwen, Staunch Defender
Text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -1 for each forest site on the adventure path.

Name: Blade of Lindon
Text: Bearer must be an Elf. While bearer is at a forest or river site, each minion he or she is skirmishing is strength -1.

Name: Elven Marksmanship
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

Name: Elven Scout
Text: While you can spot another Elf, this companion has muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Farewell to Lorien
Text: Spot an Elf to heal each companion who has resistance 5 or more.

Name: The Lady's Blessing
Text: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 at a river site).

Name: Legolas, Companion of the Ring
Text: While Legolas is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +2 and resistance +2.

Name: Legolas, Woodland Emissary
Text: At the start of the archery phase, you may spot another Elf to exert a minion.

Name: Legolas' Bow
Text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer. If bearer is Legolas, each time you exert him to play an [ELVEN] condition or [ELVEN] event, you may heal him (limit once per phase).

Name: Might of the Elf-lords
Text: Exert an Elf to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If that card's twilight cost is 3 or less, make a minion strength -3.

Name: Nocked
Text: Exert an Elf who has resistance 4 or more to wound a minion.

Name: Uncertain Future
Text: When you play this condition, spot an Elf to add 3 [ELVEN] tokens here. Maneuver: Discard this condition or remove an [ELVEN] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may place that card beneath your draw deck.

Name: Woodland Sentinel
Text: While this companion is at a forest site, he is strength +2.

Name: The Art of Gandalf
Text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Regroup: Stack a spell from hand here. Fellowship: Discard a [GANDALF] card from hand to take a card stacked here into hand.

Name: Ease the Burden
Text: Exert a [GANDALF] Wizard to remove a burden (or 2 burdens, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site).

Name: Erland, Dale Counselor
Text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] companion. Skirmish: Exert Erland to take a [GANDALF] skirmish event from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Final Account
Text: To play, exert a [GANDALF] Wizard. Discard 2 cards from hand to take a Free Peoples card and a Shadow card from your discard pile into hand.

Name: G for Grand
Text: While you can spot a [GANDALF] Wizard, each companion who has resistance 6 or more is strength +1.

Name: Gandalf, Leader of the Company
Text: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

Name: Gandalf, Leader of the Company (T)
Text: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

Name: Gandalf's Staff, Ash-Staff
Text: Bearer must be a Wizard. If bearer is Gandalf, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, choose a Shadow player who must wound a minion.

Name: Glamdring, Foe-hammer
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

Name: Inspiration
Text: Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to reveal your hand and make a minion strength -3 for each companion in your hand (or -4 for each if the fellowship is at a battleground site).

Name: New Authority
Text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden, you may remove [3]. Response: If a minion uses its special ability, discard this condition to cancel the effect of that special ability.

Name: New-awakened
Text: Spell. Toil 2. (For each [GANDALF] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to discard 2 conditions from play.

Name: Prolonged Struggle
Text: Exert a [GANDALF] Wizard and spot 2 companions who each have resistance 7 or more to wound a minion that Wizard is skirmishing twice.

Name: Shadowfax, Unequaled Steed
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf is about to take a wound, you may add a burden to prevent that.

Name: Frenzied Attack
Text: If a minion is skirmishing a Free Peoples character who has resistance 2 or less, spot Gollum to wound that character twice.

Name: Gollum, Skulker
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice to make another minion strength +2.

Name: Horribly Strong
Text: Discard Gollum from play to wound an unbound companion who has resistance 6 or less.

Name: Incited
Text: Each time a companion loses a skirmish, you may exert Gollum to take a [GOLLUM] card into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Led Astray
Text: Spot Gollum to add [3] and exchange one of your sites on the adventure path with another site from your adventure deck.

Name: Master Commands It
Text: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 5 or more.

Name: No End of Wickedness
Text: Exert Gollum to make another minion strength +2 (or +3 if Gollum is at a mountain site).

Name: Not Yet Vanquished
Text: Each time a companion loses a fierce skirmish, you may exert Gollum to add a burden.

Name: One Good Turn Deserves Another
Text: Spot Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site. Then you may add a burden to take this card back into hand.

Name: Safe Passage
Text: When you play this condition, name forest, mountain, plains, or river. Each time the fellowship moves to a site that has the named keyword, you may exert Gollum or Smeagol to remove [4].

Name: Smeagol, Scout and Guide
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site. Skirmish: If Smeagol is at a marsh, exert him to cancel a skirmish involving him.

Name: Strange and Terrible
Text: Spot a [GOLLUM] minion at a mountain site to play a minion from your discard pile.

Name: Aragorn, Guide and Protector
Text: Ranger. Each time a Free Peoples skirmish event is played, you may exert Aragorn to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Aragorn, Strider
Text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

Name: Aragorn, Strider (T)
Text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

Name: Armor of the Citadel
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. While bearer is at a battleground site and unwounded, he or she is defender +1.

Name: Battle Cry
Text: Make a ranger strength +2 (or +3 if he or she is skirmishing a minion who has a damage bonus).

Name: Boromir, Hero of Osgiliath
Text: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [GONDOR] companion.

Name: Boromir, Hero of Osgiliath (T)
Text: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [GONDOR] companion.

Name: Bow of Minas Tirith
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. At the start of the archery phase, if bearer is at a battleground site, you may exert him or her to make the fellowship archery total +1.

Name: Gondorian Blade
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is a ranger or at a river site, he or she is damage +1.

Name: The Highest Quality
Text: Exert any number of [GONDOR] companions who have total resistance 12 or more to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] companion strength -3 for each companion exerted this way.

Name: Houses of Healing
Text: When you play this condition, spot a [GONDOR] Man to add 3 [GONDOR] tokens here. Fellowship: Add [2] and either discard this condition or remove a [GONDOR] token from here to heal a [GONDOR] Man.

Name: Madril, Ranger of Ithilien
Text: Ranger. Fellowship: If Madril is at a forest site, exert him to play the fellowship's next site.

Name: Much-needed Rest
Text: Heal each [GONDOR] companion who has resistance 5 or more.

Name: Pledge of Loyalty
Text: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 (or +3 if he or she has resistance 4 or more).

Name: Ranger of Westernesse
Text: Ranger. When you play this companion, you may play the fellowship's next site.

Name: Well-traveled
Text: To play, exert a ranger. If the fellowship is in region 1, play the fellowship's next 2 sites. Otherwise, play the fellowship's next site.

Name: Archer of Harad
Text: Archer. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less, the minion archery total is +1.

Name: Armored Easterling
Text: Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker strength +1. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a lurker damage +1.

Name: Axeman of Harad
Text: While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, this minion's twilight cost is -2.

Name: Bloodthirsty
Text: Spot 2 [MEN] minions to wound an unbound companion.

Name: Bold and Cunning
Text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [MEN] minion to discard a possession from play.

Name: Column of Easterlings
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a [MEN] minion strength +4.

Name: Corps of Harad
Text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is fierce.

Name: Detachment of Haradrim
Text: Maneuver: Exert this minion to add [1] for each companion who has resistance 5 or less.

Name: Easterling Host
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Easterling Host and make it strength -2 until the regroup phase to make each other [MEN] minion strength +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Easterling Shield Wall
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If a [MEN] minion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert this minion and remove [1] to prevent that.

Name: Elder of Dunland
Text: While this minion is at a plains site, it is damage +1.

Name: Elevated Fire
Text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a [MEN] minion to make the minion archery total +3.

Name: Fearsome Dunlending
Text: Ambush [1]. When you play this minion at a plains site, you may spot an unbound companion to make that companion resistance -1 until the end of the turn.

Name: Ferocious Haradrim
Text: Archer. Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, each of your [MEN] minions is strength +3 until the regroup phase.

Name: Fletcher of Harad
Text: While this minion is at a plains site, it is an archer. While you can spot 6 companions, each [MEN] minion is an archer.

Name: Footman of Dunland
Text: The fellowship's current site gains plains.

Name: Force of Harad
Text: When you cannot spot another [MEN] minion, discard this minion.

Name: Harad Standard-bearer
Text: Skirmish: Remove [3] to make this minion damage +1.

Name: Horde of Harad
Text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is fierce.

Name: Invading Haradrim
Text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a skirmish, add [1] for each Free Peoples character who has resistance 5 or less.

Name: Lathspell
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Bearer must be a companion. While bearer is skirmishing a [MEN] minion, bearer loses from possessions all strength and damage bonuses.

Name: Legion of Harad
Text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

Name: Long Battle Bow
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is an archer. When you play this possession, you may make the Free Peoples player exert his or her Man.

Name: Man of Bree
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each card in the Free Peoples player's hand.

Name: Oath Sworn
Text: At the start of the maneuver phase, if you have 2 or more cards in hand, you may spot 2 [MEN] minions and discard your hand to add [8].

Name: Overrun
Text: Make a [MEN] minion strength +2 (or +4 if that minion is at a battleground or plains site).

Name: Patroller of Haradrim
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to a character who has resistance 5 or less, you may discard a possession borne by that character.

Name: Pavise
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. The twilight cost of this possession is -1 for each Free Peoples possession you spot. Bearer cannot take wounds except during a skirmish.

Name: Poleaxe
