Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Skirmish: Remove [2] to make a [MEN] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Precision Targeting
Text: Spot a [MEN] minion to make the minion archery total +1 and make the Free Peoples player choose 3 companions. Other companions cannot take archery wounds.

Name: Raging Dunlending
Text: When you play this minion, you may exert it to make it fierce until the regroup phase. While you can spot 6 companions, each [MEN] minion is fierce.

Name: Rampaging Easterling
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time another [MEN] minion wins a skirmish, make this minion strength +3 until the regroup phase.

Name: Squad of Haradrim
Text: Regroup: Spot another [MEN] minion and 2 Free Peoples characters who each have resistance 5 or less to make the move limit -1 for this turn.

Name: Strange-looking Men
Text: Maneuver: Exert this minion to transfer a possession or condition borne by a character to another eligible bearer.

Name: Swarthy Bree-lander
Text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may remove [2] to transfer a condition borne by a character to another eligible bearer.

Name: Throng of Harad
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a character who has resistance 5 or less, it is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Warrior of Dunland
Text: Ambush [1]. While this minion is at a plains site, it gains an additional ambush [1].

Name: Whistling Death
Text: Wound a character skirmishing a [MEN] minion. If the fellowship is at a battleground site, you may remove [3] to wound that character again.

Name: Wielding the Ring
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

Name: Armed for Battle
Text: Spot your [ORC] minion to play an [ORC] possession from your discard pile (or, if that minion is at a battleground site, from your draw deck or discard pile).

Name: Barbarous Orc
Text: Skirmish: Exert another [ORC] minion to make this minion strength +2 (or +4 if this minion is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less).

Name: Beastly Olog-hai
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Assignment: Exert this minion to assign it to a companion bearing an artifact. The Free Peoples player may discard an artifact from play to prevent this.

Name: Bladed Gauntlets
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] minion. Bearer is a lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert bearer to make an [ORC] minion strength +2.

Name: Bound to its Fate
Text: Spot an [ORC] minion to reveal the Free Peoples player's hand. The Free Peoples player chooses to either discard a revealed Free Peoples event or add a burden.

Name: Champion Orc
Text: Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

Name: Conquered Halls
Text: Make an [ORC] minion strength +1 for each underground site you can spot.

Name: Cutthroat Orc
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 5 or less.

Name: Demoralized
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time a companion exerts, you may add [1] (or [2] if you can spot 6 companions).

Name: Denizen of Khazad-dum
Text: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +2.

Name: Denizen of Moria
Text: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +3.

Name: Denizen of the Black Pit
Text: While this minion is at an underground site, it is strength +2.

Name: Dread and Despair
Text: Spot 2 [ORC] minions to discard a condition from play. The Free Peoples player may discard the top 6 cards of his or her draw deck to prevent this.

Name: Emboldened Orc
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) This minion is strength +1 for each companion who is not assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Entrapping Orc
Text: Assignment: Assign this minion to an unbound companion who has resistance 4 or less.

Name: Foraging Orc
Text: When you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion and a companion who has resistance 3 or less to add [2].

Name: Frenzied Orc
Text: While this minion is at an underground site, each character skirmishing it is strength -2. While you can spot 6 companions, each character skirmishing an [ORC] minion is strength -2.

Name: Goblin Hordes
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, you may take an [ORC] minion from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Goblin Hordes (T)
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, you may take an [ORC] minion from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Hill Orc
Text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert each companion who has resistance 4 or less.

Name: Isengard Underling
Text: When you play this minion, you may take an [ORC] event from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Marauding Orcs
Text: When you cannot spot another [ORC] minion, discard this minion from play.

Name: Mocking Goblin
Text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player discards a Free Peoples event from hand.

Name: Mordor Scimitar
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] minion. Each time bearer is assigned to skirmish a companion, you may exert that companion.

Name: Mountain Orc
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a companion who has resistance 5 or less, exert that companion.

Name: Orc Hammer
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. When you play this possession, you may exert a companion.

Name: Orc Miscreant
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Regroup: Exert this minion to add a burden.

Name: Orkish Smith
Text: When you play this minion, you may take an [ORC] condition from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Orkish Worker
Text: When you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion to reveal the top card of the Free Peoples player's deck. If it is a Shadow card, add (X), where X is its twilight cost.

Name: Persistent Orc
Text: Each time this minion is about to be killed or discarded from play, you may spot another [ORC] card to place this minion on top of your draw deck instead.

Name: Porter Troll
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play this minion, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player reveals a Free Peoples event from his or her hand.

Name: Prowling Orc
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Remove [2] to make an [ORC] minion strength +1.

Name: Scurrying Goblin
Text: When you play this minion at an underground site, you may spot another [ORC] minion to add [2].

Name: Skulking Goblin
Text: The fellowship's current site gains underground.

Name: Spurred to Battle
Text: To play, exert an [ORC] minion. At the start of the Shadow phase, add [1].

Name: Strength in Shadows
Text: Make an [ORC] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is a lurker).

Name: Undisciplined
Text: Toil 3. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3.) Assign an [ORC] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

Name: Unyielding Goblin
Text: Skirmish: If this minion is at an underground site, exert it to exert a companion it is skirmishing.

Name: Watchful Orc
Text: When you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion to replace the fellowship's current site with an underground site from your adventure deck.

Name: Border Patrol
Text: When you play this condition, spot a mounted [ROHAN] Man to add 3 [ROHAN] tokens here. Response: If a minion is played at a plains site, discard this condition or remove a [ROHAN] token from here to exert that minion.

Name: Eomer, Guardian of the Eastmark
Text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, you may exert Eomer to return a minion to its owner's hand.

Name: Eowyn, Shieldmaiden of Rohan
Text: Each time Eowyn wins a skirmish, each other [ROHAN] Man is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Gamling, Defender of the Hornburg
Text: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add [1] to play a possession on Gamling from your draw deck.

Name: Hrothlac, Man of Rohan
Text: Response: If a [ROHAN] companion who has resistance 4 or more is about to take a wound, exert Hrothlac to prevent that.

Name: Protecting the Hall
Text: Toil 2. (For each [ROHAN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Assignment: Discard this condition from play to make bearer defender +1.

Name: Rally Cry
Text: Make a [ROHAN] Man who has resistance 4 or more strength +2 for each wound on each minion he or she is skirmishing.

Name: Riddermark Javelin
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Archery: Discard this possession to make the fellowship archery total +1 (or +2 if the fellowship is at a plains site).

Name: Riddermark Soldier
Text: When you play this companion, each [ROHAN] companion is strength +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Rider's Spear
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is damage +1.

Name: Riders of the Mark
Text: To play, spot 2 [ROHAN] companions. You may play Riders of the Mark any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Riders of the Mark, you may exhaust a minion.

Name: Riding Like the Wind
Text: To play, exert a [ROHAN] Man. While you can spot 2 [ROHAN] mounts, the move limit is +1. Each of your companions that is not mounted is strength -1.

Name: Rohirrim Mount
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. While bearer is at a plains site, he or she is defender +1.

Name: Rush of Steeds
Text: To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Each time a Shadow condition is played, you may exert a minion. Response: If a minion exerts as a cost of its special ability, discard this condition to prevent that and return that minion to its owner's hand.

Name: Sword Rack
Text: Response: If a [ROHAN] possession is discarded from play and no more than one possession is stacked here, stack it here. Fellowship: Add [1] to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

Name: Theoden, King of the Eorlingas
Text: While you can spot a [GANDALF] companion, Theoden gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While Theoden is at a battleground or plains site each [ROHAN] Man is strength +1.

Name: War Now Calls Us
Text: Exert a [ROHAN] companion to make him or her strength +3 (and damage +1 if he or she has resistance 5 or more).

Name: Concerning Hobbits
Text: For each dwelling and forest site on the adventure path, make a Hobbit strength +1.

Name: Crouched Down
Text: Stealth. Cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit and a minion whose strength is lower than that Hobbit's resistance.

Name: Farmer Maggot, Hobbit of the Marish
Text: While Farmer Maggot is at a dwelling or forest site, he is strength +4.

Name: Frodo, Protected by Many
Text: Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. At the start of the regroup phase, you may exert Frodo to make him gain muster until the end of the regroup phase. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Habits of Home
Text: Toil 2. (For each [SHIRE] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Bearer must be a Hobbit. Limit 1 per bearer. Each time the fellowship moves from a dwelling or forest site, remove [1].

Name: Hobbit Sword
Text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

Name: Incognito
Text: Stealth. If the fellowship is at a dwelling site, exert 2 Hobbits to cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, exert 2 Hobbits to make a Hobbit strength +3.

Name: Merry, Loyal Companion
Text: For each other unbound companion assigned to a skirmish, Merry is strength +2.

Name: The More, The Merrier
Text: Toil 2. (For each [SHIRE] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot 2 [SHIRE] companions to remove 2 burdens.

Name: Pippin, Brave Decoy
Text: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, spot an unbound companion who has less resistance than Pippin to have Pippin replace him or her in a skirmish.

Name: Salt from the Shire
Text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is an unbound Hobbit, discard this possession to prevent him or her from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

Name: Sam, Steadfast Friend
Text: Ring-bound. Each other companion is resistance +1.

Name: Sting, Weapon of Heritage
Text: Bearer must be Bilbo, Frodo, or Sam. Maneuver: If bearer is Bilbo or Frodo, exert him to make another companion resistance +2 until the regroup phase. If bearer is Sam, each time he wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

Name: Sworn Companion
Text: Make a Hobbit strength +1 for each companion who has resistance 7 or more.

Name: A Task Now to Be Done
Text: Spot X Hobbits to make an unbound Hobbit resistance +X.

Name: Unharmed
Text: Heal a Hobbit for each minion you spot.

Name: Army of Uruk-hai
Text: Damage +1. Each Free Peoples archer who has resistance 5 or less does not add to the Free Peoples archery total.

Name: Bloodthirsty Uruk
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3.

Name: Brawling Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Response: If a special ability of a companion who has resistance 5 or less is used, exert this minion to cancel its effect.

Name: Brutality
Text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +1 for each battleground site you can spot.

Name: Determined Uruk
Text: To play, spot a [URUK-HAI] minion. Each time a companion exerts, you may draw a card.

Name: Devastation
Text: If your [URUK-HAI] minion wins a skirmish, discard a condition from play.

Name: Feral Uruk
Text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is strength +1 and damage +1.

Name: Force of Uruk-hai
Text: Damage +1. Each time this minion is about to take a wound at a battleground site, you may spot another [URUK-HAI] card to make the Free Peoples player draw a card instead.

Name: Fortitude
Text: When you play this condition, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to add 3 [URUK-HAI] tokens here. Response: If an [URUK-HAI] minion is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove an [URUK-HAI] token from here to prevent that.

Name: Furious Uruk
Text: Damage +1. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each companion and Free Peoples possession loses its special abilities.

Name: Furor
Text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2 (or +3 if you can spot an exhausted companion).

Name: Hounding Uruk
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3.

Name: Intimidating Uruk
Text: Damage +1. When you play this minion at a battleground site, spot an unbound companion to make that companion resistance -2 until the end of the turn.

Name: Invincible Uruk
Text: Damage +1. While this minion is at a battleground site, it cannot take wounds. While you can spot 6 companions, each [URUK-HAI] minion cannot take wounds.

Name: Isengard Siege Bow
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. While bearer is at a battleground site, it is an archer.

Name: Isengard Sword
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. Each character skirmishing bearer is strength -2.

Name: Lookout Uruk
Text: Damage +1. The fellowship's current site gains battleground.

Name: Lurtz, Minion of the White Wizard
Text: Archer. Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Lurtz is strength +3 for each exhausted companion you can spot.

Name: Murderous Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Our Foes Are Weak
Text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. Bearer must be an unbound companion. Limit 1 per bearer.

Name: Overpowering Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While this minion is skirmishing a character who has resistance 3 or less, this minion is strength +3.

Name: Patrol of Uruk-hai
Text: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing a Free Peoples character who has resistance 5 or less, this minion cannot take wounds.

Name: Relentless Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Each time a Free Peoples event is played during a skirmish involving this minion, this minion is strength -2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Ruthless Uruk
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a character who has resistance 3 or less, you may exert this minion to discard a possession borne by that character.

Name: Sentinel Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If an [URUK-HAI] minion is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert or discard this minion to prevent that.

Name: Squad of Uruk-hai
Text: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing a character who has resistance 4 or less, this minion is damage +1.

Name: Swarming Uruk
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot another [URUK-HAI] minion assigned to a skirmish, this minion cannot take wounds.

Name: Tyrannical Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Toil 1. (For each [URUK-HAI] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1.)

Name: Vigilant Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) This minion is strength +2 for each [URUK-HAI] minion not assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Watchman Uruk
Text: Damage +1. When you play this minion at a battleground site, you may draw a card.

Name: Dark Powers Strengthen
Text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to draw 3 cards.

Name: Dark Wings
Text: Each time your [WRAITH] minion wins a skirmish, you may discard this condition to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

Name: Drawn to its Power
Text: Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgul, add a burden.

Name: Hatred Stirred
Text: Each time a companion loses a fierce skirmish involving a [WRAITH] minion, you may shuffle a [WRAITH] card from your discard pile into your draw deck.

Name: Keening Wail
Text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to add a burden.

Name: Lost in the Woods
Text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a companion your Nazgul is skirmishing. Limit 1 per companion. Each [WRAITH] minion skirmishing bearer is strength +1 for each forest site you can spot.

Name: Moving This Way
Text: Shadow: Spot a Nazgul and reveal a Nazgul from hand to place the revealed card beneath your draw deck and draw a card.

Name: The Pale Blade, Sword of Flame
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, each time he wins a skirmish, you may exert him to add a burden.

Name: Riders in Black
Text: Reveal your hand to make a [WRAITH] minion strength +1 for each [WRAITH] minion in your hand.

Name: A Shadow Rises
Notes: When you make this card a minion, move it out of your support area. When this card is no longer a minion, move it back to your support area. For example: if a character bearing Phial of Galadriel, Starglass is skirmishing A Shadow Rises and discards the Phial of Galadriel, A Shadow Rises loses Fierce and can bear other cards. If A Shadow Rises bears cards when its maneuver special ability is used, those cards are discarded.
Text: Maneuver: Remove [5] to make this condition a fierce [WRAITH] minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 10 strength and 3 vitality, and cannot bear other cards. This card is still a condition. At the start of the regroup phase, remove all tokens from here.

Name: Shapes Slowly Advancing
Text: Regroup: Discard your Nazgul from play to add a [WRAITH] token here. The Free Peoples player may return a companion to hand to prevent the placement of that token. When you can spot 4 [WRAITH] tokens on this condition, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

Name: Surrounded by Wraiths
Text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Each time the Free Peoples player plays a companion, that companion is exhausted unless the Free Peoples player pays its twilight cost again.

Name: Ulaire Attea, Second of the Nine Riders
Text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Attea is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Ulaire Attea to add a burden.

Name: Ulaire Cantea, Fourth of the Nine Riders
Text: While Ulaire Cantea is at a forest or dwelling site, he is strength +2 and fierce.

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Fifth of the Nine Riders
Text: Each character skirmishing Ulaire Lemenya who has resistance 5 or less is strength -3.

Name: Ulaire Nelya, Third of the Nine Riders
Text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

Name: Ulaire Nertea, Ninth of the Nine Riders
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) While Ulaire Nertea is at a forest site, he is strength +2. While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgul is strength +2.

Name: Ulaire Otsea, Seventh of the Nine Riders
Text: When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each [WRAITH] card revealed this way into hand.

Name: Ulaire Toldea, Eighth of the Nine Riders
Text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site.

Name: The Witch-king, Captain of the Nine Riders
Text: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: The Witch-king, Captain of the Nine Riders (T)
Text: Fierce. Toil 2. Muster.

Name: Anduin Banks
Text: River. The minion archery total is +2 for each companion in the fellowship over 4.

Name: Anduin Confluence
Text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, discard each ally from play.

Name: Barazinbar
Text: Mountain. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert a Dwarf to play a [DWARVEN] possession from your draw deck.

Name: Buckland Homestead
Text: Dwelling. Shadow: Play a Nazgul to discard a condition from play.

Name: Caras Galadhon
Text: Forest. No more than 1 minion can be assigned to each skirmish.

Name: Cavern Entrance
Text: Underground. Skirmish special abilities cannot be used.

Name: Chamber of Mazarbul
Text: Underground. The Free Peoples player may transfer Free Peoples artifacts and possessions at no twilight cost.

Name: Crags of Emyn Muil
Text: Mountain. If this site is in region 2 when the fellowship moves from it during the regroup phase, wound each companion.

Name: Dammed Gate-stream
Text: Marsh. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may play a [GOLLUM] Free Peoples card from your draw deck.

Name: East Road
Text: Forest. Each companion is twilight cost +2.

Name: Ettenmoors
Text: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your character, (except an enduring character) to make it strength +2.

Name: Expanding Marshland
Text: Marsh. Shadow: If the total number of minions and twilight tokens is 3 or fewer, play a minion at twilight cost -3.

Name: Fangorn Glade
Text: Forest. When the fellowship moves to this site, add [1] for each Free Peoples weapon.

Name: Flats of Rohan
Text: Plains. Each unbound companion skirmishing more than 1 minion is strength +3.

Name: Fortress of Orthanc
Text: Battleground. When the fellowship moves to the site, add 2 for each companion over 5.

Name: Green Dragon Inn
Text: Dwelling. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert 2 Hobbits to play a Hobbit from your draw deck.

Name: Harrowdale
Text: Plains. Until the regroup phase, each minion skirmishing a [ROHAN] companion loses fierce and cannot gain fierce.

Name: Heights of Isengard
Text: Battleground. Each time a [GANDALF] companion wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player may discard a condition from play.

Name: Helm's Gate
Text: Battleground. Each character bearing a hand weapon is strength +2.

Name: Mere of Dead Faces
Text: Marsh. Regroup: Exert your Gollum or your Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site.

Name: Moria Guardroom
Text: Underground. When your fellowship moves from this site, you may spot a Dwarf to draw 2 cards.

Name: Moria Stairway
Text: Underground. Each character bearing a hand weapon is damage +1.

Name: Neekerbreekers' Bog
Text: Marsh. When the fellowship moves to here, heal each character who has resistance 5 or more and exert each other character.

Name: North Undeep
Text: River. The minion archery total is -3.

Name: Old Forest Road
Text: Forest. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may heal 2 Elves.

Name: Osgiliath Reclaimed
Text: Battleground. When the fellowship moves from this site, the Free Peoples player may spot 3 burdens to remove a burden.

Name: Pelennor Fields
Text: Plains. Each [MEN] minion gains ambush 1.

Name: Pelennor Flat
Text: Plains. At the start of the maneuver phase, the Free Peoples player must add a burden or discard 3 cards from hand.

Name: Pinnacle of Zirakzigil
Text: Mountain. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert 3 companions to play a Wizard from your dead pile.

Name: The Prancing Pony
Text: Dwelling. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may add a burden to play a ranger from your draw deck.

Name: Rohan Uplands
Text: Plains. During the archery phase, [URUK] minions cannot take wounds.

Name: Slag Mounds
Text: Battleground. Each time a companion is killed, add a burden.

Name: Stables
Text: At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert a [ROHAN] Man to play a [ROHAN] mount from your draw deck.

Name: Trollshaw Forest
Text: Forest. Each time you play an artifact or possession on your companion, you may draw a card.

Name: Valley of the Silverlode
Text: Dwelling. River. When your fellowship moves to this site, you may heal each Hobbit companion.

Name: Watch-tower of Cirith Ungol
Text: Mountain. Maneuver: Exert your [ORC] minion to discard a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand.

Name: West Gate of Moria
Text: Underground. When the fellowship moves from this site, remove [2].

Name: Westemnet Village
Text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves to this site, the Free Peoples player wounds a companion for each ally.

Name: Window on the West
Text: Underground. Each unwounded [GONDOR] Man is defender +1.

Name: Woody-End
Text: Forest. Shadow: Remove a burden to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

Name: The One Ring, The Ring of Rings (F)
Text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, he or she wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While the Ring-bearer is wearing The One Ring, each time he or she is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

Name: Elven Marksmanship (F)
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

Name: Legolas, Woodland Emissary (F)
Text: At the start of the archery phase, you may spot another Elf to exert a minion.

Name: Glamdring, Foe-hammer (F)
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

Name: Gollum, Skulker (F)
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Gollum twice to make another minion strength +2.

Name: Smeagol, Scout and Guide (F)
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site. Skirmish: If Smeagol is at a marsh, exert him to cancel a skirmish involving him.

Name: Aragorn, Strider (F)
Text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

Name: Bloodthirsty (F)
Text: Spot 2 [MEN] minions to wound an unbound companion.

Name: Fletcher of Harad (F)
Text: While this minion is at a plains site, it is an archer. While you can spot 6 companions, each [MEN] minion is an archer.

Name: Porter Troll (F)
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play this minion, add a burden unless the Free Peoples player reveals a Free Peoples event from his or her hand.

Name: Undisciplined (F)
Text: Toil 3. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3.) Assign an [ORC] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

Name: Gamling, Defender of the Hornburg (F)
Text: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add [1] to play a possession on Gamling from your draw deck.

Name: Sword Rack (F)
Text: Response: If a [ROHAN] possession is discarded from play and no more than one possession is stacked here, stack it here. Fellowship: Add [1] to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

Name: Salt from the Shire (F)
Text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard this possession to remove a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is an unbound Hobbit, discard this possession to prevent him or her from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

Name: Brawling Uruk (F)
Text: Damage +1. Response: If a special ability of a companion who has resistance 5 or less is used, exert this minion to cancel its effect.

Name: Lurtz, Minion of the White Wizard (F)
Text: Archer. Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Lurtz is strength +3 for each exhausted companion you can spot.

Name: The Pale Blade, Sword of Flame (F)
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, each time he wins a skirmish, you may exert him to add a burden.

Name: The Witch-king, Captain of the Nine Riders (F)
Text: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Argument Ready to Hand
Text: Spot a Dwarf to choose a Shadow player who must spot a race. Discard from play all minions of all other races.

Name: Belt of Erebor
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonus. Skirmish: Discard this possession to transfer one of bearer's possessions to another eligible bearer.

Name: A Clamour of Many Voices
Text: Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish in which you played a [DWARVEN] event, you may draw a card.

Name: Durability
Text: Make a Dwarf strength +2. Then, if that Dwarf is at a battleground or mountain site, draw a card.

Name: Dwarven Bracers
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, discard this possession to prevent that wound.

Name: Dwarven Skill
Text: Toil 2. (For each [DWARVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Dwarf strength +3 (or +4 if he has resistance 4 or more).

Name: Dwarven Warrior
Text: When you play this companion during the fellowship phase, choose a Shadow player who must discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

Name: His Father's Charge
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Dwarf strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he is at a mountain or underground site
column19: he has resistance 3 or more
column21: he is skirmishing a fierce minion.

Name: Loud and Strong
Text: Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand and spot a minion skirmishing a Dwarf to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: No Pauses, No Spills
Text: Toil 2. (For each [DWARVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot 2 Dwarves to draw up to 4 cards.

Name: Nobody Tosses a Dwarf
Text: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, make an opponent discard 3 cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

Name: Proud and Able
Text: Each Dwarf is damage +1 for each possession he bears. Fellowship: Discard this condition to play a [DWARVEN] possession from your discard pile.

Name: Sharp Defense
Text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +2 for each possession he bears if he has resistance 4 or more).

Name: Stalwart Support
Text: Each Dwarf gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time the fellowship moves from a plains site, discard a card from your hand.

Name: Thrarin, Smith of Erebor
Text: For each artifact and possession Thrarin bears, he is damage +1.

Name: Attunement
Text: Spot an Elf to reveal cards from the top of your draw deck until you reveal a Shadow card. Make an Elf strength +2 for each card revealed. Place the revealed cards in any order on the bottom of your draw deck.

Name: Elrond, Witness to History
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: If Elrond is skirmishing a minion, exert him to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

Name: Elrond, Witness to History (T)
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: If Elrond is skirmishing a minion, exert him to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

Name: Hadafang
Text: Bearer must be Arwen or Elrond. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him or her to discard a condition from play.

Name: Long-knives of Legolas
Text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each Orc or Uruk-hai skirmishing Legolas is strength -2.

Name: Orophin, Brother of Haldir
Text: While Orophin is at a forest site and you can spot another Elf, Orophin is an archer.

Name: Refuge
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Fellowship: Discard a companion from hand to heal a companion.

Name: Rumil, Brother of Haldir
Text: Maneuver: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, Rumil is an archer until the regroup phase.

Name: Seclusion
Text: Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an Elf companion to discard a condition from play.

Name: Taking the High Ground
Text: Toil 1. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Archery: Discard an [ELVEN] character from hand to make the fellowship archery total +1. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, return your Elf to your hand.

Name: Betrayal of Isengard
Text: Each time an opponent draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the Shadow phase, you may remove [1]. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound Saruman twice.

Name: Discoveries
Text: Toil 3. (For each [GANDALF] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3) Spot a [GANDALF] wizard and X other companions to examine the top X cards of your draw deck. Replace those cards in any order.

Name: Gandalf, The White Rider
Text: Skirmish: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him and another unbound companion skirmishing a minion to make Gandalf strength +3 and have him replace that companion in that skirmish.

Name: Gandalf's Hat
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves from a battleground site, add a burden. Regroup: Add 2 burdens to remove all twilight tokens from the twilight pool.

Name: Introspection
Text: Spell. Choose one: Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to choose an opponent who must discard one of his or her conditions from play
column19: or spot a [GANDALF] Wizard at a battleground site to discard a condition from play.

Name: Jarnsmid, Barding Emissary
Text: At the start of each skirmish involving Jarnsmid, you may remove a burden (or 2 burdens if you can spot another [GANDALF] companion).

Name: Mysterious Wizard
Text: Spell. Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 if you cannot spot 5 burdens).

Name: Salve
Text: Spell. To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Bearer must be a companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound that would kill him or her, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

Name: The Terror of His Coming
Text: Make a [GANDALF] companion strength +2. Then, if that companion is at a battleground or dwelling site, you may take a [GANDALF] condition from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Traveled Leader
Text: Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to replace a site in the fellowship's current region with a site from your adventure deck.

Name: Watch and Wait
Text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] companion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per bearer. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

Name: Watch and Wait (T)
Text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] companion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per bearer. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

Name: With Doom We Come
Text: While Gandalf is at an underground site, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While the fellowship is at a battleground site, each [GANDALF] character gains muster.

Name: Come Away
Text: While you can spot Smeagol, the Shadow number of each site is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound a companion or discard this condition.

Name: From Deep in Shadow
Text: Spot X [GOLLUM] cards to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. You may play a revealed minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

Name: Not Alone
Text: Each time the fellowship moves to a mountain or underground site, you may discard a [GOLLUM] event from hand to take a minion from your discard pile into hand.

Name: There's Another Way
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. Smeagol is strength +1. Regroup: Discard this condition to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

Name: Treacherous Little Toad
Text: To play, spot a [GOLLUM] card. Bearer must be a wounded companion. While you can spot a [GOLLUM] character or a [GOLLUM] card in your support area, bearer cannot heal.

Name: Blade of Gondor, Sword of Boromir
Text: Bearer must be Boromir. He is damage +1. Skirmish: If Boromir is not assigned to a skirmish, discard a [GONDOR] card borne by him to have him replace an unbound Hobbit skirmishing a minion.

Name: Boromir, Defender of Minas Tirith
Notes: This card has the Gandalf signet.
Text: Ranger. Fellowship: Add [2] to heal Boromir.

Name: Concealment
Text: Make a [GONDOR] Man strength +1. If he or she is skirmishing a roaming minion, your opponents cannot use special abilities.

Name: Confronting the Eye
Text: Fellowship: Spot a [GONDOR] Man and add [2] to make each unbound companion strength +1 until the regroup phase (limit +1).

Name: Elendil's Valor
Text: Make a [GONDOR] companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Faramir, Dunadan of Gondor
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make him strength +1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

Name: Faramir's Sword
Text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is damage +1. Each minion skirmishing Faramir at a battleground or forest site is roaming.

Name: Gondorian Steed
Text: Bearer must be a knight. Bearer is damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves from a mountain site, add [2].

Name: Guardian
Text: Toil 2. (For each [GONDOR] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Skirmish: If a [GONDOR] companion is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to have him or her replace an unbound companion skirmishing a minion.

Name: Invigorated
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal a [GONDOR] Man (or to heal 2 [GONDOR] Men if you can spot a roaming minion).

Name: Tireless
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [GONDOR] Man strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is at a battleground site
column19: he or she has resistance 4 or more
column20: he or she is bearing a hand weapon
column21: he or she is skirmishing a roaming minion.

Name: Valorous Leader
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Skirmish: Discard this condition to discard a possession borne by a minion skirmishing bearer.

Name: Saruman, Of Many Colours
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

Name: Saruman, Of Many Colours (T)
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

Name: Brutal Easterling
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish an exhausted companion, it is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Castamir of Umbar, Corsair Vandal
Text: Fierce. Toil 1. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Each wounded [MEN] minion is strength +2.

Name: Corrupted Spy
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each other character you can spot. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, this minion is damage +1. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 0, this minion is fierce.

Name: Countless Companies
Text: Response: If a [MEN] possession is discarded from play, stack it here. Shadow: Remove [1] to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

Name: Covetous Easterling
Text: While this minion is skirmishing a Man, it is damage +2.

Name: Crazed Hillman
Text: Fierce. While this minion is in a fierce skirmish, it is strength +7 (or +10 if it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less).

Name: Crooked Townsman
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each other character you can spot.

Name: Dunlending Zealot
Text: While this minion is exhausted, each unbound companion is resistance -1 (or -2 if the fellowship is at a battleground site).

Name: Easterling Banner-bearer
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each wound on each companion he is skirmishing (or +2 for each if that companion has resistance 2 or less).

Name: Enraged Southron
Text: Ambush [3]. The move limit for this turn is +1.

Name: Frenzied Dunlending
Text: While this minion is bearing a possession, it is fierce.

Name: Gathering Strength
Text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Make a [MEN] minion strength +6.

Name: Goaded to War
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Each time the fellowship moves to a battleground or plains site, add [1].

Name: Grima, Betrayer of Rohan
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, you may exert Grima to exert a companion.

Name: Harrying Hillman
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, add [2].

Name: Hemmed In
Text: While you can spot 6 companions, each companion skirmishing a [MEN] minion loses all strength bonuses from possessions. Maneuver: Spot your [MEN] minion and discard this condition to transfer a Free Peoples possession borne by a companion to another eligible bearer.

Name: Last Days
Text: Each time a [MEN] minion is killed or discarded from play (except during the regroup phase), you may play a [MEN] minion. Its twilight cost is -2, and it is fierce and strength +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Messenger's Mount
Text: Bearer must be The Mouth of Sauron. He is fierce. Response: If a [MEN] minion is about to take a wound, remove [3] to prevent that.

Name: The Mouth of Sauron, Messenger of Mordor
Text: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a [MEN] condition or [MEN] possession from your draw deck.

Name: The Mouth of Sauron, Messenger of Mordor (T)
Text: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a [MEN] condition or [MEN] possession from your draw deck.

Name: Mumak Rider
Text: Archer. When you play this minion to a battleground or plains site, you may spot another [MEN] minion to discard a possession from play.

Name: Poisonous Words
Text: Toil 2. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Add [1] for each [MEN] card you can spot.

Name: Trail of Terror
Text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot 3 [MEN] minions and remove [1] to make each unbound companion resistance -1 until the regroup phase.

Name: War Trident
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. While bearer is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 5 or less, bearer is strength +2. While bearer is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 3 or less, bearer is strength +2.

Name: Wrathful Hillman
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at a plains site, remove [2] or discard this minion.

Name: The Balrog, The Terror of Khazad-dum
Text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

Name: The Balrog, The Terror of Khazad-dum (T)
Text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

Name: Whip of Many Thongs, Weapon of Flame and Shadow
Text: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is fierce. When you play this artifact, the Free Peoples player reveals his or her hand and discards all Free Peoples cards from hand that have a twilight cost of 1 or less.

Name: Abiding Evil
Text: Spot X burdens to make a character skirmishing an [ORC] Orc strength -X.

Name: Barrage
Text: Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Make each of your [ORC] minions strength +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: The Beckoning Shadow
Text: To play, exert an [ORC] minion. If you can spot 5 burdens, and the Free Peoples player has no cards in his or her draw deck, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

Name: Bloodstained Field
Text: Spot an [ORC] lurker to wound an Elf.

Name: Cave Troll of Moria, Savage Menace
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Each time an [ORC] lurker wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

Name: Cave Troll's Hammer, Unwieldy Cudgel
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Troll. When you play this possession, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each lurker you spot.

Name: Goblin Aggressor
Text: While this minion is bearing a possession, each [ORC] minion is strength +1.

Name: Great Cost
Text: At the start of each skirmish involving an [ORC] minion, you may spot 6 companions to exert a companion in that skirmish. Shadow: Discard this condition and spot an [ORC] minion to make the Free Peoples player place a card from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck.

Name: Mordor Aggressor
Text: While this minion is bearing a possession, each [ORC] minion is strength +2.

Name: Morgul Tormentor
Text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

Name: Orc Artisan
Text: Each time you play an [ORC] possession on an [ORC] Orc, you may add [1] (or [2] if that Orc is at a battleground or underground site).

Name: Orc Dreg
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at an underground site, remove [2] or discard this minion.

Name: Orc Footman
Text: When this minion is discarded from play, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to shuffle this minion into your draw deck.

Name: Orc Sapper
Text: When you play this minion, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to prevent that companion from being assigned to this minion until the regroup phase.

Name: Orc Skulker
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each skirmish event you play is twilight cost -1.

Name: Orc Spear
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] minion. When you play this possession on a minion that has a twilight cost of 4 or more, add [2].

Name: Orc Strategist
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Maneuver: Make an [ORC] lurker minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

Name: Orc Tormentor
Text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

Name: Pitiless Orc
Text: When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each companion over 4.

Name: Rallying Orc
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time you play another [ORC] lurker at a battleground or underground site, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion.

Name: Retribution
Text: Each time an [ORC] minion bearing a weapon wins a skirmish, add a burden. Shadow: Discard this condition to play an [ORC] weapon from your discard pile.

Name: Scavenging Goblins
Text: When you play this minion, you may play an [ORC] weapon from your discard pile on your [ORC] Orc.

Name: Storming the Ramparts
Text: Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an [ORC] minion to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions from play.

Name: Taunt
Text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your draw deck (or, if the fellowship is at a battleground site, the top 7 cards) to make an [ORC] minion strength +1 for each [ORC] card revealed.

Name: Troll's Keyward, Keeper of the Beast
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Shadow: Exert Troll's Keyward and reveal your hand to add [1] for each [ORC] Troll revealed.

Name: Vile Goblin
Text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a Dwarf, this minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Aldred, Eored Soldier
Text: At the start of each skirmish involving Aldred, you may discard a possession borne by a minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Cast Out
Text: Toil 2. (For each [ROHAN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Maneuver: Spot a [ROHAN] Man and discard this condition to exert a minion. Maneuver: Spot a mounted [ROHAN] Man and discard this condition to return an exhausted minion to its owner's hand.

Name: Challenging the Orc-host
Text: Make a [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or +1 for each minion you can spot if that companion has resistance 5 or more).

Name: Cleaving a Path
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [ROHAN] companion strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is at a plains site
column19: he or she has resistance 4 or more
column20: he or she is bearing armor
column21: he or she is skirmishing a wounded minion.

Name: Coif
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Each time a Shadow card adds any number of twilight tokens, you may exert bearer to prevent that. Each time the fellowship moves from a forest site, exert a companion.

Name: Eomer, Eored Leader
Text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Eomer to play a [ROHAN] companion from your draw deck.

Name: Eored Warrior
Text: While this companion is at a battleground or plains site, he is strength +3.

Name: For the Mark
Text: Spot a [ROHAN] Man to discard a possession from play. You may exert a [ROHAN] Man who has resistance 3 or more to play this event during the maneuver phase.

Name: Golden Glimmer
Text: Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot a [ROHAN] companion and add 2 burdens to prevent that.

Name: Haethen, Veteran Fighter
Text: Haethen cannot take wounds during fierce skirmishes. Skirmish: Exert Haethen to make him strength +1.

Name: Leofric, Defender of the Mark
Text: Skirmish: If Leofric is in a skirmish, exert him to play a [ROHAN] skirmish event from your draw deck.

Name: The Mouth of Sauron, Lieutenant of Barad-dur
Text: Assignment: Assign The Mouth of Sauron to the companion who has the highest strength. (If two or more are tied for highest, choose one.)

Name: Bilbo, Melancholy Hobbit
Text: Ring-bound. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may exert him to take a [SHIRE] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Diversion
Text: Discard a Hobbit not assigned to a skirmish from play to discard a minion from play. If the fellowship is at a battleground site, you may add 2 burdens to play this event during a skirmish involving a Hobbit.

Name: Flotsam and Jetsam
Text: If a companion (except a Hobbit) wins a skirmish, heal a Hobbit.

Name: Home and Hearth
Text: Each time you play a Hobbit, you may remove a burden. Then, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site, heal the Ring-bearer.

Name: Hope is Kindled
Text: Make a Hobbit strength +2. If that Hobbit wins this skirmish, you may remove a burden.

Name: Long Live the Halflings
Text: To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: If your Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to make each companion who has resistance 7 or more strength +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Measure of Comfort
Text: While you can spot a Hobbit, each unbound companion is resistance +1.

Name: No Worse for Wear
Text: Prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. Then, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site, you may discard 2 cards from hand to return this event to your hand.

Name: Pippin, Hobbit of Some Intelligence
Notes: This card has the Gandalf signet.
Text: When you play Pippin, remove a burden or heal a companion.

Name: A Promise
Text: While you can spot Frodo and Sam and neither is exhausted, each is strength +1.

Name: Rosie Cotton, Barmaid
Text: Sam cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns Rosie Cotton to a skirmish, add 2 burdens.

Name: Simple Living
Text: Response: If you play a [SHIRE] event, discard this condition to heal each Hobbit.

Name: Stand Together
Text: Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, he or she gains muster until the end of the turn. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Sudden Fury
Text: Each time a [SHIRE] companion loses a skirmish, add a [SHIRE] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [SHIRE] token from here to make a [SHIRE] companion strength +1.

Name: Tolman Cotton, Farmer of Bywater
Text: Response: If a burden is about to be added by a Shadow card, spot another Hobbit and exert Tolman Cotton to prevent that.

Name: Advancing Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) When you cannot spot another [URUK-HAI] minion, discard this minion.

Name: Barbaric Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Assignment: Make the Free Peoples player assign this minion to an unwounded companion.

Name: Berserker Torch
Text: Toil 1. (For each [URUK-HAI] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. Bearer is strength +2 for each wound on each character in its skirmish.

Name: Breeding Pit Conscript
Text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) When you play this minion, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.

Name: Broken Heirloom
Text: Toil 2. (For each [URUK-HAI] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to discard a possession borne by a companion who has resistance 4 or less.

Name: Broken in Defeat
Text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2. Then you may spot 6 companions to return this event to your hand.

Name: Crushing Uruk
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If a companion loses a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, exert this minion to discard a possession borne by that companion.

Name: Dark Alliance
Text: Response: If an ally or companion uses a special ability, discard this condition and exert an [URUK-HAI] lurker to prevent that.

Name: Merciless Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to place this minion on the bottom of your draw deck.

Name: Quelling Force
Text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +1 for each other [URUK-HAI] minion you can spot.

Name: Saruman, Agent of the Dark Lord
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2. Each time a companion is killed, you may heal Saruman.

Name: Shingle in a Storm
Text: While you can spot 6 companions, each [URUK-HAI] minion is damage +1. Assignment: Discard this condition to assign an [URUK-HAI] minion to a companion who has resistance 2 or less.

Name: Strange Device
Text: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to draw 3 cards. Then discard 2 cards from hand or discard an [URUK-HAI] minion from hand.

Name: Suppressing Uruk
Text: Damage +1. While there is a companion in the dead pile, each unbound companion is resistance -4.

Name: Tempest of War
Text: While you can spot an [URUK-HAI] minion, each unbound companion is resistance -1 for each condition he or she bears. Skirmish: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion and a companion who has resistance 2 or less to discard from play all conditions in all player's support areas.

Name: Uruk Common
Text: Damage +1. Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at a battleground site, remove [2] or discard this minion.

Name: Uruk Decimator
Text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is strength +2. While this minion is bearing a possession, it is damage +1.

Name: Uruk Desecrator
Text: Damage +1. Each unbound companion is resistance -2 for each wound he or she has.

Name: Uruk Dominator
Text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make it strength +1 for each [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai you spot (or +2 for each if you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less).

Name: Uruk Pikeman
Text: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3 (or +5 if that companion has resistance 4 or less).

Name: Uruk Slaughterer
Text: Damage +1. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, you may discard any number of cards from hand to draw the same number of cards.

Name: Uruk Zealot
Text: Damage +1. To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. Each companion who has resistance 0 is strength -3. Each time Uruk Zealot wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards.

Name: Uruk-hai Guard
Text: Damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion and spot a companion to prevent the Free Peoples player from assigning that companion to this minion.

Name: Uruk-hai Troop
Text: Damage +1. Each character skirmishing this minion looses all strength bonuses from weapons.

Name: Vicious Uruk
Text: Damage +1. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may draw a card for each wound on a character it is skirmishing.

Name: Weapon of Opportunity
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. When you play this possession on a minion that has twilight cost of 4 or more, draw a card.

Name: Worthy of Mordor
Text: At the start of the regroup phase, you may remove [1] to make an [URUK-HAI] minion gain muster until the end of the regroup phase. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Black Rider
Text: Fierce. This minion is strength +1 for each companion you can spot.

Name: Dark Approach
Text: Play a Nazgul. His twilight cost is -1 for each forest site you can spot (limit -4).

Name: Dark Temptation
Text: Each time you play a Nazgul, you may heal the Ring-bearer twice to add a burden.

Name: Echo of Hooves
Text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot your Nazgul at a battleground or forest site to play a mount on him from your draw deck.

Name: In the Ringwraith's Wake
Text: If a Nazgul wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

Name: Lingering Shadow
Text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. Each time a wound is removed from bearer, add a burden.

Name: Minas Morgul Answers
Text: Toil 2. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot a Nazgul to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

Name: Nazgul Blade
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While bearer is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +1.

Name: Sauron's Gaze
Text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgul. The Free Peoples player cannot use bearer's special abilities.

Name: Sense of Obligation
Text: To play, spot a [WRAITH] minion. Bearer must be an unbound companion. Limit 1 per bearer. At the end of each assignment phase, if bearer is not assigned to a skirmish and a companion who does not bear a [WRAITH] condition is, add a burden.

Name: Shadowy Mount
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. While bearer is at a battleground or forest site, he is fierce. Assignment: Make the Free Peoples player assign bearer to an unbound companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

Name: Steed of Mordor
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may draw 2 cards.

Name: Ulaire Attea, Black Predator
Text: Fierce. Skirmish: Remove [2] and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to make Ulaire Attea strength +3.

Name: Ulaire Cantea, Black Assassin
Text: Fierce. Assignment: Assign Ulaire Cantea to a companion who has resistance 0. Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and another [WRAITH] card to kill a companion Ulaire Cantea is skirmishing.

Name: Ulaire Cantea, Black Assassin (T)
Text: Fierce. Assignment: Assign Ulaire Cantea to a companion who has resistance 0. Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and another [WRAITH] card to kill a companion Ulaire Cantea is skirmishing.

Name: Ulaire Enquea, Black Threat
Text: Fierce.Toil 1. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Response: If you are playing a [WRAITH] event that has toil X, exert Ulaire Enquea to reduce that event's twilight cost by X.

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Black Enemy
Text: When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may play a [WRAITH] mount from your discard pile.

Name: Ulaire Nelya, Black Hunter
Text: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Nelya wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

Name: Ulaire Nertea, Black Horseman
Text: The twilight cost of each mount is -1. While Ulaire Nertea is mounted, each Nazgul is strength +1 and has muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

Name: Ulaire Otsea, Black Specter
Text: Shadow: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [WRAITH] condition from hand to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

Name: Ulaire Toldea, Black Shadow
Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Toldea, you may exert him to take a [WRAITH] event from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Unending Life
Text: While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgul is strength +3. Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal a Nazgul.

Name: Unimpeded
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Nazgul strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he is at a battleground or forest site
column19: he is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less
column21: he is in a fierce skirmish.

Name: The Witch-king, Black Lord
Text: Fierce. The Witch-King is twilight cost -1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. Each time a companion is played, you may reveal this card from hand to exert the Ring-bearer.

Name: The Witch-king's Beast, Fell Creature
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, after all skirmishes and fierce skirmishes have been resolved, you may exert him twice to make him participate in one additional assignment and skirmish phase.

Name: The Angle
Text: Forest. Shadow: Play a Nazgul (or spot 6 companions and discard 2 cards from hand) to draw a card.

Name: The Bridge of Khazad-dum
Text: Battleground. Underground. The Balrog is twilight cost -3.

Name: Emyn Muil
Text: Mountain. Maneuver: Remove 2 and exert your minion that is not fierce to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Hill of Sight
Text: Battleground. Forest. While you can spot 3 minions (or 6 companions), each unbound companion is resistance -2.

Name: Hobbiton Market
Text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves from this site, wound each minion that is not a lurker.

Name: Northern Pelennor
Text: Battleground. Plains. Shadow: Make your lurker minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

Name: Shores of Nen Hithoel
Text: River. Shadow: Spot 5 [ORC] Orcs to prevent the fellowship from moving again this turn.

Name: Slopes of Orodruin
Text: Mountain. Shadow: Remove 2 and discard 2 Free Peoples cards from hand to draw a card.

Name: Starkhorn
Text: Mountain. Each time your Dwarf wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

Name: Wold Battlefield
Text: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your Man (except an enduring Man) to make him or her damage +1.

Name: Elrond, Witness to History (F)
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: If Elrond is skirmishing a minion, exert him to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

Name: Hadafang (F)
Text: Bearer must be Arwen or Elrond. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him or her to discard a condition from play.

Name: Gandalf, The White Rider (F)
Text: Skirmish: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him and another unbound companion skirmishing a minion to make Gandalf strength +3 and have him replace that companion in that skirmish.

Name: Faramir, Dunadan of Gondor (F)
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make him strength +1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

Name: Faramir's Sword (F)
Text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is damage +1. Each minion skirmishing Faramir at a battleground or forest site is roaming.

Name: Castamir of Umbar, Corsair Vandal (F)
Text: Fierce. Toil 1. (For each [MEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Each wounded [MEN] minion is strength +2.

Name: Grima, Betrayer of Rohan (F)
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, you may exert Grima to exert a companion.

Name: The Balrog, The Terror of Khazad-dum (F)
Text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

Name: Cave Troll of Moria, Savage Menace (F)
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [ORC] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Each time an [ORC] lurker wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

Name: Orc Artisan (F)
Text: Each time you play an [ORC] possession on an [ORC] Orc, you may add [1] (or [2] if that Orc is at a battleground or underground site).

Name: The Mouth of Sauron, Lieutenant of Barad-dur (F)
Text: Assignment: Assign The Mouth of Sauron to the companion who has the highest strength. (If two or more are tied for highest, choose one.)

Name: Bilbo, Melancholy Hobbit (F)
Text: Ring-bound. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may exert him to take a [SHIRE] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Uruk Zealot (F)
Text: Damage +1. To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. Each companion who has resistance 0 is strength -3. Each time Uruk Zealot wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards.

Name: Dark Approach (F)
Text: Play a Nazgul. His twilight cost is -1 for each forest site you can spot (limit -4).

Name: Ulaire Attea, Black Predator (F)
Text: Fierce. Skirmish: Remove [2] and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to make Ulaire Attea strength +3.

Name: Ulaire Cantea, Black Assassin (F)
Text: Fierce. Assignment: Assign Ulaire Cantea to a companion who has resistance 0. Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and another [WRAITH] card to kill a companion Ulaire Cantea is skirmishing.

Name: Ulaire Enquea, Black Threat (F)
Text: Fierce.Toil 1. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Response: If you are playing a [WRAITH] event that has toil X, exert Ulaire Enquea to reduce that event's twilight cost by X.

Name: The Witch-king, Black Lord (F)
Text: Fierce. The Witch-King is twilight cost -1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. Each time a companion is played, you may reveal this card from hand to exert the Ring-bearer.

Name: Gandalf, The White Rider (O)
Text: Skirmish: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him and another unbound companion skirmishing a minion to make Gandalf strength +3 and have him replace that companion in that skirmish.

Name: Faramir, Dunadan of Gondor (O)
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make him strength +1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

Name: Faramir's Sword (O)
Text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is damage +1. Each minion skirmishing Faramir at a battleground or forest site is roaming.

Name: The Balrog, The Terror of Khazad-dum (O)
Text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

Name: Dark Approach (O)
Text: Play a Nazgul. His twilight cost is -1 for each forest site you can spot (limit +4).

Name: Ulaire Attea, Black Predator (O)
Text: Fierce. Skirmish: Remove [2] and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to make Ulaire Attea strength +3.

Name: Ulaire Cantea, Black Assassin (O)
Text: Fierce. Assignment: Assign Ulaire Cantea to a companion who has resistance 0. Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and another [WRAITH] card to kill a companion Ulaire Cantea is skirmishing.

Name: Ulaire Enquea, Black Threat (O)
Text: Fierce. Toil 1. Response: If you are playing a [WRAITH] event that has toil X, exert Ulaire Enquea to reduce that event's twilight cost by X.

Name: The Witch-king, Black Lord (O)
Text: Fierce. The Witch-king is twilight cost-1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. Each time a companion is played, you may reveal this card from hand to exert the Ring-bearer.

Name: Arod, Rohirrim Steed
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. When you play Arod, you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, remove 2 [DWARVEN] tokens to prevent that.

Name: Awkward Moment
Text: Make a Dwarf strength +3 (or +4 and damage +1 if you can spot a [DWARVEN] token).

Name: Deep Hatred
Text: Each time the fellowship moves, add [2]. Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf who is not assigned to a skirmish to wound 2 Orcs (or to wound 1 Orc twice). Discard this from play if the fellowship is ahead on the adventure path.

Name: Dwarf-lords
Text: You may remove from the game 4 other [DWARVEN] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your Dwarf bearing a hand weapon strength +3.

Name: Gimli, Lord of the Glittering Caves
Text: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each minion assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Gimli and spot a lurker minion to make that minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

Name: Gimli, Lord of the Glittering Caves (T)
Text: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each minion assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Gimli and spot a lurker minion to make that minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

Name: Honoring His Kinfolk
Text: If a Dwarf wins a fierce skirmish, play a [DWARVEN] possession from your discard pile and you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token.

Name: Sorrow Shared
Text: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to heal a Dwarf.

Name: Subterranean Homestead
Text: To play, exert 2 Dwarves. When you play this, add a [DWARVEN] token here for each mountain site and each underground site on the adventure path. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a Shadow player discard the top card of his or her draw deck.

Name: Arwen, Reflection of Luthien
Text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each of your other [ELVEN] companions is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion she is skirmishing strength -1 for each other companion assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Asfaloth, Swift Blossom
Text: Bearer must be an Elf. When you play Asfaloth, you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token. Skirmish: Remove 2 [ELVEN] tokens to heal bearer (or heal bearer and heal another Elf if bearer is in a fierce skirmish).

Name: Celeborn, The Wise
Text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each Elf who has resistance 7 or more gains muster. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may take an [ELVEN] event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: City of the Trees
Text: At the end of your turn, discard this from play if the fellowship did not move more than once this turn. At the start of each skirmish involving an Elf and a wounded minion, you may draw a card.

Name: Crashing Cavalry
Text: Assignment: Discard this from play and assign a minion to an [ELVEN] companion. Those characters cannot use skirmish special abilities until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Final Shot
Text: Make an [ELVEN] companion strength +2 (or +5 if the fellowship has moved more than once this turn).

Name: Galadriel, Sorceress of the Hidden Land
Notes: When you reveal cards from the top of your deck, you reveal one for each forest on theadventure path. For example: if you have three forests, you would reveal the top three cards of your draw deck.
Text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reveal a card from the top of your draw deck for each forest on the adventure path to heal an Elf for each [ELVEN] card revealed.

Name: Inside a Song
Text: Exert an Elf to take an [ELVEN] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile and you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token.

Name: Kindreds Estranged
Text: You may remove from the game 4 other [ELVEN] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make a minion skirmishing your Elf at a forest or river site strength -3.

Name: Legolas, of the Grey Company
Text: Archer. At the start of each archery phase, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, wound a minion.

Name: Let Fly
Text: Spot 3 Elves, spot a Shadow race, and choose a Shadow player to wound each of that player's minions which is not of that race.

Name: Lorien Protector
Text: While another companion is assigned to a skirmish, during each skirmish, prevent all wounds to this companion after the first wound.

Name: Many Miles
Text: Spot 2 Elf archers to make the fellowship archery total +1 (or +2 if a Shadow player has replaced the fellowship's current site this turn).

Name: Secluded Homestead
Text: To play, spot 2 Elves. When you play this, add an [ELVEN] token here for each forest site and each river site on the adventure path. Regroup: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to reconcile your hand.

Name: Shrouded Elf
Text: Response: If you play an event during a skirmish involving this companion, exert this companion to place that event on top of your draw deck.

Name: Sprang Forth Nimbly
Text: Make an Elf strength +1 for each card that has an [ELVEN] token on it.

Name: Standing Tall
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1 for each of the following that is true: it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or more
column19: it is wounded
column20: you can spot an Elf archer
column21: the fellowship is at a forest site.

Name: Take Up the Bow
Text: Toil 2. (For each [ELVEN] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this from play and spot 3 Elf archers to discard a minion from play. Each of those archers loses archer and cannot gain archer.

Name: Wells of Deep Memory
Text: At the end of your turn, discard this from play if the fellowship did not move more than once this turn. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw a card for each of the following you can spot: Arwen, Celeborn, or Galadriel.

Name: Alatar, Final Envoy
Text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may reinforce a [GANDALF] token. While you can spot a [GANDALF] companion, each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1.

Name: Dasron, Merchant from Dorwinion
Text: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may remove 2 Free Peoples culture tokens to take a [GANDALF] event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Fear and Great Wonder
Text: When you play this, add a [GANDALF] token here. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to spot a [GANDALF] companion. That companion gains muster until end of turn.

Name: The Flame of Anor
Text: Spell. Spot 3 [GANDALF] companions to make a minion skirmishing a companion strength -3.

Name: For a While Less Dark
Text: Spell. Make a [GANDALF] companion strength +2 (or +4 if that companion bears a follower).

Name: Gandalf, Bearer of Obligation
Text: While Gandalf is the Ring-bearer, each time the fellowship moves, add 3 burdens unless you spot 2 other companions and discard 2 [GANDALF] cards from hand.

Name: Look to My Coming
Text: You may remove from the game 4 other [GANDALF] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Spot Gandalf to make your [GANDALF] companion strength +3.

Name: No Colour Now
Text: Discard your [GANDALF] condition from play to discard a condition from play and draw a card.

Name: The Palantir of Orthanc, Recovered Seeing Stone
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. To play this, if you can spot The Palantir of Orthanc, discard it. At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add a burden to reveal a Shadow player's hand. He or she must choose a revealed minion and discard it from hand.

Name: Pallando, Far-travelling One
Text: Aid - [2]. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a [GANDALF] companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard a condition from play.

Name: Radagast, Tender of Beasts
Text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) While you can spot 2 [GANDALF] companions, minions skirmishing bearer do not gain strength bonuses from possessions.

Name: Return to Us
Text: Discard 2 Shadow cards from hand to take a [GANDALF] event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Shadowfax, Roaring Wind
Text: Bearer must be a Wizard. When you play Shadowfax, you may reinforce a [GANDALF] token. Skirmish: Remove 2 [GANDALF] tokens to wound a minion skirmishing bearer.

Name: Strange Meeting
Text: Each companion bearing a follower gains muster (and is strength +1 if that companion is a [GANDALF] companion).

Name: Traveler's Homestead
Text: To play, spot a Wizard. When you play this, add X [GANDALF] tokens here, where X is the current region number. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to discard a Shadow condition from play.

Name: Vapour and Steam
Text: Skirmish: Exert your [GANDALF] companion and add a burden to make that companion damage +1.

Name: Chasm's Edge
Text: Gollum is strength +1 for each Ring-bound companion you can spot.

Name: Cunningly Hidden
Text: You may remove from the game 4 [GOLLUM] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Spot Gollum to make a minion strength +2.

Name: Deagol, Fateful Finder
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. Aid - Add a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this from play to play an artifact or possession from your draw deck on bearer.

Name: Deagol, Fateful Finder (T)
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. Aid - Add a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this from play an artifact or possession from your draw deck on bearer.

Name: Duality
Text: Spot Smeagol to choose a Shadow player who must discard a Shadow card from hand or remove [2].

Name: Fishing Boat
