Text: Bearer must be Smeagol. When you play Fishing Boat, you may reinforce a [GOLLUM] token. Each time Smeagol is about to be overwhelmed in a skirmish, you may remove 2 [GOLLUM] tokens to make him strength +2 until the end of that skirmish.

Name: Gladden Homestead
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. When you play this, add a [GOLLUM] token here for each [GOLLUM] card you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to spot a Shadow condition and place that condition on top of its owner's draw deck.

Name: Gollum, Her Sneak
Text: While a card titled Deagol is removed from the game, Gollum is strength +2 and fierce. Shadow: Remove a card titled Deagol in your discard pile from the game to play this minion from your discard pile.

Name: It's My Birthday
Text: Make Gollum strength +2 (or +4 if you can spot Smeagol or Deagol).

Name: Little Snuffler
Text: If the fellowship is in region 1, spot Gollum to wound a companion. If the fellowship is in region 2, spot Gollum to exert a companion. If the fellowship is in region 3, play a [GOLLUM] minion from your discard pile.

Name: Naked Waste
Text: You may remove from the game 4 other [GOLLUM] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Spot Smeagol to make a Ring-bound companion strength +3.

Name: Out of All Knowledge
Text: Spot Smeagol or exert Gollum to make Smeagol strength +2 and you may reinforce a [GOLLUM] token.

Name: Smeagol, Simple Stoor
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. For each card titled Deagol in your discard pile, Smeagol is strength +2 and resistance -1. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may take a [GOLLUM] card from your draw deck and place it in your discard pile.

Name: Softly Up Behind
Text: Spot Smeagol and discard 2 [GOLLUM] cards from hand to return a minion with strength 6 or less to its owner's hand. While this is in your discard pile, Smeagol gains muster.

Name: Trap Is Sprung
Text: To play, discard Gollum from play. Heal the Ring-bearer to add a burden. If the fellowship is not in region 1, you may repeat this for each other wound on the Ring-bearer.

Name: Wild Light of Madness
Text: Spot Gollum to make the Free Peoples player choose to either add a burden or exert a companion.

Name: Aragorn, Isildur's Heir
Text: Aragorn is strength +1 for each [GONDOR] card that has a culture token on it. At the start of each assignment phase, you may exert Aragorn to make an unbound companion that has resistance 7 or more defender +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Away on the Wind
Text: Response: If Faramir is about to take a wound, discard this condition from play and place Boromir or Denethor in the dead pile from play to prevent that and heal Faramir twice.

Name: Banners Blowing
Text: You may remove from the game 4 other [GONDOR] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your [GONDOR] Man strength +3.

Name: Boromir, Doomed Heir
Text: Boromir is resistance -1 for each lurker minion you can spot. Skirmish: Exert Boromir to make him strength +1 for each possession he bears.

Name: Brego, Loyal Steed
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. When you play Brego, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token. Maneuver: Exert bearer and remove 2 [GONDOR] tokens to wound a minion.

Name: Denethor, Last Ruling Steward
Text: Denethor is resistance +1 for each [GONDOR] possession in your discard pile. Maneuver: Spot a [GONDOR] possession borne by a companion and remove that possession from the game to exert a minion twice.

Name: Elendil, High-King of Gondor
Text: Knight. To play, spot 2 [GONDOR] knights or exert 2 [GONDOR] Men. Each of your [GONDOR] companions is resistance +1. Maneuver: Remove a [GONDOR] token to make an unbound companion resistance +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Faramir, Prince of Ithilien
Text: While you can spot Boromir, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While you can spot Denethor, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While Faramir bears a [GONDOR] possession, he is defender +1.

Name: Guard of the White Tree
Text: Knight. Skirmish: Discard a [GONDOR] condition from your support area to make this companion strength +2.

Name: Guarded City
Text: Spot a [GONDOR] companion to reinforce a [GONDOR] token for each possession borne by that companion.

Name: Heirs of Gondor
Text: When you play this, add a [GONDOR] token here. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to make a [GONDOR] companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2.

Name: Hope Renewed
Text: Discard a [GONDOR] possession from play to discard a possession from play and you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

Name: Isildur, Heir of Elendil
Text: Knight. Isildur is resistance +1 for each card in your hand. At the end of any phase, if Isildur has resistance 0, place him in your dead pile. Each time you reconcile, you may draw a card.

Name: Kings' Legacy
Text: Each time Elendil wins a skirmish, make a [GONDOR] or [ELVEN] companion strength +2 until the start of the regroup phase. Each time Isildur wins a skirmish, heal a Man. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, make a [GONDOR] Man damage +1 until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Kingsfoil
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Fellowship: Discard this possession from play to heal a companion and, if that companion is a [SHIRE] companion, you may discard a condition he or she bears.

Name: Rally the Company
Text: Make a [GONDOR] companion strength +2 (or +4 if that companion has resistance 6 or more).

Name: Stewards' Legacy
Text: Each time Denethor exerts, he gains muster until the end of the regroup phase. Each time Boromir exerts, you may exert a minion. Each time Faramir exerts, you may spot a minion to prevent it from using special abilites until the regroup phase.

Name: Storied Homestead
Text: When you play this, add a [GONDOR] token here for each [GONDOR] companion who has resistance 7 or more. Response: If a minion's special ability is used, discard this condition or remove 2 [GONDOR] tokens from here to cancel its effect.

Name: Tradesman From Lebennin
Text: At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add [2] to reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

Name: Alatar Deceived
Text: Each time a Wizard wins a skirmish, this condition becomes a fierce, damage +1 Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 11 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

Name: Pallando Deceived
Text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert a Wizard to make this condition a fierce Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 10 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

Name: Radagast Deceived
Text: Each time a Wizard heals, this condition becomes a fierce Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 12 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

Name: Staff of Saruman, Fallen Istar's Stave
Text: Bearer must be a Wizard. Regroup: If Saruman is the only minion you can spot, discard this artifact from play to return him to your hand.

Name: Bring Down the Wall
Text: Spot a companion to make a [MEN] minion strength +1 for each wound on that companion.

Name: Caravan From the South
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. When you play this, if you spot a plains site on the adventure path, reinforce 3 [MEN] tokens. Each time the Free Peoples player plays the fellowship's next site, you may discard a possession from play.

Name: Corsair Champion
Text: Each time a Free Peoples possession is played, you may spot a [MEN] card and reveal this minion from hand to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion. While each companion is wounded, this minion is fierce.

Name: Cruel Dunlending
Text: Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert him to make another [MEN] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Desert Wind
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. While you can spot 5 or more culture tokens, the minion archery total is +2.

Name: Driven From the Plains
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a [MEN] minion damage +1 for each of the following that is true: it is at a plains site
column19: it is bearing a possession
column20: it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less.

Name: Dunlending Patriarch
Text: When you play this, you may spot another [MEN] minion to make this minion twilight cost -1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. While each companion is wounded, this minion is fierce.

Name: Dunlending Trapper
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved before any others.) To play, spot a [MEN] minion. Assignment: Discard a [MEN] card from your hand to assign this minion to an unbound companion.

Name: Easterling Runner
Text: Shadow: Exert this minion, spot another [MEN] minion, and remove a culture token to reinforce a [MEN] token.

Name: Fires Brightly Burning
Text: You may remove from the game 4 [MEN] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your [MEN] minion strength +2.

Name: Grima, Footman of Saruman
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, you may spot another [MEN] minion to exert each companion.

Name: Harmless
Text: Response: If a companion loses a skirmish involving a [MEN] minion, transfer this condition from your support area to that companion. Limit 1 per companion. Minions cannot take wounds during skirmishes involving bearer.

Name: Howdah
Text: When you play this, add a [MEN] token here for each [MEN] archer you spot. At the start of the archery phase, you may discard this condition from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make the minion archery total +1.

Name: Lying in Wait
Text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to your [MEN] minion. (Limit 1 per bearer.) Bearer is strength +1 for each other [MEN] minion you can spot. Each time a [MEN] minion wins a skirmish, make bearer strength +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Merciless Dunlending
Text: While you can spot another [MEN] minion, this minion is strength +2 for each companion assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Pirate Cutthroat
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] card in your support area. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot a Free Peoples condition to reinforce a [MEN] token for each card you spot that has the same card title as that condition.

Name: Southron Murderer
Text: Archer. While you can spot 4 or more culture tokens, this minion cannot take wounds except during skirmishes.

Name: Stragglers
Text: When you play this, add a [MEN] token here. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to make a [MEN] minion strength +2 for each [MEN] minion not assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Vicious Dunlending
Text: Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert him to make another [MEN] minion damage +1.

Name: Voice of the Desert, Southron Troop
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each [MEN] minion cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, each [MEN] minion is an archer. While the fellowship is in region 3, each [MEN] minion is fierce.

Name: Worn Battleaxe
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. While you can spot a culture token, bearer is strength +1 for each companion assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Always Threatening
Text: When you play this, you may add an [ORC] token here for each [ORC] condition you can spot. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a lurker minion strength +2.

Name: Chamber Patrol
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, [ORC] Orcs cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, the current site gains underground. While the fellowship is in region 3, each [ORC] Orc is strength +2.

Name: Defiled
Text: You may remove from the game 4 [ORC] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your [ORC] lurker minion strength +2.

Name: Enemy Upon Enemy
Text: Regroup: Spot an [ORC] lurker minion to stack that minion here. Shadow: Remove a burden to play a lurker minion stacked here as if from hand. That minion is twilight cost -3.

Name: Expendable Servants
Text: If you can spot more [ORC] conditions than [ORC] minions, you may discard your [ORC] condition from play to play an [ORC] minion from your discard pile.

Name: Forced March
Text: To play, spot 2 [ORC] minions. Regroup: Make the Free Peoples player spot another [ORC] condition, discard it from play, and remove [3] to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn (if the move limit allows). Discard this condition.

Name: Howling Orc
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved before any others.) Each time an [ORC] minion is killed in a skirmish, you may make this minion strength +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Isengard Informant
Text: Regroup: Exert this minion to play an [ORC] Troll from your discard pile.

Name: Massing Strength
Text: Discard any number of your [ORC] minions from play to make an [ORC] minion strength +3 for each one discarded.

Name: Orc Crusher
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each burden. Each time a Ring-bound companion loses a skirmish involving an [ORC] minion, you may reveal this card from hand to add a burden.

Name: Orc Crusher (T)
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each burden. Each time a Ring-bound companion loses a skirmish involving an [ORC] minion, you may reveal this card from hand to add a burden.

Name: Orc Line-breaker
Text: At the end of each skirmish involving this minion, if you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, this minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Orc Plains Runner
Text: Regroup: Discard this minion from play (or exert this minion if the fellowship's next site is an underground site) and spot another [ORC] minion to return that minion to your hand.

Name: Orc Raid Commander
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] card in your support area. When you play this, spot a Free Peoples condition to discard from play each other card that has the same card title as that condition.

Name: Orc Reaper
Text: While you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, each minion that has the title Orc Reaper is strength +2.

Name: Ordnance Grunt
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Shadow: Discard an [ORC] condition from play to play this minion from your discard pile.

Name: Picket Denizen
Text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If another [ORC] minion is about to take a wound, exert this minion to prevent that.

Name: Underdeeps Denizen
Text: While this minion is at an underground site, it cannot take wounds.

Name: Unforgiving Depths
Text: While you can spot 3 underground sites, each [ORC] Orc gains muster. Shadow: Discard this condition from play and spot an [ORC] minion to replace the fellowship's current site with an underground site from your adventure deck.

Name: Whatever Means
Text: Make an [ORC] Orc strength +2 (or +6 if you remove 2 burdens).

Name: Bitter Tidings
Text: If Theoden is about to take a wound in a skirmish, you may discard from play Eomer or Theodred to prevent that. If Theodred is about to take a wound in a skirmish, you may discard from play Eomer or Eowyn to prevent that.

Name: Eomer, Heir to Meduseld
Text: While Eomer bears a mount, he is damage +1. While no other companion is assigned to a skirmish, Eomer is strength +1 for each other [ROHAN] companion you can spot.

Name: Eowyn, Restless Warrior
Text: Each possession you play on Eowyn during the fellowship phase is twilight cost -1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token (or reinforce 2 [ROHAN] tokens if you can spot Eomer or Theoden).

Name: Ferthu Theoden Hal
Text: To play, spot 2 [ROHAN] Men. Unless you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, discard a possession from play.

Name: Firefoot, Mearas of the Mark
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. When you play Firefoot, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token. At the start of the maneuver phase, if bearer is Eomer, you may remove 2 [ROHAN] tokens to make him defender +1 and strength +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Freely Across Our Land
Text: When you play this, add a [ROHAN] token here. Regroup: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to play a [ROHAN] possession from your discard pile on your [ROHAN] companion.

Name: Hama, Captain of the King's Guard
Text: Hama is strength +1 for each Shadow possession you can spot. Each time Hama wins a skirmish, you may discard a possession from play.

Name: Hamstrung
Text: Make a [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or +5 if the fellowship has moved twice this turn).

Name: Hurried Barrows
Text: You may remove from the game 4 other [ROHAN] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your mounted [ROHAN] companion strength +3.

Name: King's Board
Text: Skirmish: Exert Eomer to make Eowyn or Theoden strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Eowyn to make Eomer or Theoden strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Theoden to make Eomer or Eowyn strength +2.

Name: Merchant of Westfold
Text: Each time the fellowship moves, you may add [1] and remove a Free Peoples culture token to reinforce a [ROHAN] token.

Name: Riddermark Tactician
Text: When you play this, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token. Each time a Shadow player replaces the fellowship's current site, you may spot another [ROHAN] Man to make, until the regroup phase, the fellowship archery total +2 and the minion archery total -2.

Name: Ride With Me
Text: Make your [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or exert Theoden to make that companion strength +5 and damage +1 instead.)

Name: Rider's Bow
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, he or she is strength +1. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may choose a Shadow player who must wound one of his or her minions.

Name: Snowmane, Noble Mearas
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. When you play Snowmane, you may reinforce a [ROHAN] token. Skirmish: If bearer is Theoden, you may remove 2 [ROHAN] tokens to exhaust a minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Theoden, The Renowned
Text: While you can spot Eowyn, Theoden is defender +1. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

Name: Theoden, The Renowned (T)
Text: While you can spot Eowyn, Theoden is Defender +1. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

Name: Theodred, Second Marshal of the Mark
Text: While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man who has resistance of 7 or more, Theodred is twilight cost -1. At the start of each skirmish involving Theodred, you may exert each minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Wind-swept Homestead
Text: To play, spot 2 [ROHAN] companions. When you play this, add a [ROHAN] token here for each plains site and each battleground site on the adventure path. At the start of each regroup phase, add a [ROHAN] token here for each of your companions that has muster.

Name: Sauron, Dark Lord of Mordor
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. When you play Sauron, you may exert any number of minions. For each minion you exert, Sauron is twilight cost -X, where X is the current region number.

Name: Sceptre of the Dark Lord
Text: Bearer must be Sauron. He is damage +1. Each time Sauron wins a skirmish and the companion he is skirmishing is not killed, you may assign X wounds to other companions, where X is the current region number.

Name: Bilbo, Aged Ring-bearer
Text: Ring-bound. While Bilbo is not assigned to a skirmish, each Ring-bound Hobbit is strength +1. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may remove a burden for each other Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

Name: Bill the Pony, Dearly-loved
Text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. When you play Bill the Pony, you may reinforce a [SHIRE] token. Regroup: Spot 2 minions and remove 2 [SHIRE] tokens to make a Shadow player discard a minion from play.

Name: Daddy Twofoot, Next-door Neighbor
Text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may take a [SHIRE] event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Don't Let Go
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Hobbit strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is participating in a fierce skirmish
column19: he or she has resistance 7 or more
column20: he or she is at a dwelling site
column21: you can spot an unwounded Hobbit.

Name: Everything but My Bones
Text: You may remove from the game 4 other [SHIRE] cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your Hobbit at a dwelling or forest site strength +3.

Name: Faith in Friendship
Text: When you play this, add a [SHIRE] token here. At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard this from play or remove a token from here to heal a [SHIRE] companion.

Name: Fates Entwined
Text: Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, you may heal another Hobbit once (or heal another Hobbit twice if the Hobbit that won the skirmish was Frodo or Bilbo).

Name: Frodo, Frenzied Fighter
Notes: This version of Frodo cannot become the Ring-bearer.
Text: Ring-bound. While you can spot more minions than companions, Frodo cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. Skirmish: If Frodo is not assigned to a skirmish, exert Frodo to have him replace a Ring-bound companion skirmishing a minion.

Name: Frodo Gamgee, Son of Samwise
Text: Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Ring-bound Hobbit. Bearer is strength +1 for each Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

Name: The Gaffer, Master Gardener
Text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) When you transfer The Gaffer to a [SHIRE] companion, heal bearer (or heal bearer twice if he or she is at a dwelling site.)

Name: Humble Homestead
Text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. When you play this, add a [SHIRE] token here for each forest site and each dwelling site on the adventure path. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 3 tokens from here to cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit.

Name: Mithril-coat, Dwarf-mail
Text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make each minion he is skirmishing lose fierce and unable to gain fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: New Chapter
Text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a follower, you may heal a companion (or heal Sam twice).

Name: Phial of Galadriel, The Light of Earendil
Text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. While bearer is in region 1, bearer gains muster. While bearer is in region 2, each of your [SHIRE] companions gains muster. While bearer is in region 3, each character gains muster.

Name: Sam, Bearer of Great Need
Text: Ring-bound. Sam is resistance +1 for each Hobbit you can spot. Regroup: Exert Sam and transfer a follower he is bearing to your support area to discard a minion from play.

Name: Sam, Bearer of Great Need (T)
Text: Ring-bound. Sam is resistance +1 for each Hobbit you can spot. Regroup: Exert Sam and transfer a follower her is bearing to your support area to discard a minion from play.

Name: Westfarthing Businessman
Text: This companion is strength +1 for each [SHIRE] card that has a culture token on it.

Name: Assault Commander
Text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot a Free Peoples condition to make an unbound companion resistance -1 for each card that has the same card title as that condition.

Name: Assault Denizen
Text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture token you can spot.

Name: Cavern Denizen
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, this minion cannot take wounds except during skirmishes.

Name: Endless Assault
Text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +1 for each of the following that is true: it is at a battleground site
column19: it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less
column21: you can spot an [URUK-HAI] minion not assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Enemy Without Number
Text: To play, spot 2 [URUK-HAI] minions. Shadow: Discard 2 cards from hand to add [1]. Regroup: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion and discard this condition from play to add [3].

Name: Entranced Uruk
Text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Possessions borne by this minion cannot be discarded by Free Peoples cards.

Name: Fearless Approach
Text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. When you play this, if you spot a battleground site on the adventure path, reinforce 3 [URUK-HAI] tokens. Each time the Free Peoples player plays the fellowship's next site, you may discard a condition from play.

Name: Isengard Infiltrator
Text: Damage +1. While the fellowship is at a forest site, the fellowship archery total is -1. Each [ELVEN] companion skirmishing this minion is strength -2.

Name: New Enemy
Text: You may remove from the game 4 [URUK-HAI] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your [URUK-HAI] minion skirmishing a companion with resistance 4 or less strength +2.

Name: Signs of War
Text: While you can spot 3 [URUK-HAI] lurker minions, at the start of each skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] lurker minion, each companion skirmishing that minion must exert.

Name: Uruk Aggressor
Text: Damage +1. When you play this, you may spot a companion who has resistance 0 to make this minion twilight cost -2.

Name: Uruk Blitz
Text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each Uruk-hai is damage +1. While the fellowship is in region 2, each companion is strength -1. While the fellowship is in region 3, each unbound companion is resistance -2.

Name: Uruk Distractor
Text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert it to discard a possession borne by a companion skirmishing another [URUK-HAI] minion.

Name: Uruk Invader
Text: Damage +1. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each companion who has resistance 2 or less.

Name: Uruk Outrider
Text: This minion is damage +1 for each character in the dead pile.

Name: Uruk Reserve
Text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time your [URUK-HAI] minion is about to be killed in a skirmish, you may place that minion on the bottom of your draw deck instead.

Name: Uruk Rogue
Text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If no other minions are assigned to a skirmish, you may exert this minion twice to make it fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.

Name: Uruk Rogue (T)
Text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If no other minions are assigned to a skirmish, exert this minion twice to make it Fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.

Name: Uruk Tactician
Text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a companion skirmishing an [URUK-HAI] lurker minion strength -2.

Name: War Machine
Text: Exert your [URUK-HAI] lurker minion to play an [URUK-HAI] hand weapon from your discard pile on your [URUK-HAI] minion.

Name: Weapons of Control
Text: When you play this, add an [URUK-HAI] token here for each wounded companion. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a companion skirmishing an [URUK-HAI] minion strength -1.

Name: Dark Fell About Him
Text: To play, exert your Nazgul twice and spot an exhausted companion. Heal that companion to add a burden. If the fellowship is not in region 1, you may repeat this for each other wound on that companion.

Name: From Hideous Eyrie
Text: You may remove from the game 4 [WRAITH] cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your Nazgul in a fierce skirmish strength +2.

Name: Shadow in the East
Text: Toil 1. (For each [WRAITH] character you exert when playing this, it is twilight cost -1.) To play, spot a [WRAITH] card in your support area. Spot a companion to draw a card for each wound on that companion (and draw an additional card if you can spot a Nazgul).

Name: They Came From Mordor
Text: When you play this, you may add a [WRAITH] token here for each [WRAITH] card in your support area. Shadow: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to play a [WRAITH] mount from your draw deck on your [WRAITH] minion.

Name: Ulaire Enquea, Sixth of the Nine Riders
Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Enquea, if you can spot 2 other Nazgul, you may exert 2 unbound companions (or exert each companion if you can spot 6 companions).

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Servant of the Shadow
Text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Lemenya and discard a Nazgul from your hand to discard a condition from play.

Name: Ulaire Nertea, Servant of the Shadow
Text: Fierce. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, Ulaire Nertea is twilight cost -2.

Name: Abandoned Mine Shaft
Text: Underground. If this site is not in region 1 when the fellowship moves from here during the regroup phase, add a burden.

Name: Caves of Aglarond
Text: Underground. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may remove 2 burdens.

Name: City of Kings
Text: Battleground. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may draw a card.

Name: Courtyard Parapet
Text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves to this site, the first Shadow player may discard 2 cards from hand to add a burden.

Name: Crossroads of the Fallen Kings
Text: Forest. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may heal a companion of each culture.

Name: Doors of Durin
Text: Marsh. Each companion of a race that has the most companions is strength -1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Fords of Isen
Text: River. Each character is strength +1 for each card borne by that character.

Name: The Great Gates
Text: Battleground. While a player can spot more companions than minions, each minion is strength +1.

Name: Isenwash
Text: Battleground. Plains. At the start of the regroup phase, each Shadow player may exert a minion to exert a companion.

Name: Redhorn Pass
Text: Mountain. Culture tokens cannot be added, removed, or reinforced.

Name: Celeborn, The Wise (F)
Text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each Elf who has resistance 7 or more gains muster. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may take an [ELVEN] event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Galadriel, Sorceress of the Hidden Land (F)
Notes: Legends Series.When you reveal cards from the top of your deck, you reveal one for each forest on theadventure path. For example: if you have three forests, you would reveal the topt hree cards of your draw deck.
Text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reveal a card from the top of your draw deck for each forest on the adventure path to heal an Elf for each [ELVEN] card revealed.

Name: Legolas, of the Grey Company (F)
Text: Archer. At the start of each archery phase, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [ELVEN] card, wound a minion.

Name: Gandalf, Bearer of Obligation (F)
Text: While Gandalf is the Ring-bearer, each time the fellowship moves, add 3 burdens unless you spot 2 other companions and discard 2 [GANDALF] cards from hand.

Name: Pallando, Far-travelling One (F)
Text: Aid - [2]. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a [GANDALF] companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard a condition from play.

Name: Deagol, Fateful Finder (F)
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. Aid - Add a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this from play to play an artifact or possession from your draw deck on bearer.

Name: Aragorn, Isildur's Heir (F)
Text: Aragorn is strength +1 for each [GONDOR] card that has a culture token on it. At the start of each assignment phase, you may exert Aragorn to make an unbound companion that has resistance 7 or more defender +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Denethor, Last Ruling Steward (F)
Text: Denethor is resistance +1 for each [GONDOR] possession in your discard pile. Maneuver: Spot a [GONDOR] possession borne by a companion and remove that possession from the game to exert a minion twice.

Name: Voice of the Desert, Southron Troop (F)
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each [MEN] minion cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, each [MEN] minion is an archer. While the fellowship is in region 3, each [MEN] minion is fierce.

Name: Chamber Patrol (F)
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, [ORC] Orcs cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, the current site gains underground. While the fellowship is in region 3, each [ORC] Orc is strength +2.

Text: While you can spot Eowyn, Theoden is defender +1. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

Text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each Uruk-hai is damage +1. While the fellowship is in region 2, each companion is strength -1. While the fellowship is in region 3, each unbound companion is resistance -2.
