Text: While Eomer bears a mount, he is damage +1. While no other companion is assigned to a skirmish, Eomer is strength +1 for each other [ROHAN] companion you can spot.

Name: Theoden, The Renowned (O)
Text: While you can spot Eowyn, Theoden is Defender +1. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

Name: Dain Ironfoot, King Under the Mountain
Text: Each of your other Dwarves and [GANDALF] Men is twilight cost -1. At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a [DWARVEN] or [GANDALF] condition from play to discard a minion from play.

Name: Elladan, Son of Elrond
Text: Elrohir is twilight cost -2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] event during a skirmish involving Elladan or Elrohir, that event is twilight cost -2.

Name: Elrohir, Son of Elrond
Text: Elladan is twilight cost -2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] event during a skirmish involving Elrohir or Elladan, each minion in that skirmish is strength -2.

Name: Gildor Inglorion, of the House of Finrod
Text: At the start of each archery phase, if you can spot more minions than companions, each of your companions is an archer.

Name: Brand, King of Dale
Text: Each of your Dwarves and other [GANDALF] Men is strength +1. While you can spot more minions than companions, the fellowship archery total is +X, where X is the number of minions minus the number of companions.

Name: Grimbeorn, Beorning Chieftain
Text: At the start of each turn, heal Grimbeorn. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert Grimbeorn twice and discard a minion from hand to make Grimbeorn strength +X until the regroup phase, where X is that minion's strength.

Name: Duilin, Ranger from Blackroot Vale
Text: Ranger. While the fellowship is at a forest or river site, Duilin is strength +3.

Name: Duinhir, Tall Man of Blackroot Vale
Text: While you can spot a mount, Duinhir is damage +1. Each time Duinhir wins a skirmish, if you can spot more minions than companions, you may exert him to discard a minion that has strength 7 or less.

Name: Halbarad, Ranger of the North
Text: Ranger. While the Ring-bearer has resistance 9 or more, Halbarad's twilight cost is -1. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to heal a [GONDOR] companion.

Name: Furious Hillman
Text: Response: If the Free Peoples player plays an event, spot another [MEN] Man and discard this minion from play to cancel that event.

Name: Swarming Hillman
Text: At the start of the regroup phase, if you can spot more Man characters than any other race, make the move limit -1 this turn.

Name: Half-troll of Far Harad
Text: At the start of each assignment phase, if you can spot more companions than minions, you may remove [2] to play an [ORC] Orc from your discard pile.

Name: Horror of Harad
Text: Ambush [1]. Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. Muster. Toil 2.

Name: Uruk-hai Healer
Text: Damage +1. At the start of each assignment phase, you may heal an Uruk-hai for each companion you can spot.

Name: Uruk-hai Scout
Text: Damage +1. When you play this, choose one of the following keywords: battleground, mountain, plains, or underground. The fellowship's current site gains that keyword until the end of the turn.

Name: The One Ring, The Ring of Doom
Text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer gains hunter 3, and each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

Name: The One Ring, The Ruling Ring
Text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

Name: Chamber of Records
Text: When you play this, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 [DWARVEN] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this from play or remove a [DWARVEN] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [DWARVEN] card, take it into your hand, otherwise, place it in your discard pile.

Name: The Fortunes of Balin's Folk
Text: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a [DWARVEN] condition with one or more [DWARVEN] tokens on it into your draw deck. Wound a minion for each [DWARVEN] token that was on that condition.

Name: Gimli, Eager Hunter
Text: Damage +1. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.)

Name: Gloin, Son of Groin
Text: Each time Gloin wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards, then place 3 cards from your hand beneath your draw deck in any order. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to make Gloin strength +2.

Name: Heavy Axe
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. This is twilight cost -1 for each [DWARVEN] card that has a culture token on it. Skirmish: Remove a [DWARVEN] token to make bearer strength +1.

Name: Sturdy Stock
Text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or if you can spot a hunter minion, strength +1 and damage +1 for each hunter minion you can spot).

Name: Well-crafted Armor
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer takes a wound, you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to make bearer damage +1.

Name: Whatever End
Text: Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter [GONDOR] companion or hunter [ELVEN] companion damage +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [DWARVEN] companion strength +2.

Name: Arwen, She-Elf
Text: While you can spot Aragorn, Arwen is strength +1 and resistance +2. Skirmish: Remove an [ELVEN] token to make a minion skirmishing Arwen strength -2.

Name: Dinendal, Mirkwood Archer
Text: Aid - [3]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [3] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, except an [ELVEN] companion, exert bearer. Bearer is an archer.

Name: Elven Bow
Text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

Name: Elven Warrior
Text: While this companion is bearing a possession, he is strength +2. Maneuver: Exert this companion to place an [ELVEN] card from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck.

Name: Focus
Text: Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may heal a hunter [DWARVEN] Dwarf or hunter [GONDOR] Man. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [ELVEN] Elf strength +2.

Name: Gift of the Evenstar, Blessed Light
Text: Each time an Elf wins a skirmish, you may exert that Elf or Aragorn to place an [ELVEN] token here. At the start of each maneuver phase, you may remove an [ELVEN] token here to draw a card.

Name: Haldir, Sentry of the Golden Wood
Text: To play, spot an Elf. While the fellowship is at a battleground site, Haldir is strength +2. While the fellowship is at a forest site, Haldir is an archer.

Name: Legolas, Fleet-footed Hunter
Text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Regroup: Exert 2 hunter companions to draw a card.

Name: Legolas, of the Woodland Realm
Text: Archer. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot. (limit +3)

Name: Lorien's Blessing
Text: Spot an [ELVEN] follower to make the minion archery total -3.

Name: Mighty Shot
Text: Spot an Elf to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each minion with twilight cost 2 or less that you can spot.

Name: The Mirror of Galadriel, Dangerous Guide
Text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.

Name: Point Blank Range
Text: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if you can spot 3 archers).

Name: Spied From Afar
Text: To play, spot 3 Elves. While you can spot an [ELVEN] follower, the twilight cost of each Shadow possession is +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an [ELVEN] companion strength +1 for each archer companion you can spot.

Name: Sword of the Fallen
Text: Bearer must be an Elf. Each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1 for each wound on that minion. Skirmish: Exert bearer to exert a minion skirmishing bearer.

Name: Uruviel, Woodland Maid
Text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add[1] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may exert an Elf to make the fellowship's current site a forest until the end of the turn.

Name: Be Gone!
Text: Spell. Exert your [GANDALF] companion X times to make a minion strength -2 until the regroup phase, for each time that [GANDALF] companion exerted.

Name: Ent Avenger
Text: While you can spot 3 Ents, this companion is strength +2.

Name: Gandalf, Powerful Guide
Text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

Name: Gandalf, Powerful Guide (H)
Text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

Name: Leaflock, Finglas
Text: Leaflock's twilight cost is -1 for each Ent you can spot. While you can spot 4 other Ents, Leaflock is strength +4.

Name: Mellon!
Text: To play, spot 2 [GANDALF] companions. At the start of the maneuver phase, discard this condition to make each player count the number of cards in his or her hand, discard each of them and draw the same number of cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

Name: Momentous Gathering
Text: Choose one: spot an Ent to take a [GANDALF] companion into hand from your draw deck
column19: or spot 2 Ents to take a [GANDALF] companion and a [GANDALF] condition into hand from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

Name: One Last Surprise
Text: Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf's resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion's strength.

Name: Quickbeam, Hastiest of All Ents
Text: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [GANDALF] companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [GANDALF] token.

Name: Shadow of the Wood
Text: This companion is twilight cost -1 for each [GANDALF] companion you can spot. Fellowship: Place this companion in the dead pile to remove [5].

Name: Shepherd of the Trees
Text: While you can spot 4 Ents, this companion is strength +3. Maneuver: Exert this companion to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is a [GANDALF] character, you may play it.

Name: Skinbark, Elder Ent
Text: Skinbark is twilight cost -1 for each [GANDALF] condition you can spot. Each time Skinbark wins a skirmish, you may place a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

Name: Treebeard, Enraged Shepherd
Text: To play, spot 3 [GANDALF] companions. Each time Treebeard wins a skirmish, the first Shadow player must exert X minions, where X is the difference between Treebeard's strength and the losing character's strength.

Name: Called to Mordor
Text: Bearer must be Smeagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each time an opponent uses a skirmish special ability in a skirmish involving Gollum or Smeagol, you may wound a minion.

Name: Connected by Fate
Text: To play, spot Smeagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each Shadow event is twilight cost +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make each Ring-bound companion strength +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Controlled by the Ring
Text: Bearer must be Gollum. Skirmish: If Gollum is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to have him replace a minion skirmishing a companion.

Name: Desperate Move
Text: Discard a [GOLLUM] minion from play to discard a companion. The Free Peoples player may make the move limit -1 this turn to prevent that.

Name: Gollum, Hopeless
Text: At the start of each skirmish involving Gollum, he is strength +X until the end of that skirmish, where X is the Ring-bearer's strength.

Name: Herbs and Stewed Rabbit
Text: While you can spot Frodo, Smeagol is resistance +1. While you can spot Sam, Smeagol is strength +1. While you can spot Bilbo, Smeagol is damage +1.

Name: Hurry Hobbitses
Text: Make Smeagol strength +1 for each Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

Name: Nice Fish
Text: Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, place a [GOLLUM] token here. Regroup: Heal a Ring-bound companion for each token here. Discard this condition.

Name: Not This Time!
Text: Skirmish: Exert Gollum and remove a threat to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing.

Name: Release Them
Text: Spot Smeagol to prevent a Ring-bound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. While this card is in your discard pile, Smeagol is resistance +1.

Name: Smeagol, Wretched and Hungry
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each Ring-bound companion is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Hobbits to make Smeagol strength +1 and prevent him from being overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

Name: Something Slimy
Text: Spot Smeagol to play a Free Peoples condition from your draw deck. If that condition was a [GOLLUM] condition, you may make an opponent place a random card from his or her hand beneath his or her draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

Name: Sudden Strike
Text: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to play a minion from your draw deck. If that minion is a [GOLLUM] minion, you may also play a Shadow possession or Shadow condition from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

Name: Swear By the Precious
Text: Spot Frodo and Smeagol to discard a minion. That minion's owner may make each minion strength -2 until the end of the turn to prevent that.

Name: Unseen Foe
Text: Discard a [GOLLUM] minion from play to wound each companion with strength 8 or more.

Name: Aragorn, Swift Hunter
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make a hunter companion strength +1.

Name: Aragorn, Thorongil
Text: Ranger. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn's.

Name: Aragorn's Bow, Ranger's Longbow
Text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Add a threat to wound a minion with the lowest strength.

Name: Damrod, Dunadan of Gondor
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add [1] to heal a ranger.

Name: Decorated Barricade
Text: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each [GONDOR] ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert 2 [GONDOR] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

Name: Dunedain of the South
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may make a [GONDOR] ranger strength +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Forth the Three Hunters!
Text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

Name: Forth the Three Hunters!
Text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

Name: Forth the Three Hunters!
Text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

Name: Gondorian Prowler
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Remove a [GONDOR] token or exert a [GONDOR] Man to make the site number of a minion +2.

Name: Ithilien Blade
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While you can spot a roaming minion, bearer is strength +1. Maneuver: Exert bearer twice to discard a roaming minion.

Name: Mablung, Ranger of Ithilien
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Mablung to wound a roaming minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Madril, Defender of Osgiliath
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [GONDOR] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: No Quicker Path
Text: Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter [DWARVEN] companion or hunter [ELVEN] companion strength +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [GONDOR] Man strength +2.

Name: No Travellers In This Land
Text: Exert a [GONDOR] Man to wound a minion (or wound that minion twice if it is a hunter).

Name: Portico
Text: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each [GONDOR] ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot 2 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

Name: Ranger's Cloak
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is a ranger or at a forest site, each minion skirmishing bearer is site number +2. Skirmish: Add a threat or exert bearer to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man site number +2.

Name: Silent Traveler
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each skirmish involving this companion and a roaming minion, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

Name: Tremendous Wall
Text: Fortification. Characters skirmishing bearer cannot take wounds from losing a skirmish involving bearer. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot 3 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man.

Name: Unyielding Ranger
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This companion is strength +1 for each roaming minion you can spot.

Name: Bill Ferny, Agent of Saruman
Text: If Bill Ferny is unwounded, the Free Peoples player cannot assign him to skirmish a companion. Shadow: Exert Bill Ferny twice and spot a site you control to add [2].

Name: Bold Easterling
Text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Chieftain of Dunland
Text: Fierce. Skirmish: Spot a site you control and remove [2] to make a [MEN] Man strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 2 sites you control and remove [2] to make a [MEN] Man strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 3 sites you control and remove [2] to make a [MEN] Man strength +4.

Name: Courageous Easterling
Text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Destroyed Homestead
Text: When you play this, spot 2 [MEN] Men to randomly reveal a site from the Free Peoples player's adventure deck. Note its cardtitle. Each site on the adventure path with the same card title as the selected site loses its gametext.

Name: Easterling Scout
Text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Engrossed Hillman
Text: At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot another [MEN] Man and 8 characters (or if you can spot 3 Free Peoples cultures), you may take control of a site.

Name: Enraged Herdsman
Text: While you can spot more companions than minions, each [MEN] hunter is strength +2 and is an archer.

Name: Great Axe
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter companion, bearer is strength +2.

Name: Grieving the Fallen
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] Man. Bearer must be a companion. Bearer cannot take wounds during the archery phase. At the start of the regroup phase, discard this condition.

Name: Grousing Hillman
Text: While you control a site, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

Name: Hunting Herdsman
Text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This minion is strength +3 for each follower you can spot.

Name: Last Gasp
Text: Wound 3 [MEN] archers to exhaust a companion.

Name: Lying Counsel
Text: Exert your [MEN] Man and spot an unbound companion bearing 3 or more cards to return each Free Peoples card that companion bears to its owner's hand. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to discard those cards instead.

Name: Mumak Commander, Giant Among the Swertings
Text: Maneuver: Exert Mumak Commander twice to exert a companion twice (except the Ring-bearer).

Name: Primitive Savage
Text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if he bears a hand weapon, you may take control of a site.

Name: Pursuing Horde
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] Man. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per companion. Each time the fellowship moves, add [1].

Name: Rapid Reload
Text: While you can spot a [MEN] Man, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site in the current region. Archery: Spot a [MEN] Man and remove [3] to exert an unbound companion.

Name: Rapt Hillman
Text: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free People's player may liberate a site. You may spot 3 Men to prevent this. Maneuver: Spot another [MEN] Man and exert this minion to take control of a site.

Name: Ravaging Wild Man
Text: While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 [MEN] Men to discard a follower.

Name: Savage Southron
Text: Maneuver: If the Free People's player has at least 1 site in his or her adventure deck, exert 2 [MEN] Men to randomly choose a site from that deck. Replace the fellowship's current site with that site.

Name: Swarthy Hillman
Text: While you control a site, this minion is an archer.

Name: Wandering Hillman
Text: To play, spot a [MEN] Man. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3. Maneuver: Remove 2 burdens or 2 threats to control a site.

Name: Battlefield Recruit
Text: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +2.

Name: Battlefield Veteran
Text: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +1.

Name: Beasts of Burden
Text: To play, spot 2 [ORC] minions. At the start of your Shadow phase, you may discard an [ORC] condition from play to play an [ORC] minion. It is twilight cost -2 (or -4 if you can spot 6 or more companions).

Name: Black Gate Sentry
Text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

Name: Black Land Chieftain
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play Black Land Chieftain, you may add a threat for each Free Peoples possession and each Free Peoples artifact you can spot.

Name: Black Land Commander
Text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Skirmish: Remove 2 threats to make a character skirmishing this minion strength -2.

Name: Black Land Observer
Text: When you play this minion, you may spot an [ORC] condition to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3.

Name: Black Land Overlord
Text: Maneuver: Remove a threat and spot another [ORC] minion to exert an unbound companion.

Name: Black Land Runner
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. While you can spot more sites on the adventure path than minions, this minion is strength +5.

Name: Black Land Shrieker
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] condition. Black Land Shrieker is twilight cost -1 for each threat you spot.

Name: Black Land Spy
Text: When you play this minion, you may spot an [ORC] possession to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 13 or more, this minion is strength +7.

Name: Coordinated Effort
Text: To play, spot 2 [ORC] minions. Each time the Free Peoples player plays a possession, add [2].

Name: Desolation Orc
Text: To play, spot 3 Free Peoples cultures or discard 2 [ORC] conditions from play.

Name: Destructive Orc
Text: When you play Destructive Orc, you may discard a fortification for each [ORC] possession and each [ORC] artifact you can spot.

Name: Gorbag, Filthy Rebel
Text: Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) When you play Gorbag, you may discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's deck for each hunter character you can spot.

Name: Isengard Marauder
Text: To play, discard 3 cards from your hand. While you can spot 2 other [ORC] minions, this minion is fierce.

Name: Moria Menace
Text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player shuffle his or her draw deck and reveal the top card of that draw deck. Make this minion strength +X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.

Name: Mountain-troll
Text: When you play this minion, you may discard 5 [ORC] minions from play to make it twilight cost -10 and fierce. Shadow: Remove [3] to play an [ORC] Orc from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

Name: Orkish Camp
Text: While you can spot a [ORC] Orc, the Free Peoples player cannot replace the fellowship's current site. Shadow: Exert an [ORC] minion and remove [2] to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is an [ORC] Orc, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it.

Name: Orkish Hunting Spear
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. Bearer gains hunter X (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +X.), where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you can spot.

Name: Pummeling Blow
Text: To play, exert an [ORC] minion. Plays on the fellowship's current site. This site cannot be replaced. While the fellowship is at this site, each Troll is strength +1.

Name: Scouting Orc
Text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

Name: Tower Troll
Text: For each companion over 5, this minion is damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion twice to assign it to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). If you cannot spot 6 companions, the Free Peoples player may exert a companion to prevent this.

Name: Unmistakable Omen
Text: While you can spot a threat, the site number of each [ORC] Orc is -1. Regroup: Remove 3 threats and discard 3 [ORC] Orcs from play to make the Free Peoples player spot a companion and place that companion in the dead pile. Discard this condition.

Name: Unreasonable Choice
Text: Spot 2 [ORC] minions to discard a Free Peoples condition. The Free Peoples player may add [2] for each Free Peoples condition you can spot to prevent that.

Name: Veteran War Chief
Text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

Name: Brilliant Light
Text: Make a [ROHAN] companion strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if he or she is a hunter companion).

Name: Burial Mounds
Text: Make a [ROHAN] companion defender +1 and minions skirmishing that companion cannot take wounds during a skirmish involving that companion until the regroup phase.

Name: Eomer, Horsemaster
Text: Valiant. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [ROHAN] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

Name: Eomer's Spear, Trusty Weapon
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is Eomer and he is unwounded, he is damage +1 and resistance +1. Skirmish: If bearer is Eomer, discard this possession to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Eowyn, Willing Fighter
Text: Valiant. Response: If a hunter companion or valiant Man is about to take a wound, exert Eowyn to prevent that wound.

Name: Gamling, The Old
Text: Valiant. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. While you can spot 3 hunters, Gamling is strength +3.

Name: Grim Trophy
Text: Make a [ROHAN] Man strength +1 for each hunter you can spot (or if you can spot more valiant Men than hunters, make a [ROHAN] Man strength +1 for each valiant Man you can spot).

Name: Haleth, Son of Hama
Text: While you can spot 2 mounts, Haleth is strength +2. While you can spot 3 mounts, Haleth is damage +1. While you can spot 4 Free Peoples mounts, those mounts can not be discarded by a Shadow player.

Name: Horse of Great Stature
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make a [ROHAN] Man strength +1.

Name: Horseman of the North
Text: While you can spot a valiant Man, this companion's twilight cost is -1. While no opponent controls a site, this companion is strength +2.

Name: Our Inspiration
Text: Spot a [ROHAN] Man to play a possession from your discard pile for each hunter character you can spot.

Name: Last Days of My House
Text: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men (or 1 hunter [ROHAN] Man) to play a [ROHAN] companion or a [ROHAN] follower from your draw deck.

Name: Rider's Mount
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

Name: Rohan Stable Master
Text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [1] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Bearer is considered to be mounted.

Name: Rohan Worker
Text: Aid - [1]. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a [ROHAN] companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may liberate a site.

Name: Rohirrim Axe
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter minion, bearer is damage +1.

Name: Rohirrim Doorwarden
Text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [ROHAN] Man. Bearer is strength +1 for each possession he or she bears.

Name: Rohirrim Soldier
Text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, this companion's twilight cost is -1. This companion is strength +1 for each hunter minion you can spot.

Name: Rohirrim Warrior
Text: Valiant. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot a hunter minion (or exert 2 valiant Men) to make this companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

Name: Spear of the Mark
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is defender +1.

Name: Sturdy Shield
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. While no opponent controls a site, bearer is strength +1. Regroup: Discard this to liberate a site (or two sites if bearer is mounted).

Name: Swift Stroke
Text: Spot your [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession to discard all possessions from one character.

Name: Community Living
Text: Spot a Hobbit to play a [SHIRE] follower from your draw deck.

Name: Frodo, Weary From the Journey
Text: Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. While skirmishing a minion of strength 8 or less, Frodo is strength +2.

Name: Hobbit Sword
Text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

Name: Hobbiton Brewer, Maker of Fine Ales
Text: Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Hobbit. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, transfer Hobbiton Brewer to your support area to prevent that wound.

Name: Hobbiton Farmer, Lover of Pipeweed
Text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Bearer is strength +1 for each fierce minion you can spot.

Name: Little Golden Flower
Text: Each Hobbit bearing a hand weapon is vitality +1. Each Hobbit bearing a follower is resistance +1. Each unwounded Hobbit is strength +1.

Name: Merry, The Tall One
Text: While Merry bears a follower, he is strength +2. Skirmish: If Merry is skirmishing a hunter minion, add a threat to make Merry strength +2.

Name: No Visitors
Text: Transfer a follower from a Hobbit to your support area to cancel a skirmish involving that Hobbit.

Name: Pippin, The Short One
Text: Each [SHIRE] follower is twilight cost -1. Skirmish: If Pippin is skirmishing a hunter minion, exert the Ring-bearer to make Pippin strength +2.

Name: Relaxation
Text: Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of burdens, discard a [SHIRE] follower and this condition from play to prevent that and discard that Shadow card.

Name: Sam, Innocent Traveler
Text: Ring-bound. While Sam bears the One Ring, he is resistance -4. Maneuver: If Sam is bearing a follower, exert him to heal another Hobbit. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer.

Name: Second Breakfast
Text: Add a threat and exert your Ring-bearer to wound each non-hunter minion skirmishing your [SHIRE] Ring-bearer.

Name: Advancing Horde
Text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each site you control.

Name: Charging Uruk
Text: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

Name: Chasing Uruk
Text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot 4 hunters (or Ugluk) to control a site.

Name: Covetous Uruk
Text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you spot.

Name: Defensive Rush
Text: While you can spot an [URUK-HAI] minion, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site. At the start of each skirmish, you may remove [3] to heal an [URUK-HAI] minion (or heal an [URUK-HAI] minion twice if you control a site.)

Name: Following Uruk
Text: Fierce. Hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion not assigned to a skirmish.

Name: Hunting Uruk
Text: While this minion is at a battleground site, he gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

Name: Lurtz, Now Perfected
Text: Damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free People's player must exert X companions, where X is the current region number.

Name: Lurtz's Sword, Mighty Longsword
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. Bearer gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) If bearer is Lurtz, he is fierce.

Name: Mauhur, Relentless Hunter
Text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). Assignment: Exert Mauhur to assign him to a non-hunter character (except the Ring-bearer).

Name: Merciless Berserker
Text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion to exert X companions and add X threats, where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

Name: Poised for Assault
Text: Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, place an [URUK-HAI] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [URUK-HAI] tokens from here to take control of a site.

Name: Pursuing Uruk
Text: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it gains hunter 4.

Name: Searching Uruk
Text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Searching Uruk is strength +1 for each other [URUK-HAI] hunter you can spot.

Name: Seeking Uruk
Text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +1 for each hunter you can spot.

Name: Sentry Uruk
Text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. While you can spot a fierce minion, this minion is fierce. While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. While you can spot a character that is damage +1, this minion is damage +1.

Name: Tracking Uruk
Text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

Name: Ugluk, Ugly Fellow
Text: Fierce. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) At the start of each skirmish involving Ugluk, each non-hunter skirmishing Ugluk must exert.

Name: Ugluk's Sword, Weapon of Command
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. While you control 2 or more sites, bearer can not take wounds (except during skirmish phases). If bearer is Ugluk, he is damage +1.

Name: Uruk Cavern Striker
Text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Spot a Free Peoples player's site on the adventure path and exert this minion twice to exchange the spotted site with a site you control. You now control the spotted site.

Name: Uruk Infantry
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +2. Regroup: Exert 4 [URUK-HAI] minions (or discard 3 [URUK-HAI] minions) to take control of a site.

Name: Uruk Village Assassin
Text: Damage +1. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot another [URUK-HAI] minion and remove 3 [URUK-HAI] tokens to take control of a site or discard a follower.

Name: Uruk Village Rager
Text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, take control of a site. While you control a site, this minion cannot take wounds (except during the skirmish phase).

Name: Uruk Village Stormer
Text: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +4. Each time a companion or ally is killed during a skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] minion, you may take control of a site.

Name: Violent Hurl
Text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2 (and damage +1 if that minion is a hunter).

Name: With All Possible Speed
Text: Each unwounded hunter [URUK-HAI] minion is strength +1. Response: If your hunter minion is about to take a wound during a skirmish, discard that minion to exert a non-hunter companion.

Name: Later Than You Think
Text: Remove 2 threats to play a Nazgul. That Nazgul is twilight cost -2 and gains hunter 2 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: A Shadow Fell Over Them
Text: Each time a Nazgul wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 Nazgul (or a Nazgul twice) to add a threat. Assignment: Spot a Nazgul and remove [4] to play a Nazgul from your discard pile.

Name: They Feel the Precious
Text: Response: If a Nazgul is about to take a wound, remove a threat to prevent that wound.

Name: Ulaire Attea, Desirous of Power
Text: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Eternally Threatening
Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove [1] to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

Name: Ulaire Nelya, Fell Rider
Text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [WRAITH] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

Name: Anduin River
Text: River. The fellowship archery total is -3.

Name: Breeding Pit of Isengard
Text: Underground. The twilight cost of the first hunter minion played each shadow phase is -2.

Name: City Gates
Text: When the Fellowship moves to this site, add a threat (or 2 if you can spot a hunter minion) for each companion over 4.

Name: East Wall of Rohan
Text: At the start of the Fellowship phase, you may exert two hunter companions to play a hunter companion from your draw deck.

Name: Gate of Mordor
Text: Battleground. Each time the fellowship moves to this site add [1] for each culture you can spot.

Name: Isengard Ruined
Text: Battleground. Each time a follower is transferred to a character, the first Shadow player may exert a companion twice.

Name: Mount Doom
Text: Battleground. Mountain. Underground. Until the end of the game, sites in this region cannot be replaced.

Name: Westfold Village
Text: Plains. Each hunter character is strength +1.

Name: The One Ring, The Ring of Doom (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer gains hunter 3, and each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

Name: Well-crafted Armor (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer takes a wound, you may reinforce a [DWARVEN] token. Skirmish: Discard a [DWARVEN] card from hand to make bearer damage +1.

Name: Legolas, of the Woodland Realm (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Archer. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot. (limit +3)

Name: The Mirror of Galadriel, Dangerous Guide (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.

Name: Gandalf, Powerful Guide (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

Name: One Last Surprise (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf's resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion's strength.

Name: Quickbeam, Hastiest of All Ents (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [GANDALF] companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [GANDALF] token.

Name: Smeagol, Wretched and Hungry (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each Ring-bound companion is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Hobbits to make Smeagol strength +1 and prevent him from being overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

Name: Aragorn, Thorongil (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Ranger. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn's.

Name: Madril, Defender of Osgiliath (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.Lists: SXL
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [GONDOR] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Black Land Chieftain (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. When you play Black Land Chieftain, you may add a threat for each Free Peoples possession and each Free Peoples artifact you can spot.

Name: Gorbag, Filthy Rebel (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) When you play Gorbag, you may discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's deck for each hunter character you can spot.

Name: Eomer, Horsemaster (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Valiant. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [ROHAN] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

Name: Sentry Uruk (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion. While you can spot a fierce minion, this minion is fierce. While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. While you can spot a character that is damage +1, this minion is damage +1.

Name: Ulaire Attea, Desirous of Power (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Eternally Threatening (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove [1] to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

Name: Ulaire Nelya, Fell Rider (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [WRAITH] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

Name: Mount Doom (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Battleground. Mountain. Underground. Until the end of the game, sites in this region cannot be replaced.

Name: Legolas, of the Woodland Realm (O)
Text: Archer. Hunter 1. Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot (limit +3).

Name: Gandalf, Powerful Guide (O)
Text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.

Name: Quickbeam, Hastiest of All Ents (O)
Text: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another [Gandalf} companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a [GANDALF] token.

Name: Aragorn, Thorongil (O)
Text: Ranger. Hunter 2. Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn.

Name: Madril, Defender of Osgiliath (O)
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 [GONDOR] rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Eomer, Horsemaster (O)
Text: Valiant. Hunter 2. While you can spot a [ROHAN] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a [ROHAN] card from hand to make Eomer strength +2.

Name: Ulaire Attea, Desirous of Power (O)
Text: Fierce. Ulaire Attea is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Eternally Threatening (O)
Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may remove [1] to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

Name: Ulaire Nelya, Fell Rider (O)
Text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, [WRAITH] minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a [WRAITH] condition.

Name: Barrow-wight Stalker
Text: Enduring. Each [WRAITH] Wraith cannot take wounds (except during skirmishes). Shadow: Remove a burden to play a [WRAITH] Wraith. That minion's twilight cost is -2.

Name: Candle Corpses
Text: Enduring. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a companion, you may spot another [WRAITH] Wraith and remove [2] to wound that companion.

Name: Covetous Wisp
Text: Enduring. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns Covetous Wisp to a companion, you may spot another [WRAITH] Wraith and remove [2] to add a burden.

Name: Dead Faces
Text: Enduring. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to a companion, you may spot another [WRAITH] Wraith and remove [2] to discard a condition.

Name: Spirit of Dread
Text: Enduring. While you can spot another [WRAITH] Wraith, wounds cannot be healed and burdens can not be removed (except by Wraiths). Skirmish: Exert Spirit of Dread to make another [WRAITH] Wraith strength +1.

Name: Undead of Angmar
Text: Enduring. While you can spot another [WRAITH] Wraith, each wounded companion is resistance -2. Shadow: Exert Undead of Angmar twice to play a [WRAITH] Wraith from your draw deck, then reshuffle.

Name: Armor of Khazad
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer is about to take a wound, you may add a threat to prevent that. Regroup: Discard this possession to take up to 2 other [DWARVEN] possessions into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Balin Avenged
Text: When you play this condition, you may add a [DWARVEN] token here. While you can spot 4 [DWARVEN] tokens and 2 Dwarves, each [ORC] Orc gains this text 'To play, remove an [ORC] card from your discard pile from the game.' Skirmish: Discard this condition to exert a minion for each Dwarf you can spot.

Name: Dwarven Stratagem
Text: Spot a Dwarf hunter and choose one: exert a minion for each hunter you can spot or reinforce a [DWARVEN] token for each hunter you can spot.

Name: Ring of Artifice
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Bearer is strength +1 for each [DWARVEN] artifact in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this to take a non-event [DWARVEN] card into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Axe- Work
Text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or if you cannot spot a threat, make that Dwarf strength +1 for each Dwarf you can spot).

Name: Thorin III, Stonehelm
Text: Damage +1. Each time a minion loses a skirmish involving Thorin III, its owner discards the top card from his or her draw deck.

Name: Elven Guardian
Text: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While this companion is skirmishing a wounded minion, he is strength +2. Maneuver: Exert this companion to heal another hunter.

Name: Hearth and Hall
Text: Spot an [ELVEN] hunter and choose one: draw a card for each hunter you can spot or reinforce an [ELVEN] token for each hunter you can spot.

Name: Lothlorien Guides
Text: Spot 2 Elves (or an Elf and an [ELVEN] follower) to discard a condition (or discard two conditions if you can spot 4 or more Shadow conditions).

Name: Namarie
Text: When you play this condition, add an [ELVEN] token here for each hunter you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this or remove a token from here and spot an [ELVEN] hunter to discard a condition.

Name: Orophin, Silvan Elf
Text: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While Orophin is skirmishing a wounded minion, he is strength +3. Archery: Exert another [ELVEN] hunter and add a threat to wound a minion.

Name: Rumil, Silvan Elf
Text: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot a wounded minion, Rumil is strength +1 and gains archer. Archery: Exert another [ELVEN] hunter and add a threat to wound a minion.

Name: The World Ahead
Text: To play, spot an Elf. Each time the fellowship moves to a region one site, add a threat. Each time the fellowship moves to a region two site, heal an Elf. Each time the fellowship moves to a region three site, draw a card.

Name: Weapons of Lothlorien
Text: Spot an [ELVEN] archer and add a threat to wound a minion (or add three threats to exert three minions).

Name: A New Light
Text: Spell. Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to search a Shadow player's discard pile and choose a minion, then return that minion to its owner's hand. If you do, you may reveal that Shadow player's hand and discard a minion found there.

Name: Barliman Butterbur, Red-Faced Landlord
Text: Barliman Butterbur is strength +1 for each attached [GANDALF] follower. Maneuver: Exert Barliman Butterbur to reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Take any [GANDALF] cards into hand and discard the rest.

Name: Gandalf, Returned
Text: When you play Gandalf (except in your starting fellowship), you may play a [GANDALF] possession on him from your draw deck or discard pile. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may reinforce a Free Peoples token.

Name: Glamdring, Orc Beater
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Bearer is damage +1. Each time a companion is about to take a wound, you may discard a companion from hand to prevent that.

Name: Guidance of the Istari
Text: Make a [GANDALF] companion strength +1 for each [GANDALF] Man you can spot.

Name: Gwaihir, The Windlord
Text: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) If bearer is a [GANDALF] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

Name: Long-stemmed Pipe
Text: Pipeweed. When you play this, you may search your deck for a [GANDALF] card and place it in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard another pipeweed from play to discard a condition. Discard this condition.

Name: Meneldor, Misty Mountain Eagle
Text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [1] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [GANDALF] follower. Bearer is strength +1 for each other [GANDALF] follower you can spot.

Name: Scintillating Bird
Text: Spell. Fellowship: Exert your Wizard and choose an opponent to name either Free Peoples or Shadow. Reveal the top three cards of your deck. If you revealed at least two of the chosen card type, take those cards into hand, otherwise, discard those cards.

Name: Shadowfax, Greatest of the Mearas
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

Name: The Sap is in the Bough
Text: Discard a companion from hand to make a [GANDALF] companion strength +3 (or +4 if you can spot 3 Ents).

Name: Woodland Onod
Text: Skirmish: Discard a companion from hand to make an Ent strength +2.

Name: Anduril, Sword That Was Broken
Text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may exert him to liberate a site or discard a condition borne by a companion.

Name: Faramir, Bearer of Quality
Text: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, you may wound Faramir to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man roaming until the end of turn.

Name: Faramir's Bow, Ithilien Longbow
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] ranger. If bearer is Faramir, he is an archer. The site number of each minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] ranger is +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to exhaust a minion Faramir is skirmishing.

Name: Madril, Loyal Lieutenant
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot a roaming minion, your [GONDOR] conditions cannot be discarded from play by Shadow cards. Maneuver: Exert 2 rangers to make a minion site number +2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Narsil, Forged by Telchar
Text: Bearer must be Elendil or Isildur. Bearer is damage +1. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him to discard a Shadow possession.

Name: Nimble Attack
Text: Spot 2 [GONDOR] companions and add a threat to discard a Shadow possession.

Name: Ranger of the White Tree
Text: Ranger. Hunter 1. When this is in your starting fellowship and you can spot an unbound [GONDOR] companion with cost 3 or more, his twilight cost is -2. Maneuver: Exert this companion and spot a roaming minion to make him defender +1 until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Spirit of the White Tree
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] companion. An opponent can not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving bearer. Each time a Shadow player adds a burden, discard this condition.

Name: Soldier's Cache
Text: Fortification. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot 3 rangers or exert a [GONDOR] Man to transfer this condition to a minion. Wound that minion. Regroup: Exert a ranger to reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

Name: Throne of Minas Tirith
Text: To play, spot Denethor (or 2 [GONDOR] companions). Each time a minion is killed or discarded from play during a skirmish, you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token. Skirmish: Remove 3 [GONDOR] tokens to discard a possession.

Name: Saruman, Instigator of Insurrection
Text: Saruman cannot be assigned to a skirmish. While you can spot 6 companions, each minion gains hunter 2. Response: If a hunter minion is about to take a wound, exert Saruman to prevent that.

Name: Saruman, Servant of Sauron
Text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may remove [1] to transfer this to a minion.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion.

Name: Throne of Isengard
Text: Each time you play Saruman, spot a minion. That minion is fierce until the start of the regroup phase. Each Wizard is strength +3 and damage +1.

Name: Beast of War
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] Man. While you can spot a threat, bearer is fierce. While you can spot 3 threats, bearer is damage +1. While you can spot 5 threats, you may play this from your discard pile.

Name: Ceremonial Armor
Text: Each time a [MEN] minion is discarded during the maneuver phase, you may stack it here. Response: Discard a minion stacked here or discard this to prevent a wound to a [MEN] minion.

Name: Easterling Dispatcher
Text: When you play this minion, you may spot 2 other [MEN] Men to add [1] for each possession you spot.

Name: Easterling Sneak
Text: While you control 2 sites, Easterling Sneak is fierce. While you control 4 sites, each [MEN] minion is strength +1 and fierce.

Name: Grima's Dagger
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] Man. If bearer is Grima, he is strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2. Response: If a skirmish event is played, discard this possession to cancel that event.

Name: In the Wild Men's Wake
Text: Spot a [MEN] possession in your support area and a [MEN] minion. Make that minion strength +1 for each minion stacked on that possession. You may discard that possession to make that minion damage +1.

Name: Pandemonium
Text: Play a [MEN] minion stacked on a [MEN] possession as if from hand.

Name: Primitive Brand
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish you may transfer this possession to another [MEN] minion. If you do, stack a [MEN] minion from play on a [MEN] possession in your support area.

Name: Saruman, Coldly Still
Text: Each [MEN] minion bearing a possession is strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to play a [MEN] possession from your discard pile.

Name: Stampeding Chief
Text: Damage +1. Fierce. If you play Stampeding Chief from your hand, remove [3] and spot another [MEN] minion or discard Stampeding Chief.

Name: Stampeding Hillsman
Text: Regroup: Spot a [MEN] minion in your discard pile and discard this minion to place that minion on your [MEN] support area possession.

Name: Stampeding Madman
Text: To play, spot 2 [MEN] Men. When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each site you control.

Name: Stampeding Ransacker
Text: To play, spot 2 [MEN] Men. Each time this minion wins a skirmish and you can spot a site you control, exhaust an unbound companion.

Name: Stampeding Savage
Text: Maneuver: Discard this minion and X minions stacked on a [MEN] possession to play a [MEN] minion from your discard pile. That minion is twilight cost -X.

Name: Stampeding Shepherd
Text: Fierce. Maneuver: Discard this minion and a [MEN] minion with a twilight cost 2 or less from play to play Stampeding Chief from your draw deck. It is twilight cost -8.

Name: Sunland Guard
Text: Maneuver: Exert this minion to play a [MEN] minion (or 2 if you spot 6 companions) from a [MEN] possession as if from hand.

Name: Sunland Scout
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each [MEN] possession with a [MEN] minion stacked on it. Maneuver: spot a [MEN] possession and discard this minion from play to discard a condition.

Name: Sunland Skirmisher
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each [MEN] minion stacked on each [MEN] possession. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may play a minion stacked on a [MEN] possession as if from hand.

Name: Sunland Sneak
Text: This minion is twilight cost -1 for each [MEN] minion stacked on a [MEN] possession.

Name: Sunland Trooper
Text: This minion is strength +2 for each [MEN] possession with a [MEN] minion stacked on it. Maneuver: Spot X [MEN] minions stacked on a [MEN] possession and discard this minion to add (X).

Name: Sunland Warrior
Text: Maneuver: Spot a [MEN] possession and discard this minion from play to make each [MEN] minion you spot strength +2 until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Sunland Weaponmaster
Text: To play, spot 2 [MEN] Men. While this minion bears a possession, he is strength +2 for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

Name: Vengeful Savage
Text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack a [MEN] minion from your discard pile on a [MEN] possession in your support area.

Name: Vengeful Wild Man
Text: At the start of the maneuver phase, spot another [MEN] Man and exert this minion to add a threat. Then add an additional threat for each companion you spot over 4.

Name: Vengeful Pillager
Text: When you play this minion from your draw deck or from your [MEN] possesion it is fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Vengeful Primitive
Text: You may play this minion any time you could play a maneuver event. When you play this minion in the maneuver phase, you may discard X [MEN] minions from play to add (X).

Name: Wildman's Oath
Text: Each time a [MEN] minion is discarded during the maneuver phase, you may stack it here. Skirmish: Discard this possession to make a [MEN] Man strength +2.

Name: A Defiled Charge
Text: To play, exert your mounted [ORC] Orc. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns a mounted [ORC] Orc to a companion, he or she must choose to either exert that companion or add [2].

Name: Chaotic Clash
Text: To play, spot no minions. Each time you play a minion, it is twilight cost +1. While you can spot an [ORC] minion, each companion is strength -1.

Name: Cry and Panic
Text: Each time a mounted [ORC] Orc wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must reveal his or her hand and place two Free Peoples cards revealed on the bottom of his or her draw deck.

Name: Feral Ride
Text: Make an [ORC] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is mounted).

Name: Grishnakh, Treacherous Captain
Text: Hunter 2. While you can spot an [URUK-HAI] minion, each [ORC] Orc gains hunter 1 (if that [URUK-HAI] minion is Ugluk, each [ORC] Orc gains an additional hunter 1). Shadow: Exert Grishnakh twice to play an [URUK-HAI] hunter minion from your draw deck.

Name: Orkish Assassin
Text: While you can spot a follower attached to a companion, each [ORC] minion is strength +2.

Name: Orkish Berserker
Text: When this minion wins a skirmish, discard an [ORC] minion from play.

Name: Orkish Cavalry
Text: Each time you play an [ORC] mount, you may draw a card. Assignment: If this minion is mounted, exert it twice to assign it to a companion of strength 9 or more.

Name: Orkish Dreg
Text: Each time you play this minion, you may spot another [ORC] minion to exert a companion for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

Name: Orkish Fiend
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. While at an underground site, this minion is fierce and the Free Peoples player may not replace sites or play a site from his or her adventure deck.

Name: Orkish Flanker
Text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if it is mounted, exert a companion. Shadow: Exert 3 [ORC] minions and spot an [ORC] mount to discard a condition.

Name: Orkish Footman
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each twilight token you can spot.

Name: Orkish Invader
Text: At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may reveal an [ORC] condition from hand to wound the companion this minion is skirmishing twice and then discard this minion.

Name: Orkish Lackey
Text: Maneuver: Spot 2 [ORC] conditions and discard this minion from play to wound an unbound companion.

Name: Orkish Maurader
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each [ORC] condition in your discard pile.

Name: Orkish Rider
Text: Each mounted [ORC] Orc is strength +1. Shadow: discard an [ORC] card from your hand to play an [ORC] mount from your discard pile.

Name: Orkish Runner
Text: Shadow: Exert this minion and spot another [ORC] minion to add (X), where X is the number of the current region.

Name: Orkish Scout
Text: Shadow: Exert this minion to add (X), where X is the current site's Shadow number.

Name: Orkish Traveler
Text: Each [ORC] mount is twilight cost -1. Skirmish: Remove [3] to make a mounted [ORC] Orc strength +2.

Name: Orkish Veteran
Text: Each time you play an [ORC] mount, you may reinforce an [ORC] token. Regroup: Exert Orkish Veteran to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

Name: Orkish Warg-master
Text: Each time a mounted [ORC] minion wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player place a card from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck. Shadow: Exert Orkish Warg-master to play an [ORC] mount from your discard pile.

Name: Orkish Warrior
Text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +4. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, discard this minion.

Name: Relentless Warg
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 10 or less. Bearer is fierce. When you play this possession, spot a race. While bearer is skirmishing a companion of that race, bearer is strength +3 and damage +1.

Name: Rider's Gear
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. While bearer is mounted, it cannot take wounds except during the skirmish phase.

Name: Threatening Warg
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 10 or less. Bearer is fierce. When you play this, you may spot 2 [ORC] Orcs that are not bearing mounts to play an [ORC] mount from your draw deck.

Name: Vicious Warg
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 9 or less. Bearer is fierce.

Name: Aragorn, Defender of Rohan
Text: Valiant. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion gains hunter 1.

Name: Dispatched with Haste
Text: While at a plains site, each mounted companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [ROHAN] Men and discard a [ROHAN] possession to discard a possession.

Name: Eomer, Northman
Text: Damage +1. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, Eomer is strength +3. Maneuver: If Eomer is mounted, exert him to make him defender +1 until the end of turn.

Name: Eowyn, Northwoman
Text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, Eowyn cannot take wounds while skirmishing. Assignment: Exert Eowyn and assign a minion to the Ring-bearer to make that minion lose all game text keywords and unable to gain game text keywords until the regroup phase.

Name: For Death and Glory
Text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each minion skirmishing a [ROHAN] companion loses hunter and is unable to gain hunter. Skirmish: Exert a [ROHAN] companion to make that companion gain hunter 1 until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Throne of the Golden Hall
Text: To play, spot Theoden (or 2 [ROHAN] companions). Saruman and Grima cannot be assigned to skirmishes. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, exert another [ROHAN] Man and add [2] to prevent that.

Name: Hama, Northman
Text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each minion skirmishing Hama loses strength bonuses and damage bonuses from possessions.

Name: Into the Caves
Text: To play, spot 3 [ROHAN] companions. Assignment: Assign a minion to Frodo to make that minion lose all keywords of your choice and unable to gain keywords until the regroup phase.

Name: Soldier of Rohan
Text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, this companion is strength +2.

Name: Theoden, Northman, King of Rohan
Text: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [ROHAN] companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [ROHAN] followers and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

Name: Where Now the Horse
Text: Spot a [ROHAN] companion to make Frodo strength +5. If Frodo loses the skirmish, discard that [ROHAN] companion.

Name: Warrior of Rohan
Text: Possessions cannot be transferred from this companion to another character. Fellowship: Play a possession on this companion to liberate a site.

Name: Throne of the Dark Lord
Text: To play, spot 2 minions. While you can spot Sauron, each other minion is damage +1. While the fellowship is in the same region as Mount Doom, each companion is resistance -2.

Name: Halfling Leaf
Text: Pipeweed. To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to cancel a skirmish involving an unbound Hobbit.

Name: Merry, In the Bloom of Health
Text: Add 1 to the number of Ents you can spot. Regroup: Exert Merry to place a pipeweed from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

Name: Hornblower Leaf
Text: Pipeweed. To play, spot an unbound Hobbit. Regroup: Discard a pipeweed from play to remove a threat. Regroup: Discard a pipeweed from play to discard a minion.

Name: Pippin, In the Bloom of Health
Text: Add 1 to the number of Ents you can spot. Maneuver: Discard 2 pipeweed cards from play to remove a burden.

Name: Southfarthing Leaf
Text: Pipeweed. To play, spot an unbound Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to make an unbound Hobbit strength +2. Regroup: Discard this pipeweed from play to play a pipeweed from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck.

Name: Southlinch Leaf
Text: Pipeweed. To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to prevent an unbound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless that Hobbit's strength is tripled.

Name: Blade of the White Hand
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai. While you can spot 2 controlled sites, this minion is damage +1. While you can spot 4 controlled sites, this minion is damage +3.

Name: Deathly Roar
Text: Each time the Free Peoples player plays a possession or artifact, place an [URUK-HAI] token here. Each time an [URUK-HAI] minion wins a skirmish, you may remove an [URUK-HAI] token to exert a companion.

Name: Land Had Changed
Text: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2 (or spot a site you control to make that Uruk-hai strength +3 instead). You may then liberate a site to make that Uruk-hai strength +2 and damage +1.

Name: Saruman, Curunir
Text: Each time an [URUK-HAI] hunter wins a skirmish, heal a different [URUK-HAI] minion. Skirmish: Exert Saruman twice to make a companion lose the hunter keyword until the start of the regroup phase.

Name: Saruman, Master of the White Hand
Text: Each companion is resistance -1. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to discard a condition borne by a companion skirmishing an [URUK-HAI] minion.

Name: Spear of the White Hand
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] Uruk-hai.

Name: Vile Pit
Text: To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] hunter. At the start of each Shadow phase, you may discard 2 [URUK-HAI] cards from hand to play an [URUK-HAI] hunter from your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this possession to return an [URUK-HAI] hunter from play to your hand.

Name: White Hand Aggressor
Text: Damage +1. While you control a site, this minion cannot take wounds, except during the skirmish phase.

Name: White Hand Attacker
Text: Damage +1. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each site on the adventure path gains each terrain keyword from each site you control.

Name: White Hand Berserker
Text: Damage +1. At the start of the archery phase, if you control a site, you may add 2 to the minion archery total for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

Name: White Hand Butcher
Text: Hunter 6 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +6.)

Name: White Hand Captain
Text: Fierce. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each hunter character is strength +1.

Name: White Hand Destroyer
Text: Fierce. This minion gains hunter 3 for each site you control.

Name: White Hand Enforcer
Text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may liberate a site to add (X) where X is the Shadow number of the liberated site.

Name: White Hand Guard
Text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). Skirmish: Exert this minion to make an [URUK-HAI] hunter minion strength +2.

Name: White Hand Intruder
Text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if you do not control a site, you may take control of a site.

Name: White Hand Invader
Text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, exert a companion for each site you control.

Name: White Hand Legion
Text: Damage +1. To play, remove 2 threats.

Name: White Hand Scout
Text: Damage +1. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) The roaming penalty for each [URUK-HAI] minion you play is -1.

Name: White Hand Slayer
Text: Fierce. Each time a player plays an event in a skirmish involving this minion, that player may exert a non-hunter character.

Name: White Hand Taskmaster
Text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). When you play this minion, you may spot another [URUK-HAI] minion to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

Name: White Hand Trooper
Text: Fierce. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each hunter companion loses its special abilities and skirmish events may not be played in those companions skirmishes.

Name: White Hand Vanquisher
Text: Fierce. This minion is damage +1 for each [URUK-HAI] hunter assigned to a skirmish.

Name: White Hand Veteran
Text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, if you control a site, you may take an [URUK-HAI] event into hand from your discard pile.

Name: White Hand Warrior
Text: Fierce. Hunter 4 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +4.). Each time this minion is assigned to a non-hunter companion, you may heal a hunter.

Name: You Do Not Know Fear
Text: Discard a condition for each [URUK-HAI] minion you can spot.

Name: You Do Not Know Pain
Text: Each time you take control of a site, you may spot 3 [URUK-HAI] minions to exert an unbound companion. Skirmish: Liberate a site to make an [URUK-HAI] minion damage +1.

Name: Ulaire Cantea, Duplicitous Assassin
Text: Fierce. Each unbound companion is resistance -1 for each card he or she bears. Skirmish: Exert Ulaire Cantea to exert a companion with resistance 2 or less.

Name: Ulaire Enquea, Duplicitous Lieutenant
Text: Fierce. Each time the Free Peoples player heals a companion, you may add a burden. Maneuver: Exert Ulaire Enquea twice to discard a condition (or two conditions if you can spot 5 Free Peoples player's conditions).

Name: Ulaire Otsea, Duplicitous Specter
Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to add a burden.

Name: Ring of Savagery
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

Name: Ring of Terror
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is damage +1. When you play this artifact, you may remove two threats to take a [WRAITH] card into hand from your discard pile. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

Name: The Witch-king, Conqueror of Arthedain
Text: Fierce. Each time the Witch-king wins a fierce skirmish, you may exert a companion for each companion you can spot over 4.

Name: Dol Guldur
Text: Regroup: Exert your minion and remove a threat to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions.

Name: Falls of Rauros
Text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site in region 2, the Free Peoples player places a card from the dead pile out of play.

Name: Imladris
Text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, if it is a Sanctuary, remove 2 burdens.

Name: Nurn
Notes: The game text on this card remains active once it is controlled and is in your support area.
Text: Plains. While you control this site, each of your hunter minions is strength +1.

Name: Ring of Artifice (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Bearer is strength +1 for each [DWARVEN] artifact in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this to take a non-event [DWARVEN] card into hand from your discard pile.

Name: Glamdring, Orc Beater (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Bearer is damage +1. Each time a companion is about to take a wound, you may discard a companion from hand to prevent that.

Name: Shadowfax, Greatest of the Mearas (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

Name: Gwaihir, The Windlord (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) If bearer is a [GANDALF] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

Name: Anduril, Sword That Was Broken (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may exert him to liberate a site or discard a condition borne by a companion.

Name: Faramir, Bearer of Quality (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, you may wound Faramir to make a minion skirmishing a [GONDOR] Man roaming until the end of turn.
