Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [WRAITH] card from hand to add a burden.

Name: Ring of Savagery (O)
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owners hand.

Name: Ring of Terror (O)
Text: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is damage +1. When you play this artifact, you may remove two threats to take a [WRAITH] card into hand from your discard pile. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owners hand.

Name: Gimli, Sprinter
Text: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may add a threat to wound a minion (or wound a hunter minion twice).

Name: Run Until Found
Text: When you play this condition, place a [DWARVEN] token here. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play or remove a [DWARVEN] token from here to make a [DWARVEN] companion gain hunter 1.

Name: Thorin's Harp
Text: Tale. Maneuver: Exert a [DWARVEN] companion to make the fellowship's current site gain mountain until the regroup phase.

Name: Arwen's Bow
Text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Archery: If bearer is Arwen, discard 2 [ELVEN] cards from hand to wound a minion.

Name: Arwen's Dagger
Text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Maneuver: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to draw 2 cards.

Name: Back to the Light
Text: To play, exert an [ELVEN] companion or spot Arwen. Examine the top 5 cards of your draw deck and place any number of them aside. Shuffle the remaining cards into your draw deck and place those cards set aside on top of your draw deck in any order.

Name: Celebring, Elven-smith
Text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. When you play Celebring, you may play an [ELVEN] artifact from your deck.

Name: Elven Armaments
Notes: The card type for this card is both Hand Weapon and Shield. Game text is an erratum.
Text: To play, bearer must not be bearing any possessions. Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Bearer cannot bear any other possessions. While a unique companion bears this possession, the Free Peoples player may not use archery special abilities and the minion archery total is -1.

Name: Elven Defender
Text: While you can spot an [ELVEN] token, this companion is strength +2.

Name: Elven Supplies
Text: Fellowship: Remove a culture token from a Free Peoples card to add an [ELVEN] token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 [ELVEN] tokens from here to make a minion skirmishing an [ELVEN] companion strength -1.

Name: Galadriel's Silver Ewer
Text: To play, spot Galadriel or Celeborn. While Galadriel is the Ring-bearer, she is strength +2 and resistance +2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] skirmish event, you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token.

Name: Gil-galad, High King of the Noldor
Text: To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Maneuver: Add a threat to take an [ELVEN] skirmish event into hand from your discard pile. Regroup: Remove an [ELVEN] token to play an [ELVEN] condition from your discard pile.

Name: Glorfindel, Eldarin Lord
Text: Ranger. To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Minions skirmishing Glorfindel cannot gain strength bonuses from possessions. Each time Glorfindel wins a skirmish, you may remove a threat.

Name: Haldir, Warrior Messenger
Text: Skirmish: Exert Haldir or discard an [ELVEN] card from hand to make a minion skirmishing Haldir strength -2.

Name: Lembas Bread
Text: To play, spot 2 [ELVEN] companions. Bearer must be a companion. Regroup: Discard this possession from play to reconcile your hand.

Name: Miruvore
Text: Add 2 threats to heal an [ELVEN] companion.

Name: Woodhall Elf, Exile
Text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) When you transfer this to an [ELVEN] companion, you may draw 3 cards.

Name: Beorning Axe
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Drawn to Full Height
Text: Spell. Spot a [GANDALF] Wizard to make a minion lose all strength bonuses from possessions.

Name: Ents Marching
Text: If the fellowship is in region 1 or region 2, exert 2 Ents to make an Ent defender +1 until the regroup phase. If the fellowship is in region 3, spot a [GANDALF] companion to draw a card.

Name: Last Stand
Text: Fellowship: Exert a [GANDALF] Man to add 2 [GANDALF] tokens here. Skirmish: Remove 3 [GANDALF] tokens from here to make a companion strength +3.

Name: Librarian, Keeper of Ancient Texts
Text: While you can spot 2 [GANDALF] tokens, each of your [GANDALF] Men is strength +2. Regroup: Discard a follower from play to choose one: draw a card
column19: or take a [GANDALF] skirmish event from your discard pile into hand.

Name: One-Upsmanship
Text: Spell. Spot 2 pipeweed cards to remove a burden for each [GANDALF] Wizard you can spot.

Name: Our Time
Text: Spell. To play, exert Gandalf. When you play this condition, remove [3]. At the start of the maneuver phase, add [4] and remove this condition from the game.

Name: Perspective
Text: Maneuver: Add 2 threats and spot a Wizard to spot a minion in play. That minion cannot use special abilities until the regroup phase.

Name: Radagast's Herb Bag
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time you play a [GANDALF] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

Name: Ship of Smoke
Text: Pipeweed. Each time you play a pipeweed card, you may spot Gandalf to reveal the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Take all Free Peoples cards revealed into hand and discard the remaining cards.

Name: Countless Cords
Text: Spot Shelob to make a minion strength +1 for each threat you can spot.

Name: Deceit
Text: Response: If a Free Peoples player's card is about to discard your other [GOLLUM] condition, remove [1] to prevent that.

Name: Enemy in Your Midst
Text: Heal a Ring-bound companion to reinforce a [GOLLUM] token.

Name: It Draws Him
Text: Spot a [GOLLUM] card to play a minion. Its twilight cost is -1 (or -3 if it is roaming).

Name: Not Easily Avoided
Text: Shadow: Remove [3] to take a [GOLLUM] card into hand from your draw deck, then randomly discard a card from your hand. Skirmish: Discard a [GOLLUM] card from hand to make a [GOLLUM] minion strength +2.

Name: Set Up
Text: Spot Gollum or Smeagol to return a follower to its owner's hand.

Name: Shelob, Menace
Text: Fierce. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may add threats up to the number of burdens you can spot. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may play Gollum from your discard pile
column19: he is strength +3 and fierce until the end of turn.

Name: Sting of Shelob
Text: To play, spot Shelob. The Free Peoples player chooses two companions in play (except the Ring-bearer). He or she then chooses to place one of those companions in the dead pile and return the other to his or her hand.

Name: Time for Food
Text: If a skirmish event is played, spot Smeagol to cancel that event.

Name: Trusted Promise
Text: Reinforce a [GOLLUM] token. Each Shadow player may draw a card.

Name: Aragorn, Heir to the Throne of Gondor
Text: Hunter 2. While you can spot 3 Free Peoples cultures, Aragorn is defender +1. While you can spot 2 Shadow cultures, Aragorn is defender +1.

Name: Armor of the White City
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Bearer is a knight.

Name: Boromir, Proud and Noble Man
Text: Ranger. When you play Boromir (except in your starting fellowship), you may play a possession with a twilight cost of 1 or less on him from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck.

Name: Crown of Gondor
Text: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

Name: Denethor, On the Edge of Madness
Text: Each time the fellowship moves from a site, add a burden. Skirmish: Exert another [GONDOR] Man to make him of her strength +1 and damage +1.

Name: Denethor's Sword
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

Name: Defenses Long Held
Text: Make a ranger strength +2 and you may reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

Name: Dunadan's Bow
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] ranger. Archery: Discard 2 [GONDOR] cards from hand to make the fellowship archery total +1.

Name: Disarmed
Text: Bearer cannot bear any Shadow cards. When this condition is transferred to bearer, discard all Shadow cards it bears. Maneuver: Exert a [GONDOR] Man or spot a ranger to transfer this condition from your support area to minion.

Name: Elendil's Army
Text: Aid - Exert a [GONDOR] companion. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert a [GONDOR] companion to transfer this to a companion.)

Name: Faramir, Captain of Ithilien
Text: Ranger. Hunter 2. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: Exert Faramir to heal another companion with resistance 5 or more.

Name: Faramir's Company
Text: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) When you attach this card to a companion, spot a [GONDOR] possession to heal that companion.

Name: The Faithful Stone
Text: Tale. Each time a non-[WRAITH] minion is played, you may spot a Man to put a [GONDOR] token here. Maneuver: Remove 3 [GONDOR] tokens from here to spot a minion. That minion cannot be assigned to a skirmish until the regroup phase. Any Shadow player may remove [2] to prevent this.

Name: For Gondor!
Text: Exert a knight to make him or her strength +3.

Name: Gondorian Servant, Denethor's Handman
Text: Aid - [1]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [1] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you attach this to a companion, except a [GONDOR] Man, add [4].

Name: Horn of Boromir, The Great Horn
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Maneuver: Exert bearer and discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 until the regroup phase (if bearer is Boromir, he is also defender +1 and cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled).

Name: Isildur, Sword-Bearer
Text: Knight. Each time Isildur loses a skirmish, exert a companion. Each time Isildur wins a skirmish, heal a companion.

Name: Ranger of the North
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Maneuver: If the fellowship is in region 1 or region 2, you may exert bearer to make him or her defender +1 until the regroup phase. Regroup: Discard this to heal a companion.

Name: Ranger of the South
Text: Ranger. While you can spot a [GONDOR] token, this companion is strength +2.

Name: Shield of the White Tree
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Regroup: Discard this possession from play to make each opponent shuffle his or her hand into his or her draw deck and draw 8 cards.

Name: Soldier's Cache
Text: Fortification. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot 3 rangers or exert a [GONDOR] Man to transfer this condition to a minion. Wound that minion. Regroup: Exert a ranger to reinforce a [GONDOR] token.

Name: Watcher at Sarn Ford, Ranger of the North
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

Name: Corsair Boarding Axe
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Skirmish: Remove [3] to reinforce a [MEN] token and make bearer fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Corsair Bow
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is an archer. Each time a companion is killed during the archery phase, you may control a site.

Name: Corsair Grappling Hook
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. When you play this possession you may reinforce a [MEN] token twice. Each time a companion is killed during a skirmish phase, you may control a site.

Name: Corsair Halberd
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is damage +1. Shadow: Remove a companion in the dead pile from the game to control a site.

Name: Corsair Scimitar
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer is strength +1 for each [MEN] token you can spot (limit +5).

Name: Declined Business
Text: If the Free Peoples player plays a companion, discard a [MEN] card from hand to return that companion to its owner's hand.

Name: Fleet of Corsair Ships
Text: When you play this possession, you may add a [MEN] token here. Regroup: Remove 4 [MEN] tokens from here to place a [MEN] card from your discard pile on the top of your draw deck.

Name: Grima, Witless Worm
Text: Regroup: Exert Grima to add [2]. Regroup: Remove a [MEN] token to add [2]. Regroup: Remove [4] to exert an unbound companion.

Name: Harry Goatleaf
Text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

Name: Henchman's Dagger
Text: Bearer must be a [MEN] minion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

Name: Ill News Is An Ill Guest
Text: Exert a [MEN] minion to discard a follower from play (if you can spot Grima, also draw a card).

Name: Mumakil Commander, Bold and Grim
Text: While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2. Each mounted Man is strength +1. Regroup: Shuffle any number of your [MEN] mounts in play into your draw deck.

Name: Ruffian
Text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

Name: Rough Man of the South
Text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

Name: Squint-eyed Southerner
Text: While the fellowship is in region 1, this minion is strength +4. While the fellowship is in region 2, this minion is strength +2.

Name: Ted Sandyman, Chief's Men's Ally
Text: Maneuver: Liberate a site you control to make each [MEN] minion strength +2 until the regroup phase. Regroup: Exert Ted Sandyman to stack a [MEN] Man in play on a possession.

Name: Treachery
Text: Spot Grima to exert an unbound companion. That companion cannot use his or her game text until the regroup phase.

Name: Whisper in the Dark
Text: Bearer must be a follower. At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot a [MEN] Man, the Free Peoples player must exert an unbound companion.

Name: Destroyers and Usurpers
Text: While you can spot an [ORC] minion and fewer minions than companions, each companion loses all defender bonuses and cannot gain defender bonuses. Maneuver: Spot 2 [ORC] minions to make the fellowship's current site gain battleground until the regroup phase.

Name: Frenzy of Arrows
Text: Spot an [ORC] archer minion to add 2 to the minion archery total. If you do, you may add an additional 2 to the minion archery total for each follower you can spot.

Name: Gothmog, Morgul Leader
Text: Each the fellowship and minion archery totals are +3. Regroup: Remove [2] to play an [ORC] minion from your discard pile. That minion comes into play exhausted.

Name: Gothmog's Warg, Leader's Mount
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc with strength 9 or less (or bearer must be Gothmog). Bearer is fierce. While bearer is Gothmog, he is damage +1 in fierce skirmishes.

Name: Grond, Forged With Black Steel
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] minion. Each time the fellowship moves in the regroup phase, you may discard this possession to search the Free Peoples player's draw deck and choose 2 Free Peoples cards found there. Remove those cards from the game.

Name: Gruesome Meal
Text: Make a companion skirmishing an [ORC] minion strength -2 (or -3 if he or she is an archer).

Name: Orkish Ax
Text: Bearer must be an [ORC] Orc. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add a threat.

Name: Orkish Aggressor
Text: While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2.

Name: Orkish Archer Troop
Notes: Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Image fixed
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] card. The minion archery total is +1 for each hunter companion you can spot.

Name: Orkish Breeder
Text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Shadow: Exert this minion to play an [URUK-HAI] hunter at twilight cost -2.

Name: Orkish Defender
Text: While the fellowship is at a battleground or underground site, this minion cannot take wounds in the archery phase.

Name: Orkish Headsman
Text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This minion is strength +3 for each companion in the dead pile (limit +6).

Name: Orkish Skirmisher
Text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert him twice to wound a companion.

Name: Orkish Sneak
Text: Assignment: Spot another [ORC] Orc to assign this minion to skirmish a non-[SHIRE] Ring-bearer. The Free Peoples player may add a burden or exert the Ring-bearer twice to discard this minion.

Name: War Preparations
Text: Remove a threat to reinforce an [ORC] token.

Name: Wary Orc
Text: This minion is strength +1 for each hunter companion you can spot.

Name: Cast From the Hall
Notes: Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Game text is an erratum.
Text: Each time you play a [ROHAN] possession from hand, add a [ROHAN] token here. Skirmish: Remove 3 [ROHAN] tokens from here to make a [ROHAN] companion strength +1 and damage +1.

Name: Eomer's Bow
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. If bearer is mounted, he or she is strength +1. Archery: If bearer is Eomer, exert him to choose a Shadow player who must exert one of his or her minions.

Name: Erkenbrand's Horn
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

Name: Erkenbrand's Shield
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add [2] to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

Name: Fall back to Helm's Deep
Text: If the fellowship is at a plains site, exert a [ROHAN] companion to return a minion to its owner's hand.

Name: Gamling, Dutiful Marshal
Text: Valiant. Skirmish: Transfer a [ROHAN] possession that Gamling can bear to him.

Name: Gamling's Horn
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man or Merry. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4. If bearer is Gamling, you may also spot another companion to make him or her strength +4 until the regroup phase.

Name: Precise Attack
Text: Discard a [ROHAN] possession from play to choose one: Wound an unwounded minion
column19: exert a minion
column20: or discard a Shadow card the Ring-bearer is bearing.

Name: Rohirrim Diadem
Text: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession and discard a [ROHAN] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

Name: Rohirrim Recruit
Text: Valiant. While you can spot a [ROHAN] token, this companion is strength +2.

Name: Surrendered Weapons
Text: Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot a [ROHAN] companion to discard a possession a character is bearing from play. Skirmish: Add [1] to transfer a [ROHAN] possession borne by a companion to another eligible bearer.

Name: Theoden, Ednew
Text: While you can spot Gandalf, Theoden is resistance +2. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot 3 mounted [ROHAN] companions, Theoden is strength +2.

Name: A Dragon's Tale
Text: Tale. To play, spot a Hobbit. Maneuver: Discard a tale from play to choose a Shadow player who must exert one of his or her minions.

Name: Fredegar Bolger, Fatty
Text: While the fellowship is in region 1 and you can spot 2 other [SHIRE] companions, Fredegar Bolger is strength +3.

Name: Golden Perch Ale
Text: Each time a [SHIRE] companion wins a skimish, you may add a [SHIRE] token here. Fellowship: Remove a [SHIRE] token here to remove a burden.

Name: Make a Run For It
Text: Remove 2 [SHIRE] tokens to cancel a skirmish involving an unbound Hobbit.

Name: Prized Lagan
Text: At the start of each turn, you may add [2] to heal a [SHIRE] companion. Maneuver: Add a threat to spot a minion. That minion loses fierce and cannot gain fierce until the regroup phase.

Name: Robin Smallburrow, Shirriff Cock-Robin
Text: Aid - [2]. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add [2] to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you attach this follower to a [SHIRE] companion, you may discard X cards from hand to draw X cards.

Name: Scouring of the Shire
Text: Tale. When there are 4 [SHIRE] tokens here, discard this condition from play. Response: If a [SHIRE] condition or [SHIRE] possession is about to be discarded from play by a Shadow card, add a [SHIRE] token here to prevent that.

Name: Sting, Elven Long Knife
Text: Bearer must be Bilbo or Frodo. Regroup: Exert bearer to remove a threat.

Name: Cleaved
Text: Regroup: Exert an [URUK-HAI] hunter twice to transfer this condition from your support area to an unbound companion. Archery: Spot an [URUK-HAI] minion to transfer this condition from your support area to a Free Peoples archer.

Name: Final Triumph
Notes: The effect of this card changes the requirements for resolving a skirmish. As a result, none of the cards that previously had an effect on strength during a skirmish have any effect on a skirmish in which this card is played. Only cards or effects that increase or decrease vitality directly would alter the resolution of a skirmish in which this card was played.
Text: Spot your Uruk-hai skirmishing a companion to use vitality to resolve that skirmish instead of strength.

Name: Fury of the Evil Army
Text: Bearer must be an [URUK-HAI] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may choose one: discard a follower from play
column19: heal an [URUK-HAI] minion

Name: Ghastly Wound
Text: Make an [URUK-HAI] minion strength +2 and damage +1.

Name: Lurtz, Halfling Hunter
Text: Archer. Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions to make Lurtz fierce until the regroup phase. Assignment: Exert Lurtz twice to assign it to an unbound companion. The Free Peoples player may exert that companion or add a burden to prevent this.

Name: Lurtz's Bow, Black-Fletch Bow
Text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. When you play this possession on Lurtz, you may draw a card. Archery: If bearer is Lurtz, discard 2 [URUK-HAI] cards from hand to exert an unbound companion.

Name: New Forges Built
Text: Exert an [URUK-HAI] minion to reinforce an [URUK-HAI] token.

Name: Pikes Upon Pikes
Text: Each [URUK-HAI] minion bearing a hand weapon cannot take wounds during the archery phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make an [URUK-HAI] minion bearing a possession strength +2.

Name: Shagrat, Tower Captain
Text: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot 7 possessions, Shagrat is fierce and cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

Name: Tracking the Prize
Text: While you can spot 3 [URUK-HAI] hunters, at the start of each skirmish involving an [URUK-HAI] hunter, each companion skirmishing that minion must exert.

Name: White Hand Attacker
Text: Damage +1. While at a battleground, this minion is strength +2.

Name: White Hand Exorciser
Text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may heal an [URUK-HAI] minion.

Name: White Hand Marchers
Text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each other [URUK-HAI] minion you can spot.

Name: White Hand Marshal
Text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may control a site.

Name: White Hand Mystic
Text: Damage +1. Response: If an [URUK-HAI] minion is about to take a wound, exert this minion to prevent that wound.

Name: White Hand Sieger
Text: Damage +1. To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion and you must control a site.

Name: White Hand Traveler
Text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Spot 2 other [URUK-HAI] minions and remove [2] to make this minion strength +1 and damage +1.

Name: White Hand Uruk
Text: Damage +1. To play, spot an [URUK-HAI] minion.

Name: All Life Flees
Text: To play, spot a Nazgul. Remove (X) to choose one: discard a follower from play that has a twilight cost of X
column19: or play from deck a [WRAITH] minion that has a twilight cost of X.

Name: Pull of the Ring
Text: Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [WRAITH] minion to a companion who has resistance 0
column19: or have a [WRAITH] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Doorway to Doom
Text: Mountain. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player wounds two of his characters.

Name: Foot of Mount Doom
Text: Mountain. Each card that is about to be placed into the discard pile is removed from the game instead.

Name: Mithlond
Text: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player heals each of his or her characters.

Name: Morannon Plains
Text: Battleground. Plains. When the fellowship moves to this site, each player may reinforce a culture token.

Name: Sirannon Ruins
Text: River.

Name: Steward's Tomb
Text: Wounds cannot be prevented or healed. Burdens cannot be removed.

Name: Streets of Bree
Text: Dwelling. While the fellowship is at this site, followers cannot be transfered to a character.

Name: Arwen's Bow (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Archery: If bearer is Arwen, discard 2 [ELVEN] cards from hand to wound a minion.

Name: Arwen's Dagger (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Bearer may bear this hand weapon in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Maneuver: If bearer is Arwen, exert her to draw 2 cards.

Name: Galadriel's Silver Ewer (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: To play, spot Galadriel or Celeborn. While Galadriel is the Ring-bearer, she is strength +2 and resistance +2. Each time you play an [ELVEN] skirmish event, you may reinforce an [ELVEN] token.

Name: Beorning Axe (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Radagast's Herb Bag (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time you play a [GANDALF] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

Name: Shelob, Menace (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Fierce. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may add threats up to the number of burdens you can spot. Each time Shelob wins a skirmish, you may play Gollum from your discard pile
column19: he is strength +3 and fierce until the end of turn.

Name: Crown of Gondor (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

Name: Denethor's Sword (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

Name: Watcher at Sarn Ford, Ranger of the North (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

Name: Gothmog, Morgul Leader (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi. Game text is an erratum.
Text: Each the fellowship and minion archery totals are +3. Regroup: Remove [2] to play an [ORC] minion from your discard pile. That minion comes into play exhausted.

Name: Erkenbrand's Horn (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

Name: Erkenbrand's Shield (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi. Game text is an erratum.
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add [2] to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

Name: Rohirrim Diadem (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession and discard a [ROHAN] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

Name: Theoden, Ednew (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: While you can spot Gandalf, Theoden is resistance +2. While you can spot Eomer, Theoden is damage +1. While you can spot 3 mounted [ROHAN] companions, Theoden is strength +2.

Name: Fredegar Bolger, Fatty (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: While the fellowship is in region 1 and you can spot 2 other [SHIRE] companions, Fredegar Bolger is strength +3.

Name: Sting, Elven Long Knife (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Bearer must be Bilbo or Frodo. Regroup: Exert bearer to remove a threat.

Name: Shagrat, Tower Captain (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi.
Text: Damage +1. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot 7 possessions, Shagrat is fierce and cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases).

Name: Pull of the Ring (F)
Notes: Legends Series. Image fix by Malachi. Game text is a clarification.
Text: Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [WRAITH] minion to a companion who has resistance 0
column19: or have a [WRAITH] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

Name: Beorning Axe (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Man. While Grimbeorn is bearing this possession, each time he wins a skirmish, you may take a [GANDALF] card from your discard pile into hand.

Name: Radagast's Herb Bag (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
Text: Bearer must be a [GANDALF] Wizard. Each time you play a [GANDALF] spell, you may exert bearer to wound a minion.

Name: Crown of Gondor (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
Text: To play, spot Aragorn, Elendil, or Isildur. Skirmish: Spot a [GONDOR] Man with 3 or more vitality and discard a [GONDOR] card from hand to make that Man strength +2.

Name: Denethor's Sword (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. While bearer is Denethor, his game text does not apply.

Name: Watcher at Sarn Ford, Ranger of the North (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
Text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [GONDOR] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

Name: Erkenbrand's Horn (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).

Name: Erkenbrand's Shield (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden. Game text is an erratum.
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Erkenbrand, you may add [2] to cancel a fierce skirmish involving him. Response: If a [ROHAN] Man is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf and exert bearer to prevent that wound.

Name: Rohirrim Diadem (O)
Notes: Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
Text: To play, spot Theoden. Skirmish: Spot a [ROHAN] Man bearing a possession and discard a [ROHAN] possession from hand to make that Man strength +2.

Name: Pull of the Ring (O)
Text: Remove a burden to choose one: assign a [WRAITH] minion to a companion who has resistance 0
column19: or have a [WRAITH] minion lose fierce and gain hunter 2 until the regroup phase.

Name: The One Ring, The Great Ring
Text: While wearing The One Ring, each time the bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead. Maneuver: Wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Add a burden to make the Ring-bearer strength +3.

Name: Gimli, Opinionated Guide
Text: Damage +1. Fellowship. Each time you play a [DWARVEN] possession, you may draw a card.

Name: Still Twitching
Text: Bearer must be a [DWARVEN] companion. Bearer gains Hunter 2. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [DWARVEN] companion. At the end of each turn, if bearer did not win a skirmish this turn, discard this condition from play.

Name: That's Two!
Text: Spot Gimli and exert a fellowship companion to have each Shadow player discard one of his or her Shadow cards from play.

Name: Army Long Trained
Text: Bearer must be an [ELVEN] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [ELVEN] companion. At the start of the archery phase, you must exert bearer or return this condition to hand.

Name: Arwen, Royal Maiden
Text: Ranger. While you can spot 2 [ELVEN] followers, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -2. Maneuver: Add 3 threats to reconcile your hand.

Name: Legolas, Skeptical Guide
Text: Archer. Fellowship. Archery: Add two threats to wound a minion
column19: Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

Name: Gandalf, Wise Guide
Text: Fellowship. Response: If an event is played, exert Gandalf twice to cancel that event.

Name: Stern Words
Text: To play, spot a [GANDALF] Wizard. Bearer must be a companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another companion. At the end of each turn, return this condition to hand.

Name: Gollum, Threatening Guide
Text: Gollum is strength +1 for each threat you can spot. Each time Gollum wins a skirmish, you may add a threat.

Name: Smeagol, Pitiable Guide
Text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may shuffle up to 2 [GOLLUM] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck. Skirmish: Exert a Ring-bound companion to make Smeagol strength +2.

Name: Aragorn, Well-traveled Guide
Text: Fellowship. Ranger. While the Ring-bearer is the only other companion you can spot, Aragorn is an archer, defender +1, and can take no more than 1 wound each skirmish.

Name: Boromir, Destined Guide
Text: Fellowship. Ranger. While you can spot two unbound Hobbits, Boromir's twilight cost is -1. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may exert an unbound Hobbit to discard each minion he is skirmishing from play.

Name: Not Bound To His Fate
Text: Bearer must be a [GONDOR] Man. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [GONDOR] Man. At the end of each turn, if bearer is not Aragorn, return this condition to hand.

Name: Strength In My Blood
Text: Bearer must be a fellowship companion. While bearer is a [GONDOR] companion, he or she is damage +1.

Name: Grima, Servant of Another Master
Text: When you play Grima, you may remove [4] to exert an unbound companion. That companion cannot use special abilities until the regroup phase. Assignment: Exert Grima to assign him to an unbound companion. That companion may exert to prevent this.

Name: Urgency
Text: Weather. Each time the fellowship moves, add [2] for each Ent you can spot. Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a non-[WRAITH] minion strength +1.

Name: The Balrog, Demon of Might
Text: Damage +2. Fierce. While at an underground site, skip the archery phase, the maneuver phase, and The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions of strength 6 or less.

Name: Reaching Tentacle
Text: Tentacle. This minion cannot bear possessions. Discard this minion from play if not at a marsh. This minion is strength +1 for each tentacle you spot.

Name: Strong Tentacle
Text: Tentacle. This minion cannot bear possessions. Discard this minion from play if not at a marsh. This minion is strength +1 for each tentacle you spot.

Name: Watcher in the Water, Many-Tentacled Creature
Text: Discard all other minions (except tentacles). Watcher in the Water cannot bear possessions. The fellowship's current site gains marsh. Shadow: Play a tentacle from your discard pile.

Name: Pit Troll
Text: Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. When you play this minion, add 2 threats. The Free Peoples player may exert the Ring-bearer to prevent this.

Name: Troll of the Deep, Cave Troll
Text: To play, spot an [ORC] Orc. Skirmish: Remove a threat to make an [ORC] minion strength +2.

Name: Brought Down From Inside
Text: Bearer must be a [ROHAN] Man. At the start of each skirmish you may transfer this condition to a [ROHAN] Man. At the end of each turn, if bearer did not win a skirmish this turn, return this condition to hand.

Name: Eomer, Eored Captain
Text: Valiant. Eomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing.

Name: Eowyn, Lady of the Mark
Text: Valiant. Fellowship: Play a [ROHAN] companion with a twilight cost of 3 or more
column19: his or her twilight cost is -1.

Name: Sauron's Might
Text: Remove a Free Peoples culture token to add a threat. When you play this event, you may remove [1] to place this on the bottom of your draw deck instead of in your discard pile.

Name: Frodo, Little Master
Text: Fellowship. Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. While you cannot spot 4 threats, Shadow cards cannot discard cards from your hand or from the top of your draw deck.

Name: Merry, Resolute Friend
Text: Fellowship. Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, take 2 [SHIRE] cards from your discard pile and remove them from the game to make a companion strength +2.

Name: Pippin, Steadfast Friend
Text: Fellowship. Pippin is strength +1 for each tale you can spot.

Name: Rabbit Stew
Text: Bearer must be a [SHIRE] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to a fellowship companion. Each time this condition is transferred to a companion, heal that companion.

Name: Sam, Loyal Friend
Text: Fellowship. Ring-bound. While Sam bears The One Ring, he is resistance -4. While you can spot 3 [SHIRE] companions, Sam is strength +2. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer.

Name: Lurtz, Resilient Captain
Text: Archer. Damage +1. Response: If Lurtz is about to take a wound or be exerted, remove [2] (or exert another Uruk-hai) to prevent that wound or exertion.

Name: In Twilight
Text: Bearer must be a [WRAITH] minion. When you play this, you may draw a card. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [WRAITH] minion.

Name: Ulaire Attea, Dark Predator
Text: Fierce. While you can spot 5 twilight tokens in the twilight pool and another [WRAITH] card, Ulaire Attea is strength +3.

Name: Ulaire Enquea, Dark Threat
Text: Fierce. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions and discard a Nazgul from hand to wound an unbound companion.

Name: Ulaire Lemenya, Dark Enemy
Text: Fierce. Ulaire Lemenya is strength +1 for each [WRAITH] possession in your discard pile.

Name: Ulaire Nertea, Dark Horseman
Text: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Nertea, name a race. The Free Peoples player cannot assign Ulaire Nertea to skirmish a companion of the named race.

Name: Ulaire Toldea, Dark Shadow
Text: Fierce. Ulaire Toldea cannot be assigned to skirmish the same companion in a fierce skirmish that he has already been assigned to this turn.

Name: The Witch-king, Dark Lord
Text: Fierce. Skirmish: Discard a Nazgul from hand to make The Witch-king strength +1 (or strength +2 if you can spot that discarded Nazgul).
